story:
What is the “Slice?" It is our flagship Mini-Computer that sits on your desk/workspace that can outperform your current computer with the ability to use your existing peripherals (Mice/Keyboards/Monitors/Etc.) with a much smaller footprint. The Slice contains 1 slot for a Sliver (modular CPU) to be inserted and can be tailored to your exact needs! These Mini-Computers are able to run on Windows, Mac, or our own Customized Linux OS.

Powered by Intel and nVidia, and coming standard with 32 GB of ram, this tiny little system easily outperforms even the top end systems on the market today! Running on 4 Quad Core Processors, this little powerhouse is sure to change the face of computing as we know it!

This tiny computer system, measuring only 6"x5"x3" which is powered by Intel and featuring an nVidia graphics processors; anyone who is looking to do high end gaming, engineering or CAD design will be able to take advantage of the massive amount of power for a fraction of the cost of traditional systems.

Need more power? Grab the HPC Edition and have a whopping 6 quad core processors at your disposal for a massive amount of computing power!

* Grab the Starter Kit Perk and get started with the future of computing today! (xPU = CPU or GPU)

The Basic Specifications for the "Slice" Mini-PC are:

  • 16 GB of Ram
  • Intel 64bit Quad Core CPU
  • nVidia 4+1 Quad Core GPU
  • 128 GB of Storage ( Upgradable if you need more! )
  • High Def Audio Processor with Speaker/Headset/Mic Jacks
  • Bluetooth, WiFi, Ethernet
  • USB 3.0 and USB-C 3.1
  • DisplayPort, HDMI, DVI Video Connections
  • SD Card Slot
  • 1 Sliver Expansion Slot (works with all slivers EXCEPT the storage Sliver

*The Starter Kit Includes:  The Slice and Quad Core CPU and a Quad Core nVidia GPU's.

*USB-C 3.1 Connector is Fully Compatible with "The B.L.A.D.E."

*The Slice can connect via Ethernet or WiFi to the PiNAPoL for a massive amount of expansion as well as additional power.

We believe strongly that technology needs to advance. For the past few years we have seen software advancing, however the hardware advancements have hit a brick wall. Computer systems in general have not gone down in size and are requiring more cooling to simply stay on task. By offering a smaller package size with more power that requires less cooling, we feel as though the PiNAPoL and the Slice can change the face of computing well into the future.

Gamers and CAD designers alike have been complaining for quite some time now about issues with "screen lag" and other video issues due to graphics cards which are not able to keep up. This Multi-Processor system allows all processors to work in tandem to remove these issues. Offering higher frame rates and more processing power than standard desktop systems, the Slice can supersede it all!

We are currently in the process of having our PCB's (PC Boards) engineered to bring this product to market, and we have been working diligently with multiple major corporations to bring our customers the future of computing technology, TODAY!

WHY are we doing flexible funding? We believe strongly that this tiny system will become the new standard for professional and casual users alike. Having already brought in private funding we feel as though community support will ensure the success of this product!

HOW do we know this product works? We have a prototype that has shown us some staggering benchmarks and has been capable of running a very well known MMORPG with very impressive frame rates.

WHAT can you do to help us? By supporting this campaign, and pre-ordering your system, we will have the community support that shows our engineers and manufacturers as well as our private investors that the public is ready for this type of change!

The future is upon us, join us on our adventure into the next era in computing. Powered by PiNAPoL Technology!

*Product Fulfillment :Q4/2016
*Campaign funding received will help to cover the costs of manufacturing as well as show community support for this product!

**Fully Patented and Trademarked!

story:
Take Control with Soocialite

Soocialite is creating a convenient method of navigating your social life.  Find events in cities, book in advance, and earn rewards for simply living your life.  Soocialte grants the venue the chance to view real time diagnostics on the type of member that comes to their location; the amount that they spend, the kind of beverages that are purchased, and not to mention age, sex, and location demographics.  Soocialite is closing the bridge between the promoter  and the club.

For the first time the club will be able to communicate with its members.  Through this app you will be able to plan an entire night in advance.  This app will give you  the first look at VIP options and the pre sale tickets for an epic night that only the select few had authority over before.  We are geared towards giving users the option of ease with the flexibility of drink purchase, valet service, vehicle rental, table/section booking, and much more.   

Socialite will allow you to control your night all at the ease of a button

We are asking for backing to help push the development of Soocilite to the next level.  We need financial support to pay developers and technology experts.  We need to ensure that we have a server large enough to support the amount of users that will be actively signing up on the site.  

We are asking for support to help pay a media development team, pay for app plug-ins, to buy additional server space, and to increase our method of marketing.  

We are seeking $50.000 to assist in the security of the next wave of development for our team.  Those funds will helps us to build the unique infrastructure needed to hold the secure information and analytics that both sides are required to submit.   We want the user to have all the search options and interactive views associated with any venue that they search.  We want to launch on a full scale and offer every state.  If certain locations or markets are only offered then we feel that the app will be over looked and under judged.  If the user goes to the app; and their location is not listed or offered... Then people loose immediate interest.  This is something that we want to prevent.  We want there to be something available for every location and market.  

  • If we do not reach the entire goal.. We will make good on all of the incentives and perks that we associated with the funds.  We will then use the remainding portion of funding to push forth in the next wave of develpoment for the app.  We wish to push marketing further and to expand the site for use.  

Your Backing Makes All the Difference

A contribution in any denomination will assist Soocialite in research and development.  The companies main priority is to create a channel between patrons and vendors.  We aim to be the outlet that encourages communication and connection between customers and locations that they frequent.  For the first time; consumers will be offered a reward system based on check-ins and purchases made through the app.  This reward based system will encourage customer loyalty and will emphasize brand development.  Soocialite will stimulate the nightlife and restaurant industry by letting people live as normally as they do now.  

  • A valuable part to our company is that it dose not force any changes or take any pains to participate with.  Soocialite will be a tool that acts as a medium between purchaser and company.  Soocialite will offer customized search options and settings that will make finding what you want and need... that much easier.  
  • Soocialite currently has several entities that are ready to utilize it in its truest potential.  We recently visited the Miami South Beach market and received rave reviews from the prototype.  Companies are ready to place their clubs on the site to demo.  We are able to improve revenue stream for clubs and to offer them a means to gain revenue and growth; even when their locations are not operational.  
  • Blazen 8 a new clothing line hitting the streets has joined a combative force with Soocialite as well.  They are offering up fresh gear and support to see this mission sky rocket to the next level.  You can grab a piece of the action early through one of our perks. Check them out on social media (Instagram: TheBlazen8 or A1E_Apparral) (Twitter: TheBlazen8) (Facebook: Blazen8) (Tumbler:Blazen8) or hit them up directly on www.Blazen8.com.
  • Preve Vodka has taken an teamed up with Soocialite as the prime choice in liquor.  They are straight forward 100 proof Vodka company that holds no bars.   They are campaigning hard and straight to help  they are offering up promotion and teamed up with us to be able to offer a perk that shows you the Best way to Party... Preve Style.  
  • Shrimp Lips is one of the many vendors that are offering their fine dine to the menu of Soocialites success.  They are allowing you to make orders on the go through our app.  Fresh Seafood that the city is bantering for... These plates are to die for!!! (Instagram: Shrimp_Lips)
  • @BeingBrittanyBenson... What more needs to be said!!!  She is a huge force to be reckoned with.  Brittany Benson has joined the forces of Soocialite and she is eager to chat with YOU!  We are excited to have the Social Media Queen work side-by-side with us in Promotion of this new Innovative app.  When Brittany is not rocken the camera for Dr. Miami she is a passionate traveler.  Brittany knows what its like to go to a New City and a New State... and Wonder "What dose this city have to offer"?  Let Soocialte bring the city to you and Brittany is happy to talk to you about it....
  •    We have a huge ambassador for the company that is willing and ready to promote the advantages of the app.  Dr. Michael Salzhauer (www.BalHarbourSurgery.com) better known as Celebrity Dr. Miami of Bal Harbour Miami is fully vested in the promotional aspects of Soocialite and its success.   Please feel free to connect with him via social media SnapChat: TheReal DrMiami, Instagram: TheRealDrMiami or DrMiamiLand, FaceBook: TheRealDrMiami,  you can also catch up with the Doc on his newly launched web series that live streams called: TheNakedTea on FaceBook and with Special mention on Instagram.  

No Pain No Gain....

The major risks that Soocialite foresees are; rapid growth and expansion, and making sure that we have the needed amount of venues to keep up with the public. 

  • We intend to overcome these hurdles based on the founders.  We have twenty plus years of working with high growth business and navigating the challenges that they may present.  
  • The plan is to utilize a social media market driven advertising campaign as well as allowing promoters to market their own company in a new found light that the app will provide.  This will encourage growth and expansion through customer base and through client/promotor base.  

Spread the Word about SOOCIALITE

The most powerful marketing advantage that we have is Word of Mouth.  Social media has proven to be very successful in developing and opening that out lit that has turned small businesses into conglomerates over night.  The number of participants on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and YouTube have sky rocketed over the years.  

We have enlisted our company with profiles on each one of these media tools.  (Instagram: @Soocialite) (Twitter: @Soocialite_) (Facebook: Soocialite) (YouTube: Soocialite)

We encourage people to tell a friend and to share our page so that the awareness of Soocialite can hit the masses.  We are willing to offer incentives to first time pledges or new users so that they will be prompted to enlist in all of the services that Soocialite will offer.  We encourage individuals to link, share, and distribute the Soocialite website and to utilize the Indiegogo share tools.

story:
We understand that development of a drone application, specific for a business, is not an easy task. There are way too many things to take care of such as overall architecture, selection and integration of mechanical frame and electronics along with application development steps involving – business logic, custom payloads, data plumbing, end user interfaces etc.

That is why we launched Dev Pack 3 which comes with 40 hours of application development. It will allow us to understand your business idea and application requirements. We can then help you design the application architecture including onboard and offboard components, integrate new payloads specific to your business requirements and help with customization. This also includes building Web/Mobile app as a quick prototype or POC for your business idea.

Additionally, Dev Pack 3 brings you 4 hours of over the call personal support with our Flyt Experts who would answer queries and resolve issues related to FlytBase platform.

With Dev Pack 3 we will back you every step of the way in your journey to build your business specific drone application.

Know more about Developing Drone Applications for Business.



Whether you are building a drone for Agriculture, Inspections, Surveys, Delivery or Emergency Response, FlytPOD will help you accelerate your development. It comes with a hybrid architecture and a reliable sensor suite for safe operation of drones. Further, its powerful processor, communication system, support for variety of payloads and framework for developing onboard and offboard user apps will give you a headstart in building advanced drone applications.


                 

                       

                    

  

      

 




FlytPOD is an advanced flight computer that brings together Power and Simplicity to kickstart development of commercial drone applications.

RUN ADVANCED ALGORITHMS ONBOARD

The octa-core processor allows for implementation of computationally intensive algorithms. This opens doors for AI techniques with Computer Vision, Machine Learning enabling intelligent onboard decisions.


BUILD INTERNET OF DRONES

FlytPOD’s communication architecture allows your drone to connect with other drones, share data with ground devices, be it mobile, laptop or wearables and also connect to the cloud. Build internet of Drones with standard connectivity interfaces over WiFi, 3G or 4G.



INTEGRATE YOUR PAYLOADS

FlytPOD’s hardware interfaces are designed to support a variety of payloads so that you can equip your Drone with specialized sensors or actuators as required for your application domain.


RUNS ITS OWN OPERATING SYSTEM-FLYTOS

FlytOS is an Operating System for drones. This provides a solid foundation and a framework for developers so that you only need to focus on your business logic and you can quickly build apps specific to your domain.

FlytOS is based on Linux and ROS (Robot Operating System) making it an ideal platform for research and commercial drone applications. It comes integrated with proven PX4 autopilot codebase and provides high level functions for drone autonomy through FlytAPIs in ROS, CPP, Python, RESTful and Websocket.




BUILD SIMULATE DEPLOY

You can develop web or mobile apps for drones in your favorite development environment using the open FlytAPIs. The apps can be tested in FlytSim - 3D Simulator before the drone even takes off. FlytSim supports all the FlytAPIs and the simulated drone includes a RGB camera mounted on a 3-axis gimbal along with a front-facing RGBD camera. After successful testing in simulator, you can easily deploy the apps on FlytPOD.

The exhaustive documentation and forum will help you get onboard and will support you through your development journey.


HYBRID ARCHITECTURE

FlytPOD has a hybrid architecture with a real time flight controller and a high power processor for advanced functions. The critical flight stack is handled by the real time controller and is decoupled from the user apps enabling fail-safe.

RELIABILITY

For reliable state estimation, FlytPOD comes with a suspended IMU for vibration damping, an external magnetometer and support for RTK GPS. FlytPOD PRO also offers triple redundancy for IMU, dual pressure sensor and dual GPS for applications requiring higher reliability.


BUILT-IN FUNCTIONS & APPS

Several built-in functions and apps complete the user experience and provide a solid foundation to for your own applications.



The main technical specifications are highlighted below. Click here for a detailed list.

FlytPOD comes fully loaded with all the essentials to get you started with your drone app. For applications that demand higher reliability and superior performance, FlytPOD PRO offers sensor redundancy and faster eMMC upgrades.

Here are several kits and packs so you can choose the best fit for you. 
Can't decide between FlytPOD and FlytPOD PRO? Don't Worry! Just go ahead and back FlytPOD. We will offer all backers an option to switch to FlytPOD PRO later, anytime till 10th Sept.


                                          

                                     

    


  


We are a passionate team of experts in Aerospace, Electronics and Computer Science domains. We have been building drone technologies for over four years and we are now excited to introduce the Flyt platform. With FlytPOD you can let your creativity fly and welcome the endless possibilities. The era of drones is just beginning and we do believe that as a community we can utilize their enormous potential to save lives, safe efforts and change our world for better.



We have been working on the Flyt platform for more than a year and already have a working product. We have successfully completed a Beta program with our early customers from 10+ countries. We have received their testimonials and valuable feedback. There is in-depth online documentation, forums and videos as well as github repositories of sample apps.

We are currently working on further refinements and will be ready to ship the production version within 6-8 weeks of closing the Indiegogo campaign. As always, there are some risks associated with every campaign,  but we are confident to deliver rewards in time, and we will keep you posted with the updates.


 

                                             



Do I need to use separate autopilot with FlytPOD?
No! FlytPOD completely replaces your traditional autopilot, and offers a whole new range of features. Welcome to the age of Flight Computers!

What are the airframes supported by FlytPOD? Can I integrate it with my custom airframe?
For basic flight control, FlytPOD runs fork of PX4 autopilot, which supports various multirotors, fixed wing, VTOL, flapping wing, etc. You can also extend it to work with your custom frame.

What are physical specifications of FlytPOD?
The physical dimensions are 10 cm x 6 cm x 3 cm and it weighs around 150 gm (without antennas).

What are the internal WiFi specs?
2.4 GHz at 20 dBm, with two 5dbi antennas.

Can I use my own antennas?
Yes, the standard SMA connectors can fit a great variety of antennas. We encourage you to try out new configurations and share the results with the community.

How do I power FlytPOD?
We will provide you with a power module for use on vehicle and a wall adapter for lab use.

Can FlytPOD connect to my WiFi router?
Yes, FlytPOD can connect to your WiFi network. It can work in both hotspot and client modes. 

How can FlytPOD connect to the Internet?
FlytPOD can connect to the Internet by connecting to your WiFi network or 4G dongle (4G dongle is not shipped with FlytPOD).

Will there be updates? How to install them?
We will be releasing software updates periodically. The FlytConsole app can be used to flash the updates. We are working on making the process hassle free and we will make the step-by-step procedure available in the documentation.

Can I run APM or custom PX4 autopilot firmware on FlytPOD?
Yes, you can. We will make the required resources available soon.

What are onboard apps? In what languages can I write them?
Onboard apps are scripts that you write using onboard APIs in CPP, Python or ROS. You can also write onboard web apps using our web framework with server side code in Python and HTML/CSS/JS for client. You can check out some examples here.

How do I develop mobile apps using Flyt?
You can build native apps using our Android SDK or write cross-platform mobile apps using web technologies (HTML/CSS/JS) and tools like Cordova. The procedure for both is available in the documentation portal.

How can I connect multiple FlytPODs to each other and share data?
You can connect them all to single WiFi network. ROS multimaster package can be used to share ROS services and messages with multiple FlytPODs.

Where can I find more details about the simulator - FlytSim?
You can check out FlytSim by visiting out our website and docs.

Further, its powerful processor, communication system, support for variety of payloads and framework for developing onboard and offboard user apps will give you a headstart in building advanced drone applications.                                           








                    
  
      
 
FlytPOD is an advanced flight computer that brings together Power and Simplicity to kickstart development of commercial drone applications.RUN ADVANCED ALGORITHMS ONBOARD
The octa-core processor allows for implementation of computationally intensive algorithms. This opens doors for AI techniques with Computer Vision, Machine Learning enabling intelligent onboard decisions.










BUILD INTERNET OF DRONES
FlytPOD’s communication architecture allows your drone to connect with other drones, share data with ground devices, be it mobile, laptop or wearables and also connect to the cloud. Build internet of Drones with standard connectivity interfaces over WiFi, 3G or 4G.





INTEGRATE YOUR PAYLOADS





FlytPOD’s hardware interfaces are designed to support a variety of payloads so that you can equip your Drone with specialized sensors or actuators as required for your application domain.


RUNS ITS OWN OPERATING SYSTEM-FLYTOS
FlytOS is an Operating System for drones. This provides a solid foundation and a framework for developers so that you only need to focus on your business logic and you can quickly build apps specific to your domain. 
FlytOS is based on Linux and ROS (Robot Operating System) making it an ideal platform for research and commercial drone applications. It comes integrated with proven PX4 autopilot codebase and provides high level functions for drone autonomy through FlytAPIs in ROS, CPP, Python, RESTful and Websocket.






BUILD SIMULATE DEPLOY

You can develop web or mobile apps for drones in your favorite development environment using the open FlytAPIs. The apps can be tested in FlytSim - 3D Simulator before the drone even takes off. FlytSim supports all the FlytAPIs and the simulated drone includes a RGB camera mounted on a 3-axis gimbal along with a front-facing RGBD camera. After successful testing in simulator, you can easily deploy the apps on FlytPOD. The exhaustive documentation and forum will help you get onboard and will support you through your development journey. 



HYBRID ARCHITECTURE

FlytPOD has a hybrid architecture with a real time flight controller and a high power processor for advanced functions. The critical flight stack is handled by the real time controller and is decoupled from the user apps enabling fail-safe.








RELIABILITY
For reliable state estimation, FlytPOD comes with a suspended IMU for vibration damping, an external magnetometer and support for RTK GPS. FlytPOD PRO also offers triple redundancy for IMU, dual pressure sensor and dual GPS for applications requiring higher reliability. 


BUILT-IN FUNCTIONS & APPS
Several built-in functions and apps complete the user experience and provide a solid foundation to for your own applications.









The main technical specifications are highlighted below. Click here for a detailed list. 
FlytPOD comes fully loaded with all the essentials to get you started with your drone app. For applications that demand higher reliability and superior performance, FlytPOD PRO offers sensor redundancy and faster eMMC upgrades.







Here are several kits and packs so you can choose the best fit for you. Can't decide between FlytPOD and FlytPOD PRO? Don't Worry! Just go ahead and back FlytPOD. We will offer all backers an option to switch to FlytPOD PRO later, anytime till 10th Sept.









                                                                                 
      



   





We are a passionate team of experts in Aerospace, Electronics and Computer Science domains. We have been building drone technologies for over four years and we are now excited to introduce the Flyt platform. With FlytPOD you can let your creativity fly and welcome the endless possibilities. The era of drones is just beginning and we do believe that as a community we can utilize their enormous potential to save lives, safe efforts and change our world for better.






We have been working on the Flyt platform for more than a year and 
already have a working product. We have successfully completed a Beta 
program with our early customers from 10+ countries. We have received 
their testimonials and valuable feedback. There is in-depth online 
documentation, forums and videos as well as github repositories of 
sample apps.We
 are currently working on further refinements and will be ready to ship 
the production version within 6-8 weeks of closing the Indiegogo 
campaign. As always, there are some risks associated with every campaign,  but we are confident to deliver rewards in time, and we will keep you posted with the updates.

 
                                               




Do I need to use separate autopilot with FlytPOD?No!
 FlytPOD completely replaces your traditional autopilot, and offers a 
whole new range of features. Welcome to the age of Flight Computers!What are the airframes supported by FlytPOD? Can I integrate it with my custom airframe?For
 basic flight control, FlytPOD runs fork of PX4 autopilot, which 
supports various multirotors, fixed wing, VTOL, flapping wing, etc. You 
can also extend it to work with your custom frame. What are physical specifications of FlytPOD?The physical dimensions are 10 cm x 6 cm x 3 cm and it weighs around 150 gm (without antennas).What are the internal WiFi specs?2.4 GHz at 20 dBm, with two 5dbi antennas.Can I use my own antennas?Yes,
 the standard SMA connectors can fit a great variety of antennas. We 
encourage you to try out new configurations and share the results with 
the community.How do I power FlytPOD?We will provide you with a power module for use on vehicle and a wall adapter for lab use.Can FlytPOD connect to my WiFi router?Yes, FlytPOD can connect to your WiFi network. It can work in both hotspot and client modes. How can FlytPOD connect to the Internet?FlytPOD can connect to the Internet by connecting to your WiFi network or 4G dongle (4G dongle is not shipped with FlytPOD).Will there be updates? How to install them?We
 will be releasing software updates periodically. The FlytConsole app 
can be used to flash the updates. We are working on making the process 
hassle free and we will make the step-by-step procedure available in the
 documentation.Can I run APM or custom PX4 autopilot firmware on FlytPOD?Yes, you can. We will make the required resources available soon.What are onboard apps? In what languages can I write them?Onboard
 apps are scripts that you write using onboard APIs in CPP, Python or 
ROS. You can also write onboard web apps using our web framework with 
server side code in Python and HTML/CSS/JS for client. You can check out 
some examples here.How do I develop mobile apps using Flyt?You
 can build native apps using our Android SDK or write cross-platform mobile apps using web technologies (HTML/CSS/JS) and tools 
like Cordova. The
 procedure for both is available in the documentation portal. How can I connect multiple FlytPODs to each other and share data?You
 can connect them all to single WiFi network. ROS multimaster package 
can be used to share ROS services and messages with multiple FlytPODs.Where can I find more details about the simulator - FlytSim?
You can check out FlytSim by visiting out our website and docs.

story:
The problem, the idea, and the solution.

The idea UpTo comes from people that have been found themselves in a new city or country because of work or studies with the problem and need of making new friends. 

What we immediately realized is that: 

  • Many people struggle with meeting new friends especially when they move to a new city (expats and foreigners, students, workers)

  • The classic dating apps are focused on empty meetings and hookups rather than real friendships and are based on 1to1 meetings

  • Currently, there is no app that allows meeting new friends with similar interests and passions participating or organizing meet-ups in an easy and freeway.

 

What We Need & What You Get

UpTo is not only an idea or a dream, UpTo already exists!
You can download our app for iOS and Android clicking on the links below:

iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/pl/app/upto-meetups-an...
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=c...

UpTo was indeed created as prototype and MVP (minimum viable product) with our personal funds and savings, was launched in Warsaw on the 18th of April reaching over 2000 registered users in less than 3 months. 

However, to bring this dream to the next level, improve the app and expand it globally we need your help.

 

Our strength is the community!

UpTo aims to be a community-based app: from events to be organized to improvements to apply to the app everything is based on feedback gathered from our users!

 

 

So... who we are?

The UpTo team is composed of 5 Italians living in Warsaw and that have been living in different cities or countries because of work and studies. 
We have different professional backgrounds, but our personal experiences made us think that something like UpTo was needed!

 

Why invest?


​EXECUTION
The UpTo team was able to create a trust-based community in Warsaw just in few months that counts over 2000 users without using any marketing budget.

SCALABILITY
UpTo business model can be replicated in other markets and can grow quickly relying on the ability to build strong local communities.


The impact

Your donation will not only help us to improve the UpTo app, grow our community and help us to expand globally but part of the money you will donate will be also destinated for you in special prizes and gifts.

THANK YOU <3

story:
More About MLBB

Hello! My name is Daisha Chanel and I am the founder of the My Little Black Book App. My background is in fashion communications spanning from event production to influencer campaigns and management. I have built my career around highlighting and discovering brands and people that inspire me and others. 

My app was built inside the kitchen of my NYC apartment. MLBB started as a directory of exciting Black-owned businesses to support and has blossomed into a go-to guide for all things inspiration, brand awareness, and rediscovery.​

The MLBB app houses over 500 Black-owned brands from fashion to lifestyle. Search by category, bookmark favorite inspo photos & curate your own My Little Black Book. 

Building Black businesses in our creative community is our top priority & we pledge to donate 1% of our app purchases to the 15 Percent Pledge.

Receiving contributions to bring my app to life will help further my goal and mission of building awareness and community amongst others. I am dedicated to furthering the voices of creatives and creating a space that allows people to see themselves. 

What We Need & What You Get​

  • We are in need of $15,000 in funding to continue to develop the app and increase marketing efforts. 
  • A portion of the proceeds will be going to the organization listed above. In order to do this, we are in need of funding to get users excited to purchase the premium membership via app. 
  • If the entire goal is not met, funds will be allocated accordingly and proportionately across areas where it's needed. 

The Impact

The MLBB app is important to not only me but to the world at large. Being able to create something of this magnitude for others has been my greatest joy during a time where there has been so much pain and sadness. I hope to spark love, change, and creativity with my app and be a little beacon of hope to others. 

Risks & Challenges

Although we are not the only brand on the market with this style app, we are innovators. Constantly on the lookout for what's fresh and new. Staying ahead of the curve and being in the know is my expertise. I have worked through several challenges with the building and formation of the MLBB app and my work is not yet done. With my background in management and spearheading projects, I am well equipped to tackle anything thrown my way. This app was built during a time of uncertainty and we have been able to flourish and create a name within the social community. The sky is the limit! 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, join in on spreading the word! Please share on social @mylittleblackbookapp on IG and on Indiegogo. Get loud and make some noise! We are on the way and appreciate any form of contribution. Learn more about us at www.mylittleblackbook.co.

story:
SmartPhoto Case is here to revolutionize mobile photography. Innovative SmartPhoto Case is a patented combination of filters and LED flash designed to eliminate unwanted glare and flash reflections, bringing out a crystal clear image with increased contrast and definition.

 

The problem and the solution

When tattoo artists, influencers, bloggers and artists alike try to photograph their works, friends or items of interest quite often they meet the problem of their pictures not meeting their expectations.

When a subject is photographed or filmed with flash the resulting material contains reflections, glares and its contrast and color saturation are reduced. The picture just doesn't look good.

To mitigate this problem artists resort to complex and expensive studio photography setups with led lights, filters, uncomfortable rigs, cables and sync devices.

SmartPhoto Case is a simple but revolutionary device that reduces all those sophisticated solutions down to a smartphone case. 

No more expensive setups, heavy cameras and specialized software are needed! All you need is our case, a smartphone and a dark room. It is simple as that.

 

SmartPhoto Case comes with a host of features that will help you take that perfect shot.

The case will be made of a sturdy ABS material and filters will be covered by Gorilla glass to protect them from accidental scratches.

 

How it works?

The highlight feature of SmartPhoto Case is the ability to reduce or completely remove LED flash reflections.

For the best results, your photographed subject should be in a dark room or in a place where there are no other direct light sources reflecting on the photographed surface.

Use SmartPhoto Case to illuminate the subject and its built-in filters will completely remove the unwanted reflections from the photographed object.


SmartPhoto Case can also act as a classic polarizing filter which can improve your pictures in outdoor, landscape, and see thru photography setups.


 

* We are currently evaluating possibility of adding this feature regardless of whether we reach the stretch goal or not.

 

Prototypes are being tested across the world

We have prepared dozens of prototype units and we have sent them out to our PRO TEAM members for tests and to collect their feedback.

Their opinion about the product exceeded our expectations. They love SmartPhoto Case prototypes and hearing their positive comments is a big reward for us! We are posting their unboxing and reviews on our YouTube channel. Don't hesitate to go there and view some honest testimonials.

 

Testimonials

Members of our PRO TEAM have this to say about the case prototypes.
* (click on each testimonial to view the entire video)

 

 

Crowdfunding and production plans

We have already established a relationship with one of the leading smartphone accessories manufacturers who has 20 years of experience in telecommunication industry.

After successful funding campaign on Ingiegogo we will immediately move to prepare and launch mass production and we are hoping to start shipments before fall this year.

Our funds raised through this Indiegogo campaign will directly support launching the mass production, shipping logistics as well as initial marketing efforts.

 

We need your help

The nature of crowdfunding campaigns is that only your contribution can really make it happen.

We are kindly asking you to help us make this amazing product be available to everyone who needs it. Back us up and make this thing happen.

Your contribution is particularly important to us!

 

About SmartPhoto Case & the company

SmartPhoto Case is a first in the history device with functionality of photo studio build in a smartphone case. The idea was discovered at the beginning of 2019 by Jan Derendal, CEO and Founder of SmartPhoto Case (2264827 Alberta LTD.) 

SmartPhoto Case is a registered by United States Patent and Trademark Office. SmartPhoto Case employs and subcontracts product development engineers, tool making technicians, photographers, graphic designers, software developers and tattoo artists with many years of experience.

We are located in City of Lethbridge, province Alberta, Canada. Currently our team is concentrated on launching SmartPhoto Case mass production as soon as possible. 

 

Risks & Challenges

Final product's look and feel

Media materials (images and videos) presented in this campaign consist of 3D renders and imagery of different visual and functional prototypes produced throughout different stages of product development.

The final product's look and feel might differ from visualizations and prototypes presented in this campaign. Especially because we will provide our product for smartphones that are structurally different from latest iPhones - for which most media materials and prototypes have been prepared.  This will be directly evident on SmartPhoto Cases for phones that have their cameras in the center or fingerprint sensors on the back.

Manufacturing order

Initial production will be focused on the most in demand flagship models of popular smartphone brands. Production of the SmartPhoto Case for the least popular smartphone models might launch days or even weeks later.

Please be aware that by purchasing a perk for the least popular smartphones you might wait for your product longer than other backers.

 

Spread the love!

We are a small startup which needs all the help we can get to make our big dream come true. 

Other than backing our project by purchasing the perks, you can also help us immensely by spreading the word about the awesomeness of SmartPhoto Case so, more people are aware of it's existence.

Share the link to this campaign or use the Share buttons on top of this page.

Become the part of the revolution in mobile photography!

 


Find us on:

story:
A brief intro....

Life is full of memorable and joyful moments, but it is hard to predict when that moments would come. Imagine when that time arrives and you eagerly want to capture that Kodak moments, how frustrating it can be when finding out that your iPhone ran out of storage space. You would definitely miss that moment by the time you manage to free up some space on your phone. You might have an external storage device that can be connected to your iPhone to expand its storage space but the chances of accidentally dropping your phone is highly likely when you try to capture that moment while holding both phone and the external storage devices at the same time. You lose the Kodak moment and you end up having a broken iPhone.

Prototype Gallery

To make life a little bit less miserable and a little bit more enjoyable, we worked very hard to come up with a product that we are proud of - the Space Case for iPhone 6 and 6s.

Traditionally you would purchase two separate items, one to protect your phone and one to expand your phone's storage space until the iPhone era comes. You can no longer use any flash memory. Below is how we come up with the product idea.

The simple, innovative design of the Space Case is based on our belief that a truly remarkable mobile computing device such as the iPhone should be equipped with sufficiently large storage space without consumers paying the premium price tag. The Space Case does not only provide you the option to expand your iPhone’s storage capacity but it also offers a good protection to your beloved iPhone. It looks just like your normal smartphone case but with a built-in flash memory. With the use of the Space case, you no longer need to carry with you an external USB hard drive wherever you go, you can simply select one of the Space case with your preferred storage size and color. Away you go!

The Space case is trendy, elegant and easy to use. It supports files and folders navigation e.g. you can browse through your favorite music and video files. It also allows you to back up your contact list. All you have to do is to download the supported app which will be made available from the apple store. Now with the extra storage capacity added to your iPhone, you can take your collections of offline media files and enjoy listening to your music, watching your movies during a long haul flight, basically whenever and wherever you go.

The Space case comes with a built-in lightning cable, which allows users to instantly access files stored in its flash memory by simply connecting the cable to the iPhone’s lightning port. When you are done, you can remove the cable from the phone and placed it perfectly back into the dedicated slot at the back of the case.

The lightning port supports a maximum write speed of 18 MB/s and read speed of 22 MB/s which allows data access and transfer at a lightning speed.

In order to maintain the slim look of your phone while having the case on, the case itself comes with a built-in micro USB port, user can easily locate a more commonly used Micro USB cable to connect you device to a PC to allow easy file transfer. The maximum read speed can go up to 35 MB/S with a write speed of 20 MB/S.

The Space case has a super thin curvy design, the top end of the case is only 3.5mm thick while the bottom end is only 5.5 mm.

The Space case has a selection of 3 different colors (red, white and black). The built-in lightning cable has a black rubberized finish which prevents it from getting dirty and worn over time.

Current Color selection 

With the use of its dedicated App (Bright Storage) which can be downloaded from the apple store for free, the Space case allows individual files or folders to be password protected. Users can also have the App itself protected. This feature ensures your privacy is well protected. There is now no need to have your files uploaded to the cloud while worrying about your important documents to be stolen.

Product Features Demo

The concept

Prototyping Process

We have been working closely with a number of manufacturing facilities to select the best factory to produce the Space case. We have gone through the process of designing, testing, making and fine-tuning the prototype of the Space case to make sure the final product is of high quality. Below are screenshots showing parts of the engineering prototypes.

Supported App (Bright Storage)

Below are screenshots of the iOS app that we have developed. We have fully tested the app and its functions but it still requires a bit of tweaking before the final version will be released. 

Project Timelines

As we are all ware that the iPhone does not support expandable memory, it is a daunting task to decide how much storage space you might need before buying your iPhone. You do not want to regret your purchase only fining out a month later that you would need more storage space that what the phone comes with. With the use of the Space case, you do not need to purchase a more expensive iPhone 6 or 6s for extra storage space. You can simply purchase one with the least amount of storage capacity and select one of our very cost effective Space case with varying storage options available. You can then save some money for the next generation of the iPhone. The Space case will definitely help you to create a win-win situation. 

Having said that, this project will not be possible till we raise enough funding to help us to make a start. We strongly believe that the Space case would be a great product.
story_txt:
A brief intro....Life is full of memorable and joyful moments, but it is hard to predict when that moments would come. Imagine when that time arrives and you eagerly want to capture that Kodak moments, how frustrating it can be when finding out that your iPhone ran out of storage space. You would definitely miss that moment by the time you manage to free up some space on your phone. You might have an external storage device that can be connected to your iPhone to expand its storage space but the chances of accidentally dropping your phone is highly likely when you try to capture that moment while holding both phone and the external storage devices at the same time. You lose the Kodak moment and you end up having a broken iPhone.Prototype Gallery        To make life a little bit less miserable and a little bit more enjoyable, we worked very hard to come up with a product that we are proud of - the Space Case for iPhone 6 and 6s.Traditionally you would purchase two separate items, one to protect your phone and one to expand your phone's storage space until the iPhone era comes. You can no longer use any flash memory. Below is how we come up with the product idea.The simple, innovative design of the Space Case is based on our belief that a truly remarkable mobile computing device such as the iPhone should be equipped with sufficiently large storage space without consumers paying the premium price tag. The Space Case does not only provide you the option to expand your iPhone’s storage capacity but it also offers a good protection to your beloved iPhone. It looks just like your normal smartphone case but with a built-in flash memory. With the use of the Space case, you no longer need to carry with you an external USB hard drive wherever you go, you can simply select one of the Space case with your preferred storage size and color. Away you go! The Space case is trendy, elegant and easy to use. It supports files and folders navigation e.g. you can browse through your favorite music and video files. It also allows you to back up your contact list. All you have to do is to download the supported app which will be made available from the apple store. Now with the extra storage capacity added to your iPhone, you can take your collections of offline media files and enjoy listening to your music, watching your movies during a long haul flight, basically whenever and wherever you go.The Space case comes with a built-in lightning cable, which allows users to instantly access files stored in its flash memory by simply connecting the cable to the iPhone’s lightning port. When you are done, you can remove the cable from the phone and placed it perfectly back into the dedicated slot at the back of the case.The lightning port supports a maximum write speed of 18 MB/s and read speed of 22 MB/s which allows data access and transfer at a lightning speed. In order to maintain the slim look of your phone while having the case on, the case itself comes with a built-in micro USB port, user can easily locate a more commonly used Micro USB cable to connect you device to a PC to allow easy file transfer. The maximum read speed can go up to 35 MB/S with a write speed of 20 MB/S.  The Space case has a super thin curvy design, the top end of the case is only 3.5mm thick while the bottom end is only 5.5 mm. The Space case has a selection of 3 different colors (red, white and black). The built-in lightning cable has a black rubberized finish which prevents it from getting dirty and worn over time.Current Color selection  With the use of its dedicated App (Bright Storage) which can be downloaded from the apple store for free, the Space case allows individual files or folders to be password protected. Users can also have the App itself protected. This feature ensures your privacy is well protected. There is now no need to have your files uploaded to the cloud while worrying about your important documents to be stolen. Product Features Demo
 
 PLAY

The concept Prototyping ProcessWe have been working closely with a number of manufacturing facilities to select the best factory to produce the Space case. We have gone through the process of designing, testing, making and fine-tuning the prototype of the Space case to make sure the final product is of high quality. Below are screenshots showing parts of the engineering prototypes.    Supported App (Bright Storage)Below are screenshots of the iOS app that we have developed. We have fully tested the app and its functions but it still requires a bit of tweaking before the final version will be released.  Project Timelines As we are all ware that the iPhone does not support expandable memory, it is a daunting task to decide how much storage space you might need before buying your iPhone. You do not want to regret your purchase only fining out a month later that you would need more storage space that what the phone comes with. With the use of the Space case, you do not need to purchase a more expensive iPhone 6 or 6s for extra storage space. You can simply purchase one with the least amount of storage capacity and select one of our very cost effective Space case with varying storage options available. You can then save some money for the next generation of the iPhone. The Space case will definitely help you to create a win-win situation. Having said that, this project will not be possible till we raise enough funding to help us to make a start. We strongly believe that the Space case would be a great product.

story:
Hot on the heels of our first successfully funded Kickstarter campaign for the CSB502SSD for the Raspberry Pi 2, the Raspberry Pi Zero has been released to the world and it's a game changer!  Higher performance than the original Pi, but smaller, cheaper and much lower power. In order to achieve this, the Pi-Zero was designed with very minimal I/O. To compliment this, Pi 2 Design has created the Zero Shield, giving users their full-size USB ports back, 802.11b/g/n WiFi, M.2 SSD Socket, Real-Time Clock with Battery backup all in the new Pi Zero form factor. It was a tight squeeze but we did it!

  Similar to our CSB502SSD, the Zero Shield can supply enough power to support the shield and Pi Zero through its on-board power jack.


  • Raspberry Pi Zero Shield (same size as Raspberry Pi-Zero)
  • Two USB 2.0 ports w/500ma output for additional expansion
  • PL2571 - USB to SATA Bridge controller
  • NGFF Socket for up to 250GB on-board storage
  • GWF-3M08 WiFi Module (Based on Ralink RT5370) provides 802.11b/g/n for up to 150Mbps. On-Module IPEX connector allows for optimal antenna placement.
  • DS1339 Real Time Clock with 12mm Rechargeable Coin Cell Battery and Programmable Alarm.
  • 1-Wire DS18B20 Temperature Sensor mounted below SSD to monitor health of drive.
  • Additionally the DS18B20 has a unique 64-Bit ID that can be used to identify the shield.


 The Zero Shield was designed within days of the release of the Pi Zero, here's a look at our first prototypes:

 Initially we used a surface mount 40 position Female socket to connect to the Pi Zero, but this limits any additional stacking of HATS or shields by the end user if desired (and we plan to design many more). Such as our CSB502HDA-PZ High Resolution DAC with Opto/Coax Digital Out, 24-Bit/192Khz Line Out and 3Vrms Headphone Amplifier.

 The second revision has been sent out for fabrication at the PCB shop and you can see from the 3D model below that we made a few changes to the layout. We went back to the stacking connector and we also designed a rigid PCB with two MicroUSB-B plugs to attach the shield to the Pi Zero, no patch cable needed.


We want to say a big thank you for checking out our project, and your help in making it a reality. You're the best!

Even if you can't support us with a pledge, why not help us by spreading the word on Twitter, Facebook and any other social network you're on.

You can also use the Indiegogo share tools.


Recently the Raspberry Pi foundation announced a new program to allow users to create their own customized version of the Raspberry Pi 2. With 3-5K yearly minimums this program shows the commitment of the Raspberry Pi foundation to the embedded marketplace.

But, what if your not ready to make that commitment? We've got you covered. Our Pi2Custom program allows you to create your own application specific shield or carrier board for the Raspberry Pi 2 and now for the Raspberry Pi Zero too! Select from our vast library of IP and years of industrial interface experience, all with no volume commitments and low or no NRE! Contact us with your ideas and project needs. We love to help.


Risks and Challenges

There are not many risks and challenges because the PCB design is already on its second revision, which is just cleaning up a few things. They will be assembled as soon as they arrive at our facility and final testing will commence.

We manufacture our own boards in-house on our own manufacturing line in Cranston Rhode Island USA, so we have total control of the project from start to finish.  None of the common Off-Shore manufcaturing issues that plague so many otherwise good projects.

story:
What is Infinitton?

Welcome to Infinitton, the most powerful 4.3-inch screen keyboard accessories ever.  you can control any third party application to way you want it. From Infinitton application you can setup up to 1000+ interface to fits your need. when you switch the application Infinitton interface automatic changes. To create this amazing experience we started with a firmware design, then innovation it from the inside out. The key to infinitton experience is the screen under the transparent key caps. It’s how you interact using the keys through infinitton application.

 

 

We believe turned to Indiegogo is the best way to launch the product to market that much faster. Our product components are almost ready for tooling and then mass production, but only your help will get us there. we have many years of experience in manufacturing electronics products, and we have partnered with world top manufacturers who is mass production in the consumer electronics. with your support, we can make this happen.

 

Dennis is an  entrepreneur, he worked for worldwide brands with ten years of experience on making consumer electronic products, fulfilling orders worldwide. he is the founder of infinitton.

Jen Wen the first generation of Taiwanese engineer more then thirty years of problem solving experience, he coded the gambling machine back in the 80's. The key man who makes product work more efficiently and effectively. The founder of idisplay.

James has extensive experience as a design lead, he co-work with Dennis more then ten years excellent knowledge on strategic innovation, user experience and product design. he co-founder Infinitton, specializes in branding.

Mary have thirty years of experiences on quality control, helping the company setup and maintaining controls and documentation procedures. making sure that all material that we use meets international and national standards.

Andy is the guy take a product from an idea to marketplace. Andy provide efficient solutions to the development of processes and products. making sure product can be made reliably and will perform consistently in specified operating environments.
 

 

 

ROCK STAR Reward Program

 

 

Introducing the ROCK STAR rewards program. We're going to reward you to spread the word about Infinitton. All you have to do is log on to Indiegogo and share our project on your Facebook, Twitter, or Email.

When someone makes a pledge ($1 & $10 tier excluded) from your shared link, we will be able to track it via Indiegogo's dashboard and you will earn a reward. The more friends you get to pledge, the more rewards you get.

 

REWARDS

For every friend that makes a pledge through your link, you will get $10 (we will refund this amount to you at the end of the campaign). If 2 friends claim Infinitton, get $20. If 5 friends claim Infinitton, get $50. You get the idea.

IN ADDITION, you can also unlock the following prizes, depending on how how many of your friends you got to pledge.

Example: If 5 friends pledge through your link, you will get $50 ($10 x 5), as well as a Color choice of Black or Silver for your Infinitton.

 

HOW-TO:

How to participate:

1) Login to (or signup for) Indiegogo

** If you have already contributed to us via Indiegogo, then skip to step 3 **

2) You must be a contributor of our campaign to participate in the referral program (we can’t see your referral info unless you are a contributor). There is a $10 pledge option if you cannot make a pledge for a higher tier.

3) Hit the share buttons on the right side of the page, or copy the link and share with your friends. There is a built in code that will track your referrals.

 

How to track your results:

1) Log into your Indiegogo account.

2) Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page.

3) Select the “My Profile” option.

4) Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.

5) Count the funders that contributed.
story_txt:
What is Infinitton?
Welcome to Infinitton, the most powerful 4.3-inch screen keyboard accessories ever.  you can control any third party application to way you want it. From Infinitton application you can setup up to 1000+ interface to fits your need. when you switch the application Infinitton interface automatic changes. To create this amazing experience we started with a firmware design, then innovation it from the inside out. The key to infinitton experience is the screen under the transparent key caps. It’s how you interact using the keys through infinitton application.







 
 

We believe turned to Indiegogo is the best way to launch the product to market that much faster. Our product components are almost ready for tooling and then mass production, but only your help will get us there. we have many years of experience in manufacturing electronics products, and we have partnered with world top manufacturers who is mass production in the consumer electronics. with your support, we can make this happen. 

Dennis is an  entrepreneur, he worked for worldwide brands with ten years of experience on making consumer electronic products, fulfilling orders worldwide. he is the founder of infinitton.
Jen Wen the first generation of Taiwanese engineer more then thirty years of problem solving experience, he coded the gambling machine back in the 80's. The key man who makes product work more efficiently and effectively. The founder of idisplay.
James has extensive experience as a design lead, he co-work with Dennis more then ten years excellent knowledge on strategic innovation, user experience and product design. he co-founder Infinitton, specializes in branding.

Mary have thirty years of experiences on quality control, helping the company setup and maintaining controls and documentation procedures. making sure that all material that we use meets international and national standards.
Andy is the guy take a product from an idea to marketplace. Andy provide efficient solutions to the development of processes and products. making sure product can be made reliably and will perform consistently in specified operating environments.  
 









ROCK STAR Reward Program
 
 
Introducing the ROCK STAR rewards program. We're going to reward you to spread the word about Infinitton. All you have to do is log on to Indiegogo and share our project on your Facebook, Twitter, or Email.
When someone makes a pledge ($1 & $10 tier excluded) from your shared link, we will be able to track it via Indiegogo's dashboard and you will earn a reward. The more friends you get to pledge, the more rewards you get. REWARDS
For every friend that makes a pledge through your link, you will get $10 (we will refund this amount to you at the end of the campaign). If 2 friends claim Infinitton, get $20. If 5 friends claim Infinitton, get $50. You get the idea.
IN ADDITION, you can also unlock the following prizes, depending on how how many of your friends you got to pledge.

Example: If 5 friends pledge through your link, you will get $50 ($10 x 5), as well as a Color choice of Black or Silver for your Infinitton.
 
HOW-TO:
How to participate:
1) Login to (or signup for) Indiegogo
** If you have already contributed to us via Indiegogo, then skip to step 3 **
2) You must be a contributor of our campaign to participate in the referral program (we can’t see your referral info unless you are a contributor). There is a $10 pledge option if you cannot make a pledge for a higher tier.
3) Hit the share buttons on the right side of the page, or copy the link and share with your friends. There is a built in code that will track your referrals. How to track your results:
1) Log into your Indiegogo account.
2) Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page.
3) Select the “My Profile” option.
4) Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.
5) Count the funders that contributed.

story:
Short Summary

OFNI is a new mobile app that allows you to view the wait times of your favorite fast casual restaurants in your area "before you arrive".

Founded by John Seigler who started this business while homeless living out of his car, the company has made it all the way to the Bay Area (San Francisco) the tech hub of the world.

With sheer determination, persistence, patience and positivity he has guided his team through the difficult task of building a business with very little resources.

He and his CFO (Musa Sulejmani) have even slept in their Chicago office for 6 months to ensure they were putting all of their time and efforts into building you a great product and have now finally done so.

NOW WE NEED YOUR HELP!

In donating in the company we can provide you with wait times to your favorite fast casual restaurants in your area a lot quicker allowing you to always "know before you go."

We want to make life easier for you.

Thank you soo much for your kind support.

What We Need & What You Get

What we need is your help to grow the company so we can get the app to your city as quick as possible:

  • the funds will be used for server cost, as well as labor (hiring a larger tech team) and continuing to innovate our technology.

The Impact

Seriously, Nobody likes being blindsided by long wait-times. Remember that last time you were at Chipotle and had to wait 20 minutes to get your burrito? You don't like it, we don't like it, no one likes it. 

With OFNI, you will be able to know the wait time of "any" fast casual restaurant before you get there. Not only, but you can place your order as you're on your way to that restaurant, completely avoiding the line. 

Talk about convenience.

Risks & Challenges

Our biggest challenge is getting to all the customers in a timely fashion that want to use our mobile application in their particular city.  

  • Challenge: Having enough businesses on the platform in each and every city to allow customers to have full control over which businesses they want to go to based on their wait times.
  • Challenge: Hiring a large enough labor force to sustain growth at the pace that we'll be expanding.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word! Tell people about OFNI. This is a team effort.

story:
Phone Chargers Club was started to help students and their organizations raise funds for themselves or their programs.  All while helping their friends save money on phone chargers and cables that they need.


We are launching this Campaign to reach more students and organizations that need to raise funds, and also to reach more buyers to help our spotlight organizations earn more funds.  

We offer very useful and good quality cables at discounted prices because we design and subcontract OEM factories to make them to our specifications.  The low prices do not equal low quality, but rather our decision to lower profits to reach more customers.

Most of our cables can charge both Android and Apple devices within one cable.  Our latest offerings include Magnetic cable, Vampire 3 in 1 cable, Bottle opener cable, Y keychain cable, retractable, and bracelet cables.

In fact, the first 2 cables below can be found on Indiegogo and Kickstarter, even now.

Each Magnetic Charge Cable set comes with a plug and USB cable, for either micro USB (Android) or Lightning (Apple iPhone / iPad).

Vampire 3 in 1 Cable is the most versatile available.  It can charge either Android or iPhone from any USB power source.  When none is available, a built-in micro USB plug pulls out to plug into an Android phone or tablet for back up power & storage.  That's right, like a vampire, you can draw power from your BFF's Samsung to charge your iPhone.

The steel and ABS construction is tough, and available in black or white colors.

The silicone cable is very flexible and allows charging on the go.

Our Referral Rewards program (NOT for this campaign) gives 10% discount on purchases, and 10% cash earnings – simply by sharing personal discount codes.  For more info click here.

The Perks here are some of the cables available now on our website, but at lower prices, with FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE.  All items will be shipped by year's end, but we cannot guarantee that you will receive them by the holidays.

Get a FREE Bracelet Cable added onto your order -

Just share our campaign with any of the Share buttons above, and then send a public comment to us. 

We are running a short campaign so that once it completes, we can ship them to you shortly afterwards from our factory warehouse in either China or the USA.

This way, you can be sure to receive them before year’s end, and see for yourself how “real” we are compared to campaigns that don’t deliver.

All items have 6 months guarantee against defects.

Thank you for looking.  If you cannot contribute, please share our campaign with your friends.

story:
The device that I developed 

can independently and far off from all power sources produce electricity for 7-10 minutes by just one rotation. And it is:

  • compact 
  • innovative 
  • safe

It is called MEcharger!

 

Let's see working principle

Your phone depleted at the important moment?

You need only connect USB cable to MEcharger and rotate a wheel of mechanism till click.

Thats all!

Now you can charge your phone the tablet or the laptop wherever you are:

  • on the nature
  • in a bus
  • during trip
  • or at home

For free!

 

In the future

these researches will allow to provide the electricity to:

  • your own house
  • or whole region
  • or all city!

The history shows

that innovation moves our world forward, make better everything that surrounds us and then we can't live without them


MEcharger and my own researches

is a first step on the new road to our future!

story:
WINDROIDS 11 O/S - Everyone Needs This Product

    download FREE if this campaign is successful 

SMART PHONES - TABLETS - LAPTOPS - DESKTOPS ... Today you are being forced to accept SPYING as a fact of life.  Windows 10 and Android based systems offer an open door to NSA and other covert spying on ALL YOUR ACTIVITIES.  Hackers use these same portals to look into your devices.  You have been robbed of your privacy.

The "solutions" that you have been offered in the past are NOT SOLUTIONS because they do not attack the source problem.   The list of "solutions" that do not address the real problem are so called - "router attachments" - "firewalls" - "anti-virus programs" - "spam filters" -  and the list goes on.  NONE of them solve the real issue.  THE PROBLEM IS INHERENT IN THE OPERATING SYSTEM or O/S ... which is the core program in your SMART PHONE - TABLET - LAPTOP and DESKTOP COMPUTER.  Since the spying is built into this core program it works undetected ... external band-aids will never cure the problem.

Look at these recent headline :

Home / Science News / Technology October 14, 2015

Nearly 90 percent of Android devices Vulnerable to Malware Research says

WARNING ... DO NOT LOAD WINDOWS 10 ON YOUR COMPUTER !!!

It’s not just Windows 10, Windows 7 and 8 are also tracking you

Windows 10 will automatically download on to Windows 7 or 8 PCs

--------------------------------

This is the problem ... where is the solution ?

My experience as a system developer and telecommunications engineer gives me the knowledge to cure the problem at the source.   A complete replacement of the operating system in your device will eliminate all the "backdoor" entry points and monitor all activity UNDER YOUR CONTROL.  My new WINDROIDS 11 O/S is the final solution so you can rest easy from now on.  It will put YOU in control of your technical world again.   Applications also will run under YOUR control.  Spying and unauthorized transfer of your photos and personal data will be blocked.   And most of all ... the inherent spying activity in the core O/S will be eliminated.  If we are funded to additional levels we will include encryption a feature.   No need to buy a new device ... since WINDROIDS 11 O/S will operate on your existing Windows or Android SMART PHONE - TABLET - and Windows 7 to 10 PCs and Desktop computers.

The first release of this product will target WIFI users who use their phone - tablet - PC or Desktop strictly on a WIFI or direct router connection.   I have been living for years without that expensive monthly cell phone plan.   I live strictly on WIFI for all my communications needs.  Now you can take control of your digital communications life and be free from unauthorized snooping FOREVER.

The best part about this new product is that it will be FREE for all users !!! Yes you and everyone you know will be able to download and install WINDROIDS 11 O/S for free.    Once installed your phone will look and act just like windows or android (your choice) BUT WITHOUT ALL THE SPYING.  Our goal is to supply all your basic communications needs to be included in the free version.   Our future profits will come from licensing applications and developers.   See the PERKS buttons at right for donation benefits and developer licensing. 

My background is 25 years as an engineer in the telecommunications industry.  10 of those years I was the Principle Systems Engineer for both software and hardware specializing in computer security and encryption used in the computer centers of the world's largest banks, energy companies and secure government agencies.  I know this business backwards and forwards.   My recent eBook "Breaking RSA Codes for Fun and Profit" will be free to all who donate more than $25.00.  This book outlines the complex world of computer security and spying ... a must read for everyone who wants to understand this complex "industry".    

Be sure to donate AND click the top left "facebook LIKE" button to tell your friends to consider donating also !!! THANK YOU

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

$1 Million Goal

Software development can be expensive.   I have developed contacts with the smartest programmers in the business.  They are eager to get started.  We have set a goal of 4 months from the final date of the funding to release the first version of WINDROIDS 11 O/S.   In software terms this is a near impossible goal BUT i am confident that we can meet that goal given proper funding.   If we fall short of this goal the money will be spent to get as much done as possible and to seek out other investors to complete the initial release. 

But I want to be positive and believe that with your help 1) donate and 2) click on the facebook LIKE button at the top left of this page ... WE WILL REACH THIS GOAL ... if ever there were a campaign that needed funding this is IT !!!  This is a product that everyone needs. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Impact

For everyone to be free once and for all from spying is a huge advancement.   The entire spying business has crept in because the system designs were never monitored from the very earliest days of the computer industry.   We always trusted those in positions of political and corporate power to do the "right things" on our behalf but we have repeatedly been sorely mistaken.   I really hate to have to say this but we all know now this is the unfortunate truth.   WINDROIDS 11 O/S is the product that finally will return control of YOUR COMPUTING AND COMMUNICATIONS and put it back into your hands ... FOREVER.

IMAGINE ... no more anti-spam and anti-virus programs needed ... no more router attachments that do no get to the core of the problem ... no more of any of the Band-Aids that you have been paying for and not getting secure results.

My background is in both hardware and software development (no i was not a programmer) ... Basically before any product in our company was started ... I wrote what was known as a "FUNCTIONAL SPECIFICATION"  and "HARDWARE / SOFTWARE DESIGN SPECIFICATION" ... with these documents approved at the corporate level the engineering and software development teams would begin outlining and accomplishing the tasks to make an efficient and cost effective product.  AND LASTLY before the product went to market ... I had to sign off that all the SPECIFICATIONS were met. 

The Functional Specification outlined all the aspects that the product had to achieve.  It did not describe how one would achieve these goals but was a blueprint of all the design features INCLUDING compatibility with existing products.  After this was signed off at the corporate level I worked with the hardware and software engineers to outline all the implementations needed including performance and other issues to which the new product would conform.

This is my experience and this is why I am the right person to build the new WINROIDS 11 O/S system AND offer if for FREE.   But I need your help. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Risks & Challenges

As with any project there are challenges.  Our biggest challenge will be in meeting the rigid timetable of a 4 month commitment on delivery.  This will be approximately May 2016.   My career was in meeting demanding industry schedules and maintaining quality control.   This is an extremely short time frame but with the anticipated level of funding I believe it should give the power to produce the results on schedule.   As with any product the initial release will become more powerful with time. 

Part of the problem is that the core meaning of what an OPERATING SYSTEM should be has been lost.   The O/S was never meant to perform all the functions included in today's overburdened O/S systems.  Most of your computer power is wasted performing useless tasks many of which can be used to spy on you ... and  now literally the spying is placed directly into the operating systems so you have no choice but to live with all your information accessed without your consent.   The new WINDROIDS 11 O/S will change this and you will see a marked increase in your device response time and performance. 

The second challenge will be keeping up with the demand of the downloading public as millions rush to download this product at the same time.   We will work with dedicated servers to accommodate these challenges.   There may be a small charge to cover the cost of maintaining the servers and download internet connections.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • Tell your friends and favorite news media to cover our story including talk shows ... internet web pages ... tech magazines etc etc.  use the Indiegogo share tools at the top left hand corner of this page ESPECIALLY FACEBOOK ...
