story:
Powered by the Augmented Reality and specially designed algorithm, JODO Info Viewer is an innovative mobile application that will change the way you see the world around you. Our database extends all over the globe and the results are instantaneous. You will need no tour guides or maps using JODO.

Recognizing and finding new landmarks is a huge challenge when you don't have enough time. We came up with the idea during a weekend trip to Navarra, Spain. We had only two days to visit the whole  province so we were running from one place to another. Guides, maps, internet... Using all kinds of resources we had but this was exhausting and time consuming, so at the end we couldn't see much because of all the time we have lost. Then we came up with the idea. Wouldn't be faster and a lot easier if you have an application that you can just point at a landmark and it automatically gives you all the information.  That’s how the project started and at the end of 2016, after 3 months of research we started developing an algorithm that identifies four key tourist attractions: buildings, monuments, natural features and towns.

We have created this application not just for travelers or vacationers, but also for those who are curious about the world around them. You can use it everywhere; in the city , in the countryside, when you are on vacation or on a daily basis. How many times have you wondered what is to see in front of you without having a good source of information? Sometimes, you do not even know our home city. Modern technology allows us to explore anything online but this takes significant amount of time and effort and can be very complicated. That is why we decided to create JODO Info Viewer. Our application will give you everything you need - name, information, distance and even a navigation option.

  • We have developed a unique Augmented Reality Algorithm. 
  • Our application successfully identifies historic buildings, monuments, natural features and towns. 
  • We have modified open source database. Currently, we have more than 11 million Point of Interests from almost every corner of the world. 
  • The algorithm works successfully with every mid and high class Android device with gyroscope and every iPhone device (5 and above). 
  • We have developed a useful, simple and friendly UI.
  • JODO has Integrated Navigation
  • Information for the Points of Interest
  • A menu for sending requests for adding and recurring Points of Interest.
  • Currently, the application is available in English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, and Bulgarian.

 

JODO Info Viewer can be used for:

  • Vacations – visiting other cities with lots of historic buildings and monuments.
  • Outdoor Trips – Any adventure within the nature will be much more fun and informative with JODO Info Viewer
  • Business trips – Traveling for work could be much more interesting when recognizing local attractions

The work on JODO Info Viewer it’s in its final stage but we are currently in beta.  We need your help to unleash the full capacity of this unique mobile application.

All raised funds will be used for development. This is what we need to do before we launch for public use:

Improve our database

  • We have more than 11 million Points of Interests. Currently, we are using an open source database that we are modifying for our needs. We have developed a software which helps us put the coordinates in the exact place of every single Points of Interest so the required data shows on the right spot as close as possible and linking them with the specific tourist information.
  • The best-known tourist attractions are already there. However, we intent to beat the biggest providers of Points of Interest and have the most accurate database. We want to add the less known tourist attractions which you cannot find so easy on the Internet based maps.

 To do all that, we need to employ more staff that can do this in a short time.

Reach the lower-class devices

At this point, JODO is available on iPhone (5 and above) and every mid and high range Android devices with gyro sensor.  However, we need more focus on the lower-class devices using the accelerometer. At first, we started working on an algorithm which included the accelerometer, but had to put it on hold and prioritize the more precise gyro sensor method.  The accelerometer devices can have their own version of JODO Info Viewer as well, but we need additional work on the algorithm.

    Unfortunately, all this work requires time and resources.

Improve the user experience

Until now, the application was tested in a small circle of beta testers. Mostly friends. We tested on a lot of devices, but the Android universe is enormous and every device has its own characteristics. We need to expand that circle to eliminate any undesired malfunction or bug on every device. We also want an objective opinion on all the functions and features we have so when the application goes online everybody is happy.

To do that, we will need to employ professional beta testers.

 

What will happen if we raise more funds?

Offline mode

This is a big goal. We are in the 21st century and there is internet almost everywhere. Not exactly true. Roaming costs money and it's still hard to find a good reception while you're in the nature. If we go beyond our goal, we want to give the users the opportunity to download the data before you go somewhere.

  • Our AR algorithm is probably the most complex and precise of its kind
  • The technology is proven, tested and working. There is a large audience out there waiting for such a product to come out on the market.
  • The issue with using so complicated multisensory algorithm it that every sensor dependant on something. So, for better accuracy calibrate your device and keep in mind that any magnetic interference such as magnetic cases and use in a car will affect the precision.
  • We are at the last, pre-launching stage of development. JODO Info Viewer can be on the market in less than 4 weeks.
  • We are fully committed, after a successful campaign, to continue the development and the technical support of the application.
story_txt:
Powered by the Augmented Reality and specially designed algorithm, JODO Info Viewer is an innovative mobile application that will change the way you see the world around you. Our database extends all over the globe and the results are instantaneous. You will need no tour guides or maps using JODO.Recognizing and finding new landmarks is a huge challenge when you don't have enough time. We came up with the idea during a weekend trip to Navarra, Spain. We had only two days to visit the whole  province so we were running from one place to another. Guides, maps, internet... Using all kinds of resources we had but this was exhausting and time consuming, so at the end we couldn't see much because of all the time we have lost. Then we came up with the idea. Wouldn't be faster and a lot easier if you have an application that you can just point at a landmark and it automatically gives you all the information.  That’s how the project started and at the end of 2016, after 3 months of research we started developing an algorithm that identifies four key tourist attractions: buildings, monuments, natural features and towns.We have created this application not just for travelers or vacationers, but also for those who are curious about the world around them. You can use it everywhere; in the city , in the countryside, when you are on vacation or on a daily basis. How many times have you wondered what is to see in front of you without having a good source of information? Sometimes, you do not even know our home city. Modern technology allows us to explore anything online but this takes significant amount of time and effort and can be very complicated. That is why we decided to create JODO Info Viewer. Our application will give you everything you need - name, information, distance and even a navigation option.
We have developed a unique Augmented Reality Algorithm.

story:
Meet The Soliflame Fire Starter

 

The World's first solar rechargeable fire starter.

FIRE!  One of the most important elements of survival. 

Getting fire in a survival situation no longer has to be the daunting task of starting a fire with two sticks.  We've all watched the shows where these survivalists can't make a fire and it creates misery and mayhem.  In fact, more than 97% of the world's population couldn't start a fire with two sticks if their life depended on it.   The Soliflame makes starting a fire a breeze for anyone. 

 

Where it all started - ALPHA.

This was the very first working model we made of the SoliFlame.  In ALPHA we were just trying to complete the task of having a rechargeable Lipo battery ignite a coil with the push of a button.  It did not include the onboard solar panel at this point.   We were testing the power of the battery against different coil sizes and types.

 

The Journey Continues - BETA.

After successfully completing stage ALPHA we moved on to BETA in an attempt to incorporate on onboard solar panel that could charge the battery via sunlight.  This required countless hours of redesigning our first casing.  We also had to build a circuit board that would control charging loads and wattage delivery to the coil.  We also increased the output of the battery to send it's full resource in one clip instead of sending power trickles like LED flashlights.   Our goal was to get a stable working prototype.  

 

The First Working Prototype - PROTO1.

Although we had a solid working stable prototype we were missing that sleek ergonomic design.  So,  we went back to the drawing board and created a completly new casing.  We ran the casing on a 3D printer and SoliFlame PROTO1 was born.  

Why we need your help.

So far, we have funded the entire project ourselves.  We started with $1000.00 and built a 3D printer so we could build our models.  We then covered the cost of our initial materials and custom circuit board construction.  We also covered the cost of the Patent Process which is in final review.  We completed our prototypes and now we are ready to manufacture.  In order to get off the ground we need to produce 5,000 units.  So, we are leaving it to the World's hands.  If you want it...we will build it!

  • We are currently seeking $250,000.00 to fund our final engineering, and  initial run of units.

 

 

 

The Soliflame at a glance.

 

The SoliFlame V1 Solar Fire Starter comes

with a bunch of cool features. 

 

Follow Us

Always stay up to date with the SoliFlame team's latest updates on social media, and pick up some daily news from the world of solar power and the green energy REVOLUTION!

  • WEBSITE:  http://www.soliflame.com 
  • FACEBOOK:  http://www.facebook.com/soliflame
  • TWITTER:  http://www.twitter.com/soliflame
  • INSTAGRAM:  http://www.instagram.com/soliflame 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't purchase a SoliFlame unit we understand!  You can still support our brand and cause by purchasing one of our t-shirts for just $25.  Every bit helps and we appreciate you! 

If you don't want to help us financially that's ok too - Maybe help by spreading the word on your social media or website. You can do this easily just by using the SHARE features on Indiegogo.

story:
The Company

Welcome to County Cider Company.

We are a 20 year old cider producer located in Prince Edward County, Ontario. The family farm in the hamlet of Waupoos has been growing Ontario heritage apples since 1850.

Our growth and success has been based on our passion and commitment to produce the best quality hard ciders anywhere – with as little interference as possible. We are a vertically integrated company and grow the apples that go into our cider.

We firmly believe that to make a great cider vou must begin with the right type of apples.

Prince Edward County is a perfect place to grow apples because it has plenty of sunshine and warmth in the summer. The winters are relatively cool so trees go dormant and come out refreshed and disease-free in the spring. As a result, we have reduced the use of pesticides to the minimum effective level. 

Furthermore being so close to the lake provides a moderating effect on our local micro climate, for a longer spring and fall.

Today, our hard ciders are enjoyed in bars and restaurants throughout the province. They are also sold in LCBO stores as well as in our own Tasting Room on the farm. Our successful brands include County Cider and Waupoos Cider, and we also feature seasonal flavours such as Peach and Pear and even a hopped cider.

The New Idea

Research has shown that European style ciders will be the next big thing in cider – as consumers’ palettes mature and their appetite for new and interesting flavours matures too.

The addition of Bittersweet apples provide a far more complex taste profile in ciders.

Now, instead of producing more Ontario apple cider from dessert apples we want to do something more ambitious, unique and totally delicious.

And we’re on our way.

With help from the University of Guelph, County Cider Company has been experimenting with European cider apples in the orchard for over 15 years. We planted varieties from Britain and France such as Kingston Black, Brown Snout and Michelin – and we discovered they love the soil and conditions here in Prince Edward County.

We also discovered that blending these apples with our own Ontario heritage apples makes an amazing new ciders.

Tortured Path is the first cider we produced with a blend of 75% European and 25% Ontario apples – it is a wonderful Somerset-style cider and received a standing ovation in our tasting room trials.

What We Need

We’ve got the root stock, the growing conditions and the passion – and now we’re ready to grow our business by growing more of these apples.

Our plan is to plant 6,000 new Kingston Black and other European cider apple trees. We need crowd funding to help grow our business this way.

We will use a new modern growing system called the tall spindle method. Trees grow like grapes on trellises. They produce larger, quicker yields this way: 2,000 bushels per acre compared to 400 bushels per acre traditional apple trees, with full production coming within three years versus 10 to 25 years.

The Pay-Off

This investment will reduce our overall costs for juice. It will help us maintain control over how we grow our fruit. And it will help us reduce dependence on foreign grown cider apples and juice.

But best of all, it will help us produce wonderful new ciders. We will be able to produce another 250,000 liters of juice per year of a very specialized product. 

County Cider is seeking to raise $50,000 to contribute towards planting a new orchard of European cider apples using the new trellis system.

Help us grow traditional European cider apples in Ontario so we can make a new and unique product here.

Once this planting is established our orchards will, in total, remove over 800 tons of CO2 from the atmosphere (equivalent to the annual gas emissions of 167 cars)

story:
What is Pickup

  • Pickup - Pickup is a location-based sports app that connects its users to other casual sports players in their area, making it effortless to set up impromptu sports games anytime, anywhere!

Why You Need Pickup

  • No More Annoying Texting! - Don't you hate texting your friends all day trying to set up a sports game, only to have them bail on you at the last minute? Then stop. Pickup will automatically match you with another player in your area and help you find a location to play.

  • No More Paid Leagues! - Pickup is completely free! You can play as many games with as many people as you like and never worry about being charged.

  • No More Designated Times! - Play sports whenever you want with whomever you want!

  • Make New Friends! - Pickup matches you with other sports enthusiasts in your area, making new friends is easy when you've already got something in common.
    ---

What Pickup Needs & What You Get

  • The Money - The success of Pickup, at this stage, is totally based on how well we're able to market the app so that we have enough users for Pickup  to work correctly. Thus, we need funding to properly market our app so that when you log on, there will always be someone waiting to play with you.

  •  The Plan - The Pickup team has designed an exceptional marketing plan to get perspective users in every major American city talking about Pickup, excited about Pickup, and most importantly, using Pickup. And we're confident that we can procure enough users to make the app fun and make it easy for our users to find people, in their area, to play sports with.

  • The Perks - We have some awesome perks offered in our campaign, so help us and get some cool swag in the process. We've got perks ranging from custom sports gear and early access to Pickup to a free trip to Chicago and an invite to our official launch party! So don't miss out!
    ---

Pickup's Impact

  • The Impact - Pickup has the potential to change the way people all over the world play sports and that's the reason the Pickup team is so invested in the concept. Bringing people together, making it easier for them to coordinate recreational games and helping form new friendships is the real goal of Pickup!
    ---

The Pickup Crew

  • The Team - Pickup was founded by Adam Miguèst, CEO; James Wall, CFO; and Peter Senchenkov, COO. All three are Chicago natives with experience in tech start-ups and hold degrees from the University of Illinois in Champaign-Urbana. Jordan Kaye, CTO, joined the team soon after, as lead developer. The team members' diverse array of experience gives them a multi-perspective approach that other startups lack.
    ---

Other Ways You Can Help Pickup

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Tell A Friend - If you like our app, but can't contribute at this time, something as simple as telling a friend about Pickup or sharing the link to our campaign on your Facebook page will help more than you know.

  • The Love Below - Indiegogo has links to all of our Social Media pages below. Thank you in advance for all of your help, Pickup wouldn't be able to succeed without your support!

xoxo,

-Team Pickup

story:
"Revolution of Glass Screen Protector for Curved Edge Mobile Screen"




Introducing ITG Edge

"The only tempered glass screen protector that covers edge to edge of iPhone 6, while keeping the same curvature of the original iPhone 6 screen.

Our patent-pending liquid silicon surrounding technology completely covers the phone’s entire screen, protected by the original ITG(Impossible Tempered Glass) from shocks and scratches."





ITG Edge - Patents for all curved screen mobile phones

Priority date: August 4th, 2014

- U.S and Other countries

As major mobile phone companies start to come out new products with curved screen, Patchworks developed and applied patent for a technology to cover curved area of screen using a liquid silicone. Silicone enables glass screen protector keeps the same curvature of original screen, shock resistant and is composed of non hazardous material.


Real Photo Shot of ITG Edge Black(on Space Grey)



ITG Edge Features:


1. Edge to Edge protection

Patent pending liquid silicon surrounding technology enables ITG Edge to cover curved area of front display. Not only it covers the entire display surface, also it keeps the same curvature of curved display which allows to be compatible with most of phone cases, too.

2. Highest Quality Coating

ITG Edge is applied with the highest level of coating for ultra smooth glass surface, while preventing from scratches during daily uses. All ITG series is processed through Dry type, PVD(Physical Vapor Deposition), E-Beam coating. It is considered to be the highest quality coating technology available. You will simply notice it once you use ITG.  


3. Easy Installation

Since ITG Edge’s edges fit the front screen of your iPhone 6 perfectly, unlike other screen protectors, manual alignment is easily made. High quality adhesive lamination of the glass leaves no bubble unless there is obstruction like dust or list.

Above all the features,

ITG Edge gives you the spotless, unaltered original feel of Apple iPhone 6’s design along with the safety comfort that your original screen will be protected when shock is forced. 
Real Photo Shots of ITG Edge for iPhone 6 Space Grey and White
Now, you only need to feel it.

Exclusive for iPhone 6,

Unfortunately, ITG Edge is only available for iPhone 6 at the moment since we own tools for iPhone 6 only.

We are looking forward to see ITG Edge for iPhone 6’s success in the real market in order to establish financial foundation to produce ITG Edge for other devices such as iPhone 6 Plus, Samsung Galaxy S6, or any other future mobile models to be released. Your supporting perks can also make it possible for ITG Privacy version as well.



ITG

Pioneering brand in glass screen protector market, was born in 2011 during iPhone 4 generation, and was one of the first product in Tempered Glass Screen protector market.

ITG is a brand name for Patchworks’ tempered glass screen protector lineup. It stands for 'Impossible Tempered Glass'.

As a pioneer in developing tempered glass screen protectors, Patchworks guarantees high-end quality and satisfaction for every single glass that Patchworks manufactures. 





Who we are…

Patchworks Inc., founded in 2010, is a Seoul based company that designs, engineers, and produces premium, designer-oriented mobile accessories, including screen protectors and cases for iPhones and Android devices.

To get closers to our customers, we’ve recently established Patchworks Global Inc. in California, USA.



* Attentions: 
Please read the Perks descriptions carefully before you make transaction.
Please note that shipping for perks from Indigogo are only available for U.S. Domestics. No International shipping is available from Indiegogo.
story_txt:
"Revolution of Glass Screen Protector for Curved Edge Mobile Screen"


Introducing ITG Edge


"The only tempered glass screen
protector that covers edge to edge of iPhone 6, while keeping the same curvature of the original iPhone 6 screen.
Our patent-pending liquid silicon
surrounding technology completely covers the phone’s entire screen, protected by the original
ITG(Impossible Tempered Glass) from shocks and scratches."







ITG Edge - Patents for all curved screen
mobile phones
Priority date: August 4th, 2014


- U.S and Other countries
As major mobile phone companies start to come out new products with curved screen, Patchworks developed and applied patent for a technology to cover curved area of screen using a liquid silicone. Silicone enables glass screen protector keeps the same curvature of original screen, shock resistant and is composed of non hazardous material.



Real Photo Shot of ITG Edge Black(on Space Grey)




ITG Edge Features:

1. Edge to Edge protection

Patent pending liquid silicon surrounding technology enables ITG Edge to cover curved area of front display. Not only it covers the entire display surface, also it keeps the same curvature of curved display which allows to be compatible with most of phone cases, too.
2. Highest Quality CoatingITG Edge is applied with the highest level of coating for ultra smooth glass surface, while preventing from scratches during daily uses. All ITG series is processed through Dry type, PVD(Physical Vapor Deposition), E-Beam coating. It is considered to be the highest quality coating technology available. You will simply notice it once you use ITG.  


3. Easy Installation




Since ITG Edge’s edges fit the front screen of your iPhone 6 perfectly, unlike other screen protectors, manual alignment is easily made. High quality adhesive lamination of the glass leaves no bubble unless there is obstruction like dust or list.




Above all the features,


ITG Edge gives you the spotless, unaltered original feel of Apple iPhone 6’s design along
with the safety comfort that your original screen will be protected when shock
is forced. 

Real Photo Shots of ITG Edge for iPhone 6 Space Grey and WhiteNow, you only need to feel it.



Exclusive for iPhone 6,

Unfortunately, ITG Edge is only available for iPhone 6 at the moment since we own tools for iPhone 6 only.



We are looking forward to see ITG Edge for iPhone 6’s success in the real market in order to establish financial foundation to produce ITG Edge for other devices such as iPhone 6 Plus, Samsung Galaxy S6, or any other future mobile models to be released. 
Your supporting perks can also make it possible for ITG Privacy version as well.  






ITG




Pioneering brand in glass screen protector market, was
born in 2011 during iPhone 4 generation, and
was one of the first product in Tempered Glass Screen protector market.
ITG is a brand name for Patchworks’ tempered glass
screen protector lineup. It stands for 'Impossible Tempered Glass'. 
As a pioneer in developing tempered glass screen
protectors, Patchworks guarantees high-end quality and satisfaction for every
single glass that Patchworks manufactures. 

















Who we are…




Patchworks Inc., founded in 2010, is a Seoul based
company that designs, engineers, and produces premium, designer-oriented mobile
accessories, including screen protectors and cases for iPhones and Android devices.
To get closers to our customers, we’ve recently
established Patchworks Global Inc. in California, USA.

story:
A new app-based car service is rolling out nationwide, and you have the chance to get in on the ground floor of the next transportation revolution!

Minute Drivers - “Because the journey is just as important as the destination."

What is Minute Drivers?

Founded by Edward Mbeche, an entrepreneur and veteran player in the car service industry, Minute Drivers is a new app for mobile phones designed specifically for travelers, business executives, and corporate officers who demand quality: quality cars driven by quality people.

With Minute Drivers, clients can order a car at the touch of a button, then track the progress of the car with up-to-the-minute accuracy.

The Minute Drivers Difference

What makes Minute Drivers different from other car service options on the market?

  • Background Checks – Drivers are given a thorough criminal background check before hiring.
  • Training – Drivers must demonstrate a comprehensive knowledge of their area of service.
  • Insurance – Vehicles are properly insured with $1 to $5 million dollars in coverage.
  • Advance Booking – Clients can book cars in advance to avoid any last-minute surprises.
  • Transparent Pricing – What you see is what you get: no hidden fees, traffic charges, or surge pricing.
  • 24/7 Live Customer Support – Should a problem arise, central dispatch operators are always available to help.
  • Service You Can Trust – Dedicated managers and professional drivers ensure that passengers will have a safe, pleasant, and punctual ride every time.

Minute Drivers – Ride in Safety and Style with Our Fleet of Newer Model Luxury Automobiles!

The History of Minute Drivers

Edward Mbeche, founder and CEO of Minute Drivers, knows car service, knows mobile phone technology, and knows the benefits for consumers when these two worlds meet. Fresh out of college with a degree in computer management, Mbeche worked for Blackberry for two years before relocating from New Jersey to Washington, D.C. There, he fell in love with the car service industry, and after working for a time as a taxi dispatcher, he seized an opportunity to create his own business.

Thirteen years later, Global Sedan Service, the car service company that he founded, is still going strong. Edward Mbeche understands that his success is founded on the principles of quality service and continual innovation; Minute Drivers, his latest venture, is the logical extension of these principles: excellence, on demand.

Minute Drivers – Because Competition Drives Innovation

Though the car service on demand market might be getting crowded, there's always room for another player, if that player has what it takes to distinguish itself from the competition. Competition isn't dangerous; complacency is. At Minute Drivers, we believe that competition drives innovation, and we are convinced that, with our innovative approach to app-based car service, Minute Drivers will swiftly build a dedicated client base. After all, Minute Drivers offers an irresistible value: a quality drive at a reasonable price, delivered at the tap of a smartphone.

Minute Drivers Insures All Vehicles with up to $5 Million in Coverage


Minute Drivers - Investment Goals & Benefits

  • From design to development to launch, we estimate $25,000 in start-up costs.
  • Investment funds will be used for both development and marketing of Minute Drivers.
  • All supporters will receive perks in gratitude for their faith in the product.
  • Perks can be claimed nationwide.
  • Perks are transferable to family, friends, etc.
  • For a complete breakdown of perks, see the column to the right.

No More Shady Drivers! At Minute Drivers, All Drivers Subject to Criminal Background Checks

No More Standing out in the Rain to Hail a Cab! Use Minute Drivers to Book Cars in Advance

No More Waiting at 2 A.M. for a Car to Show! Minute Drivers Shows Real-Time Progress of Drivers

Minute Drivers – A Taxi, Black Car, or Ride-Share Is Only a Touch of an App Away


Minute Drivers Leverages Years of Car Service Industry Experience to Meet Its Challenges

Managed by Global Sedan Service employees with years spent working in the industry, Minute Drivers works to meet clients' needs by controlling every possible aspect of the car service experience. Of course, heavy traffic and adverse weather conditions can lead to delays, but with Minute Drivers' up-to-the-minute tracking of drivers, wait times are reduced or eliminated by dispatching additional drivers to  clients, should the first driver run late or end up stuck in traffic.

Other Ways to Make Minute Drivers a Reality

We believe in Minute Drivers, and we appreciate every contribution, no matter how small. For those who are unable to contribute at this time, please share our campaign on social media by clicking one of the buttons below. Edward Mbeche and the Minute Drivers team thank you for your support!

story:
We all have some trouble with touch Screens...

  • The finger smears the screen.
  • Trying to see what's on the screen AND scroll at the same time
  • Having to use TWO hands just to do ONE thing - like taking a selfie and probably dropping the phone or taking a picture of your hand.
  • Dropping the phone when reading in bed and you try and flip on to the next page ... unsuccessfully
  • Reading your tablet and trying to flip a page with your thumb - when you could really use a longer thumb with another joint somehow.

How annoying and uncomfortable are all these things?

Exo FingerMouse acts the same way as the Trackpad Mouse on your lap top computer. All computers use a mouse of some type, yet no phones or tablets do ... Yet!

Your finger falls naturally onto Exo FingerMouse on the back of your phone or tablet because you can position it wherever is convenient to you - left handed of right handed - offering maximum useability and comfort - and only using one hand to both operate and hold together.

With Exo FingerMouse in place, you can now...

  • Easily flip left and right between screens
  • Easily scroll up and down
  • Touch and drag
  • Zoom in or out with a double tap of the finger
  • Take a selfie with a single tap instead of trying to hold the device and reach around the front

Use the mouse pointer which appears on the screen to do mousy things, like...

  • Tap - click to select
  • Even type

All without touching the screen at all.

What's Included?
  • Exo FingerMouse
  • Charger cable - The cable head feeds power to the Exo FingerMouse's internal battery through a connector. The short charger cable comes from a power-off-take adapter which goes on the end of your USB charging cable and plugs into the phone so that both the phone and Exo FingerMouse charge at the same time.  You can also charge it with a normal USB charging lead from your computer or the mains electricity supply.
  • Pre-cut double sided self-adhesive strips - for attaching the Exo FingerMouse to phones, tablets etc.

How it works

  • You can conveniently position Exo FingerMouse anywhere on the back of your phone, tablet or set-top box remote control - or even on the arm of your favourite reading chair or in your hand.
  • Pair the Exo FingerMouse with your device using Bluetooth and you are good to go FingerMousing.

  • Exo FingerMouse also has a number of adhesive pads for affixing and changing location.  Anywhere is convenient, wherever that may be, over and over again.

  • The cable head feeds power to the Exo FingerMouse's internal battery through a connector. The short charger cable comes from a power-off-take adapter which goes on the end of your USB charging cable and plugs into the phone so that both the phone and Exo FingerMouse charge at the same time.  You can also charge it with a normal USB charging lead from your computer or the mains electricity supply.

Exo FingerMouse easily connects to your device through a simple one time Bluetooth connection and you're ready.

Stand reading - put your phone or tablet into its charging stand and put Exo FingerMouse in your hand, on the desk, or on your chair arm or even on your pillow and easily and comfortably turn pages and flip screens.

Set-Top Box - Put an Exo FingerMouse on the back of your Android Set-Top Box remote control to take control of the Set-Top Box in comfort.

Sharing/Presentation - Put Exo FingerMouse on the table or in your hand and share your gadget's screens with a single finger gesture.

Exo FingerMouse Keyring - Get Exo FingerMouse as a Keyring so you always have one handy to operate any Android device on the move.

There's a lot packed into such a small package.  Have a look at the functionality we can get from such a small device.

Development Plan to Fund

  1. PD 1 - Product Definition Week 1
  2. PD 2 - ID Release Week 2.5
  3. PD 3 - Stacking Release Week 3

story:
Fast Charging on the move is now possible. FlashBank has achieved a technology breakthrough for Portable Power Bank. You can have the flexibility to charge FlashBank either indoor or outdoor.

YES! While you are driving, you can charge FlashBank. In just 13.9 minutes, it is fully charged to 2200 mAh and that allows you to charge your mobile devices to 100%*. By the time you reach your destination, FlashBank is power up and ready to serve its purpose.

(*- 100% is based on iPhone series)

Inspired by our patented electric bus fast charging technology, FlashBank prides itself on its ability to REALLY keep your mobile devices energize on the GO throughout the day.



With durable components and a long lifespan of 2000 charge cycles, mobile device users NO longer have to worry about unstable power bank that takes too long to recharge and too quick to lose the power.


Charge Time of Hand Phone in the Market:

In this table, it shows the total charge time from 0% to 100% in hours for the above list of hand phones in the market. The fastest time among them was Samsung Galaxy S6 edge (TMOUS) which took 1.48 hours (88.8 minutes) to have their internal battery fully charge. As compared with FlashBank that took only 13.9 minutes to have itself fully charge before charging a hand phone, that is approximately 6.34 times much faster. Although it is not exactly accurate to do such comparison because their capacity are different, but they shouldn't be far off too much.


Comparison With Other Brands Of Portable Power Bank's Charging Time

Every single portable power bank has their own unique features. At least they can minimally provide power to energize your devices. Some of them are compact, some of them are stylish and some of them have high capacity. For FlashBank our focus is to develop a power bank that is close to the consumers' preferences on the characteristic of their ideal power bank. We wanted our final product to be able to achieve fast charging, not bounded to wall, long cycle life and most important of all, affordable.  In the above table, we have gathered few of the more popular brands in the market to do a comparison with our product on our key feature, fast charging. It significantly bring up the capability of FlashBank. Comparing with the closest competitor Anker, FlashBank is 8.57 times faster. 

Power Status Indicator:


Features:

  • 1st World's Fastest Portable Power Bank charging from the car
  • 14 Minutes charge time for 2200mAh
  • Long Life-span of 2000 charge cycle
  • Operating Temperature from 40 Degree Celsius to -10 Degree Celsius
  • Multi-head connector

Why we need your help:

The concept of FlashBank started off from my personal experience. As a heavy mobile device user, I know the helplessness and anxiety when we are on the move waiting for that important call or to make an urgent online transaction but our mobile devices run flat . Those experience inspires me to design a portable power bank that allows fast charging and more importantly doing that on the move.

My team has spent much time and effort to gather consumers' preferences on the characteristic of their ideal power bank. Below is the survey outcome rating ranging from "1" being the least concern to "10" the most.

From the survey, most people preferred a safe, fast charging power bank and certainly do not want themselves to be bounded to the wall and waste precious time waiting for the recharge to complete. The typical respondents are not particular on the appearances of the power bank. They are happy enough as long as the power bank is light in weight & has a small form factor,  so that it can be easily carried around.

Based on these data collection, we spent months to design, brainstorm, test & finally formulate  our desired outcome, "FlashBank". To facilitate fast charging in the car was a challenging task for us. The circuitry board has to be specially designed to meet the power source from the car electric socket and at the same time satisfy our fast charging requirement. The heat dissipation was the key factor to determine this success but WE DID IT.

As a result from our R&D, FlashBank is now ready for Certification by UL (Underwriters Laboratories) & Production. We are in need of support from tech-savvy early adopters like yourself to help us bring FlashBank to the market. Your support will boost FlashBank's profile and help even more fellow mobile device users on their common grouses of other power bank out in the market today. We deeply appreciate your support on our product. 


Funds Usage:

The funds are meant to help us bring FlashBank to the market. It will be utilized as follows:
1) Mould making (to house the soft cell battery)
2) Propriety IC chip housing
3) Function Specific Cables
4) Specialized wall-mounted adapter
5) Unique car-jack adapter
6) Safety Certification from UL (Underwriters Laboratories) - UL2.54, UL60950 and UN38.3. UL is an American worldwide safety consulting and certification company.


Specifications:

Dimension: 60mm x 100mm x 18mm ( 2.36" x 3.94" x 0.71")

Weight: 94 grams

External Battery Input via Wall Electric socket: 12 V, 3.5A

External Battery Input via Car Electric socket: 12 V, 5 A

External Battery Output: 5V, 2 A

Protection Technology: Protection circuitry providing safety to the end user despite of our high power source input.

Safety Certification: UL (Underwriters Laboratories) - UL2.54, UL60950 and UN38.3.


Team



We welcome & encourage distributors to contact us and help us market, so that more mobile device users can benefit from this initiative. For more information, please drop an email of your interest to sales@sgdte.com. Thank you.


Link From Following Network

FaceBook:

https://www.facebook.com/flashbank13.9

Twitter:          

https://twitter.com/datongenergy/status/622067925248139264

Website:        

http://sgdte.com/flashbank.html

Youtube:        

https://youtu.be/YnsGKHdwXWE

LInkedIn:        

https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/worlds-1st-fastest-car-chargeable-power-bank-raymond-chua?trk=pulse_spock-articles
story_txt:
Fast Charging on the move is now possible. FlashBank has achieved a technology breakthrough for Portable Power Bank. You can have the flexibility to charge FlashBank either indoor or outdoor.YES! While you are driving, you can charge FlashBank. In just 13.9 minutes, it is fully charged to 2200 mAh and that allows you to charge your mobile devices to 100%*. By the time you reach your destination, FlashBank is power up and ready to serve its purpose. (*- 100% is based on iPhone series)Inspired by our patented electric bus fast charging technology, FlashBank prides itself on its ability to REALLY keep your mobile devices energize on the GO throughout the day.


With durable components and a long lifespan of 2000 charge cycles, mobile device users NO longer have to worry about unstable power bank that takes too long to recharge and too quick to lose the power.

Charge Time of Hand Phone in the Market:

In this table, it shows the total charge time from 0% to 100% in hours for the above list of hand phones in the market. The fastest time among them was Samsung Galaxy S6 edge (TMOUS) which took 1.48 hours (88.8 minutes) to have their internal battery fully charge. As compared with FlashBank that took only 13.9 minutes to have itself fully charge before charging a hand phone, that is approximately 6.34 times much faster. Although it is not exactly accurate to do such comparison because their capacity are different, but they shouldn't be far off too much. 
Comparison With Other Brands Of Portable Power Bank's Charging Time
 

Every single portable power bank has their own unique features. At least they can minimally provide power to energize your devices. Some of them are compact, some of them are stylish and some of them have high capacity. For FlashBank our focus is to develop a power bank that is close to the consumers' preferences on the characteristic of their ideal power bank. We wanted our final product to be able to achieve fast charging, not bounded to wall, long cycle life and most important of all, affordable.  In the above table, we have gathered few of the more popular brands in the market to do a comparison with our product on our key feature, fast charging. It significantly bring up the capability of FlashBank. Comparing with the closest competitor Anker, FlashBank is 8.57 times faster.  
Power Status Indicator:


Features:

1st World's Fastest Portable Power Bank charging from the car

14 Minutes charge time for 2200mAh
Long Life-span of 2000 charge cycle
Operating Temperature from 40 Degree Celsius to -10 Degree Celsius
Multi-head connector

Why we need your help:The concept of FlashBank started off from my personal experience. As a heavy mobile device user, I know the helplessness and anxiety when we are on the move waiting for that important call or to make an urgent online transaction but our mobile devices run flat . Those experience inspires me to design a portable power bank that allows fast charging and more importantly doing that on the move.
My team has spent much time and effort to gather consumers' preferences on the characteristic of their ideal power bank. Below is the survey outcome rating ranging from "1" being the least concern to "10" the most. 

From the survey, most people preferred a safe, fast charging power bank and certainly do not want themselves to be bounded to the wall and waste precious time waiting for the recharge to complete. The typical respondents are not particular on the appearances of the power bank. They are happy enough as long as the power bank is light in weight & has a small form factor,  so that it can be easily carried around. 

Based on these data collection, we spent months to design, brainstorm, test & finally formulate  our desired outcome, "FlashBank". To facilitate fast charging in the car was a challenging task for us. The circuitry board has to be specially designed to meet the power source from the car electric socket and at the same time satisfy our fast charging requirement. The heat dissipation was the key factor to determine this success but WE DID IT.
As a result from our R&D, FlashBank is now ready for Certification by UL (Underwriters Laboratories) & Production. We are in need of support from tech-savvy early adopters like yourself to help us bring FlashBank to the market. Your support will boost FlashBank's profile and help even more fellow mobile device users on their common grouses of other power bank out in the market today. We deeply appreciate your support on our product. 

Funds Usage:
The funds are meant to help us bring FlashBank to the market. It will be utilized as follows:1) Mould making (to house the soft cell battery)2) Propriety IC chip housing3) Function Specific Cables4)  Specialized wall-mounted adapter5)  Unique car-jack adapter6)
 Safety Certification from UL (Underwriters Laboratories) - UL2.54, 
UL60950 and UN38.3. UL is an American worldwide safety consulting and 
certification company.

Specifications:
Dimension: 60mm x 100mm x 18mm ( 2.36" x 3.94" x 0.71")
Weight: 94 grams
External Battery Input via Wall Electric socket: 12 V, 3.5A
External Battery Input via Car Electric socket: 12 V, 5 A
External Battery Output: 5V, 2 A
Protection Technology: Protection circuitry providing safety to the end user despite of our high power source input.
Safety Certification: UL (Underwriters Laboratories) - UL2.54, 
UL60950 and UN38.3.

Team




We welcome & encourage distributors to contact us and help us market, so that more mobile device users can benefit from this initiative. For more information, please drop an email of your interest to sales@sgdte.com. Thank you.

Link From Following Network
FaceBook:
https://www.facebook.com/flashbank13.9
Twitter:           
https://twitter.com/datongenergy/status/622067925248139264
Website:         
http://sgdte.com/flashbank.html
Youtube:         
https://youtu.be/YnsGKHdwXWE
LInkedIn:         
https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/worlds-1st-fastest-car-chargeable-power-bank-raymond-chua?trk=pulse_spock-articles

story:
We're building a social media app for people that start with vlogging, and for people that like to watch the vlogs of these people!


What is Vloggy?

Vloggy is an new social media app for beginning vloggers and people that want to watch these vlogs. Vloggy will be a new kind of app which will make vlogging easier. We are 3 young man with a great idea for vlogging. We are from the Netherlands and we want to make this app go worldwide, but we need you for that.

Key Features

  • Record videos about your life
    Record whatever you like.
    Like you’re hobbies, cars and all the other stuff you like to do!

  • Easy edit your videos
    If you're done with filming start directly in the app with editing your video,
    no unnecessary expensive editing software anymore!

  • Share it with everyone in the world
    When you’re done with editing upload it easily in the app,
    so everyone can watch your videos.

  • Watch vlogs
    When you’re done with uploading your video you can easy watch vlogs of other people and of course if you aren’t a vlogger you can watch the vlogs.


Why Vloggy?

Normally you need a lot of money to start with vlogging. You will need a camera that’s probably around 200 euro’s, but after buying this expensive camera you’re not done yet! You need an editor program if you want nice and high quality video’s and the prices of a program like that aren’t funny. Who got the money for all this stuff? Well some people but not everyone and that’s not fair!

Almost everyone has a smartphone these days, and in these smartphones are very nice camera’s with a very good quality. So why don’t we use this camera? We want to make an app that has an editing program inside it. Are you done editing your video? Upload the video smooth and fast into your app!So just grab your smartphone, start making your own videos and share it with the world.


What is a “vlogger”?

A vlogger is someone that record his life.An example; If you are a daily vlogger you record every day of your life, seven days a week.You show your watchers what you’re doing on a day, even when you don’t do anything in your life. If you are a vlogger that upload one video a week you’re a weekly vlogger, you show your watchers the highlights of your week.So it’s very simple, a vlogger is someone that bring their life on screen so other people can watch what they are doing in their life.  

Details about Vloggy

What are the goals of the Indiegogo Funds?

We want to create the best experience there is for vlogging so the funds we collect goes to the application, server space and promotion.We ask this much money because we need a lot of server space to store the video’s after you uploaded it in the app.We also want a very good developer so the user experience is the best you can get.

PHASE I – The developer starts creating the application.

PHASE II – In this phase we’re optimize the app for the best user experience.

PHASE III – In this phase we’re giving the funders that we promised to get access to the BETA there change to test our app and fixing the problems they see.

PHASE IIII – We’re launching the app and everyone can enjoy the easy experience of Vloggy


COSTS BREAKDOWN

iOS Development:

€40.000

Server costs:

Depends of the number of users

Android development:

€40.000

Other:

We need savings for updating our  apps

FUNDING GOALS

Goal 1: Raise €40.000 to develop the iOS version.
Goal 2: Raise enough money to buy server space for the launch.
Goal 3: Raise the final €40.000 to develop an Android version.

Where is the future of Vloggy?

What we’d like to see in the future of the app is to create a big social media platform where users are be able to start vlogging easy and watch their favourite vloggers.We want to an app that connect you to the rest of the world and make a name in social media just like the other big social media.

Membership

Free

You can join for free so you can join the Vloggy experience easy.What you get with the free memberships:

  • Access to the app

  • Video’s with a length of 15 minutes

  • Limited use of the edit options in the app

Premium

The price for a premium membership will cost €4,99 a month or €49,99 a year

  • Ad-free

  • Video’s with a length of 45 minutes

  • Full access to all the edit options in the app

  • One full week, 7 days, on the highlight page to get more viewers

  • And we will add more soon to this list!

Ways you can help

You can help us of course by fund our project, but we understand that not everyone has the opportunity to fund us with money.So we’re will be very thank full if you share our project with your friendson Facebook, Twitter, Google+ and more.We would like it also if you spread the word by your neighbours and friends in real life.
If you have questions or comments you can always send an email to info@vloggy.nl or contact us on Twitter or Facebook.

We hope to see you on Vloggy!

story:
Change is good.

For over thirty years, Our cable and satellite bills have gotten more expensive, with less options and worse customer service than ever before.  As people continue to 'cut the cord' to find alternatives to their high monthly entertainment prices and bad experiences, we invite you to consider our (in our opinion) pretty cool & revolutionary alternative.  Now you can get simple, legal access to EVERYTHING you want to watch for one low monthly flat rate, with great customer service, to boot.   It doesn't get much better than that.  We're proud to present to you:

ODI TV




In Closing...

Our goal here at ODI TV is and always will be to provide easy access to the media available on A FREE and open Internet where content isn't censored and restricted.  We've learned a lot from the other streaming providers in the marketplace.  That learning and knowing 'we can do this better' is what led to the creation of ODI-Net and we believe that our 'secret sauce' is integral to continuing to provide that access - especially given the massive volatility surrounding this type of streaming, and the constant flux and changes the technology sees.  Other streaming providers may come and go but ODI TV is here for the long haul.  We KNOW this technology - we LIVE this Technology - And, most importantly, we LOVE this technology.  Now, we want to put it in your hands!  Thank you for looking at our campaign and watching our video (please do that now if you haven't - its at the top of the page and offers a great explanation of just how ODI TV works :)  ) - On behalf of your entire ODI TV team - We welcome you to join the revolution where we can all simply "Choose, Click, & Watch" - Have Fun, be good to each other and we'll see you soon!

story:
A Little 411 on flipcords™

At flipcords™, we want to make people-inspired products and solutions while lowering the amount of unneeded waste. Our passion and our mission is to create products that make people’s lives better, easier and more fulfilling. From mobile accessories to an extensive range of cables, flipcords™ products will enhance the technology that connects us to the people, activities and experiences we love from our mobile devices and tablets... 


Lifetime Warranty: Our vision is truly more than most comprehend. We not only want to use our warranty system to make everyone's lives better but to limit the amount of charger cables that enter the landfills each and every year.

Reduce the amount of non-warrantied charger cables that end up in our landfills. Reuse the charger cable that we provide to you under the warranty if yours wears out. Recycle the cable you wore out so we can replace it with a new one. Recharge your device to stay connected to the world!


Product & Company Highlights

Lifetime Warranty: flipcords™ engineers quality, durable, and reliable products. So, if your charger cable ever breaks down, simply return it to our warranty center and a replacement will be sent out. We will NEVER try to fix it, we will simply replace it. We will also exchange the cable for another model if you end up changing your phone to a new device with a different connection. We stand by our cables for a lifetime and that's a guarantee we will stand by. Please note that shipping and handling is not included for exchanges under our warranty.


Lifetime Exchange Policy: 

flipcords™ also includes something that basically doesn't exist anywhere else... If you switch from an apple phone to an android phone or vice versa you can use the warranty exchange process to switch it out!! Now how many times have you or someone you know switched phones and had a ton of unneeded cables because of the switch. Again, we got you covered!!


Reversible USB Orientation: We're working with the Reversible USB patent holder to make the first and only iPhone USB Lightning cable that works in any orientation. That means when you try to plug it in, you get it correctly the first time, every time. It's backwards compatible with every USB port and works with all of your devices!

Cord Length: It measures out at 4 feet in length. Its longer than the original Apple cable but long enough so you won't need to contort yourself into strange yogic positions while watching the latest episode of "The Walking Dead" at night in bed on your phone or tablet.

Material: Covered in fabric braiding, which makes it easily conform to the curves of your bed (and makes it just plain nice to have around). Best of all, it's duper durable and is pretty impossible to knot up and tangle.... Basically, its tangle free!!

Anti-Waste Packaging: All cables come with no wasteful packaging. That means everything you get with your cable is useful in every way possible. The packaging that your cables come in will also double as a waterproof pouch for you to put your cell phone or any other accessories you want to keep dry and dirt free for whatever life brings your way. Prototype Photos of actual packaging are currently being created. Will post ASAP. 

Apple Lightning MFI Certified Model Compatibility: Works with every Apple iPhone, iPad & iPod with a Lightning connector. This includes the iPhone 5, 5C, 5S, 6, 6 Plus, iPad 4, iPad Mini, iPod Touch, iPod Nano and all new iOS devices.

Micro-USB Model Compatibility: Works with every Smartphone and Tablet with a standard Micro USB Connector. This includes the Samsung Galaxy S2, S3, S4, S5, S6 Samsung Galaxy Note, HTC One, BlackBerry 10, LG Optimus, Sony Xperia, Nokia Lumia 920, 925 & 1020, Huawei Ascend and any other device that will take a Micro-USB Connection. Please check to make sure your device has a Standard Micro-USB Connection if you choose this model.

Our goal is needed for us to be able to start up and get this self sustainable system up and running.... Please be willing to share our dream, it's contagious!

DON'T BIN IT, BURN IT or BURY IT..... FLIP IT!



How Does The Warranty Work....

To submit a warranty exchange or return follow the below:

  1. Contact us to receive an RMA number and return label.
  2. Package your damaged item for return and place the label on it. If possible, try to use recyclable mailing materials.
  3. Your RMA number will be on your return label for us to identify your exchange. (No wasteful paper to be used)
  4. Bring your package with the return label on it to the nearest USPS and drop it off.
  5. Your new cable will be on its way to you within 3 to 5 business days upon receipt of your return.
  6. Shipping and Handling fee for all warranty exchanges are not included.
When ever a customer needs to replace a charger cord there is a flat $9.99 shipping and handling fee. This fee covers the cost on the return shipping, new shipping costs and labor to package your order. The cable itself of course is replaced free of charge.

Aftermarket cables cost between $8 and $20 and never seem to work properly. You always end up getting an annoying message on your phone stating it is not certified and its consistently not working. They last several days to weeks..... Worst of all, WAY to many of them, if not all are ending up in our landfills and wastelands.

These cables are tough and if for whatever reasons you are tougher than it is, your covered!!


Risks & Challenges

We have been working in the last few months to continuously improve the design and to make sure that the final product is of the highest standards. We have the experience to meet and hopefully surpass your expectations. We've already prototyped flipcords™ to an end-user quality, so there is no risk that the backers will be disappointed by the quality and style of flipcords™.

While we hope this process is streamlined, and our manufacturer has everything lined up to produce the product, there may be unforeseen delays. However, we have every impression that we can get flipcords™ to you as quickly as promised.

We have already discussed and carefully planned the production phase to ensure that we reduce the risks of possible delays so that you can enjoy your new better charger cable as soon as possible. Apple has approved Flipcords™ as an MFI manufacturer and retailer. Of course, we will need Apple's blessing once this product is fully designed and funded prior to complete manufacturing. 

Thank you for believing in us.

Other Ways "YOU" Can Help

Just because you can't contribute, doesn't mean you can't help in creating a better world. Please help in any way possible as we to make this a reality. One of the best ways you can help regardless if you contributed or not, is to get the word out and make some noise about this world changing campaign. You can easily use the Indiegogo share tools!

One of the best ways you can help regardless if you contributed or not, is to get the word out and make some noise about this world changing campaign. You can easily use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Portable Powering Solution

The GoPlug Smart Power Bank is a beautiful, intelligent and adaptable battery pack designed around the workflows of photographers, creatives, travelers and commuters. It's more than just a battery, it's your day-to-day essential life saver, and it does things other power supplies can't.
The GoPlug Smart Power Bank connects to your smartphone, enabling features that will forever change the way you power mobility.
It comes in a 110V version....

...and a 220V version with an universal AC port.

Easy to Use
Anything you can plug into a wall outlet, you can plug into GoPlug's Smart Power Bank...

 ...and it will make your everyday powering experience wonderful, no matter what you're doing.

It's Smart

In addition to operation the power bank manually, you can control the Smart Power Bank from your mobile phone. From the app you can initiate power, set powering times, receive alert notifications, track its location, be notified if you are leaving it behind, and program ON/OFF times much like you would an alarm. 

You can also charge a laptop up to two times and a smartphone over 14 times. Isn’t that awesome?

Power Anything.  Anywhere.

Gone are the days when binding yourself to a wall outlet for electricity is the norm—

When batteries die, productivity should not.  

The GoPlug Smart Power Bank will keep users connected and increase productivity, leading to increased revenue and eliminate stress for unproductive, frustrated, on-the-go professionals who constantly run out of power.

Off-Grid

AC/DC
Before this acronym became synonymous for a well-known band, it was a heated energy rivalry in the 1900's between Nikola Tesla and Thomas Edison.  We won't get into who's current flow was better, however, they're both used all over the world today.  
Our Smart Power Bank provides both currents in one compact Smart Power Bank-- I guess you can say we're kinda like peacekeepers!

Just to reiterate, anything you can plug into the wall, you can plug into GoPlug's Smart Power Bank.
Here's a quick video showing its power (no tricks or audio overdubbing):

It's been designed to charge or power a variety of electronics...

...even jumpstart a car.

Who knows when you'll need a boost of power-- not just for smartphones and laptops,

Manual Mode
The Power Mode Switch allows users to select between 12V, 19V, or AC output powering options.  

APP Mode

Timer controlled powering: Just like an alarm clock, timer controlled powering can be set on the GoPlug Smart Power Bank.  Just plug the device(s) into the Smart Power Bank, and set the times you want the Smart Power Bank to turn ON/OFF.  It's that simple!

Timer controlled powering can also be set and switched between different power ports.

Battery Preserve Mode:  Wanna keep a little juice in the power bank for those unexpected situations? You can set the GoPlug Smart Power Bank to shut off when that battery life hits a percentage you choose.


Charging Complete Notifications: Ever wonder when your camera batteries are fully charged?  Receive notifications when your electronics are fully charged.  You can also receive alert notifications when the GoPlug Power Bank is fully charged.


Power Select: When the GoPlug Power Bank is in the Bluetooth setting, you can initiate different powering options from a mobile device.


Proximity Sensor: Carry this in your bag or luggage. Thanks to the proximity sensors, you will receive alerts when you are separated from your gear. You can also locate your GoPlug Smart Power Bank with a proximity heat map and receive a reminder of the last recorded location. 


GPS: If you ever lose your GoPlug Smart Power Bank, the GoPlug network will help you track the location of your power bank. As the network grows, we will cover the whole planet.
Movement Alarm: The GoPlug Smart Power Bank will send an alert notification if its moved.  Talk about peace of mind, we've thought of it all!

The GoPlug Smart Power Bank can be recharged one of three ways: AC wall outlet, Car Cigarette port, or Solar. 

AC Wall Outlet

Car Cigarette Outlet

Solar

And yes, you can daisy chain and connect multiple solar panels together for faster recharge times.

Urban

Outdoor

Nightlife

Business

Job Site

Power Outages

Videographers

Camping

Sporting Events


SPECIFICATIONS

  • 96.6Wh (26400mAh) Capacity
  • Lithium-ion battery
  • 110V (220V International) 100W AC power
  • 12V, 10A 6.4mm Power Port
  • 19V, 5A 6.1mm Power Port
  • 2x USB 2.1A Power Port
  • Input: 15V to 22V/2A (up to 6A)
  • Magnetic Powering Option: 12V / 2A and USB 2.1A 
  • Weight: 2.2lbs. 
  • Bluetooth 4.0 Wireless Technology 
  • Over Charge Protection
  • Overheat Protection
  • Discharge Protection
  • Current Protection
  • Over-voltage protection
  • Short-circuit Protection
  • Shock Resistant
  • Automatic Shutoff

Dimensions

  • 5.8in x 1.5in x 5.25in (14.7 x 3.8 x 13.3 cm)

Include any of these products with your pledge.  Simply add the dollar amount to your pledge.  For example, if you want to include a solar panel to your reward, add $100.

  • Car Cigarette recharging power cord
  • Car Jumper Cables
  • USB cable kit (micro, mini, lighting) and pouch

  • 4 panel solar panel
  • USB port for direct charging ability
  • Daisy Chain multiple solar panels together
SOLAR PANEL SPECS
  • Solar Capacity: 18W
  • Power Output: USB, 12V
  • Number of Panels: 4
  • Folded Dimensions: 10"x 7" 1" 
  • Weight: 1.60 pounds

  • 110V or 220V Smart Power Bank
  • Docking Station
  • Barrel Port Adapter Kit
  • AC recharging power cord

ADD $40 to your pledge to include the Cable Kit (Car Cigarette recharge cable, Car Jumper Cables, USB cable kit)

ADD $100 to your pledge to include a solar panel


SHIPS EARLY - Estimated Shipping: September 2016

  • 110V or 220V Smart Power Bank
  • Docking Station
  • Barrel Port Adapter Kit
  • AC recharging power cord

ADD $40 to your pledge to include the Cable Kit (Car Cigarette recharge cable, Car Jumper Cables, USB cable kit)

ADD $100 to your pledge to include a solar panel


  • Messenger Bag (Charcoal or Heathered Grey)
  • 110V or 220V Smart Power Bank
  • Docking Station
  • Barrel Port Adapter Kit
  • AC recharging power cord
ADD $40 to your pledge to include the Cable Kit (Car Cigarette recharge cable, Car Jumper Cables, USB cable kit)
ADD $100 to your pledge to include a solar panel

  • 110V or 220V Smart Power Bank
  • Docking Station

  • AC recharging power cord

FEATURES

  • High Quality Hydrophobic Nylon Exterior backed with a water resistant inner PU shield 
  • Ultra-Strong Shoulder Strap
  • Durable Adjustable Aluminum Clip for Shoulder Strap  
  • Tensile Tested Heavy Duty Thread Used Throughout the Bag
  • Built Along-Side Each GoPlug Bag 

DIMENSIONS

  • 16in. x 12in. x 5in. (40.5cm x 30.4cm x 12.7cm)
  • Strap Adjustable from 52in. to 27in. (132cm to 68.5cm)
  • Document Size Exterior Zipper Pocket: 15.25in. x 10in. (38.5 x 25.3cm)

POCKET DIMENSIONS

  • Laptop Compartment: 15in. x 9.5in. (38cm x 24cm)
  • Power Bank / Tablet Compartment: 9.5in. x 7.25in. (24cm x 18.4cm)
  • Smartphone compartment: 6.5in. x 3.75in. (16.3cm x 9.5cm)
  • Interior Zipper Pocket: 11.75in. x 7in. (29.9cm. x 17.7cm)
  • Accessory Pouch: 4.75in. x 5in. (12cm x 12.6cm)
  • Mesh Pouch: 4.75in. x 3.5in. (12cm x 8.8cm)
  • RFID Pocket: 5.75in. x 5.75in. (14.6cm x 14.6cm)

FEATURES

  • Soft Faux Fur Lined Laptop and Tablet Pocket 
  • Interior RFID Pocket 
  • Cable Pass-Throughs from Compartment to Compartment 
  • Custom Branded Zipper Pulls 
  • Power Bank Access from Inner/Exterior pocket 


FEATURES
  • High Quality Hydrophobic Nylon Exterior backed with a water resistant inner PU shield
  • Two hidden RFID Pockets
  • Two Solar Panel / Accessory Clips
  • Interior Cable Organizers
  • Cable Pass-Throughs from Compartment to Compartment
  • Custom Branded Zipper Pulls
  • Power Bank Access from Inner/Exterior pocket



BAG SPECIFICATIONS
  • Overall bag dimensions: 20.5"x12.5"x7.5" (31cm x 52cm x 18cm)
  • Side Laptop Compartment: 19.5"x11.5"x1" (49cm x 28.5cm x 2.5cm)
  • Interior Main Compartment: 20" x 12" x 4.5" (51cm x 30.5cm x 11.5cm)
  • Interior Laptop Compartment: 10.5"x11.5"x.5" (26cm x 28.5cm x 1.25cm)
  • Interior Tablet Compartment: 8.25"x11.5"x.5" (21cm x 28cm x 1.25cm)
  • Interior Zipper Pouch: 10" x 4" (25cm x 4cm)
  • Two Interior Velcro Pouches: 7"x5.25"x1" (17cm x 13cm x 2.5cm)
  • Power Bank / Top Accessory Pocket: 7.5"x5.75"x1.5" (19cm x 14.5cm x 4cm)
  • Exterior Top Pouch: 12.5" x 10" (32cm x 25.5cm)
  • Exterior Bottom Pouch: 18.5" x 10" (47cm x 25.5cm)
  • Weight: 1.8 pounds (28.8 ounces)






Please send us your suggestions!


We are production ready!
The R&D and sampling phase are complete and we're ready to begin production!  After 18 months of working our tails off, we are ready for production.

The GoPlug Team is committed to providing the most advanced, powerful, and smartest power bank on the market.    

This is not GoPlugs first campaign.  We've been on this journey for a while.  July of 2014 GoPlug had a successful campaign of an early iteration of this product. Due to issues with manufacturing and safety of the product, Josh made the difficult decision to cancel the campaign and give those who wanted a refund their money back. Additionally, he included interest on their money of 2.5% to those backers who opted for a refund. You can read the update about the difficult decision to cancel the original project here (LINK).

GoPlug is dedicated to making a game changing quality product-- we've made mistakes, however, we're learned and grew from past failures... it won't happen again!  Josh committed not to launch another campaign until every aspect of the product was correct and production ready.  Countless hours, and a lots of personal money, have gone towards R&D-- we're ready to go!!! 

It started with an integrated system and evolved into a versatile and modular system.

Once we finalized design, we needed to select a factory to build the bag and electronics.  This wasn't an easy endeavor!  Our new factory has years of experience manufacturing similar technologies.  We wanted the best factory to build GoPlug, and I'm confident we've found them!

 We had over a dozen bag factories produce samples of GoPlug Bags.  As with the power bank, we wanted the best bag manufacturer to produce this bag.  Again, I'm confident we've found them.  They bring years of experience and expertise to GoPlug.  


Risks and challenges

Safety Risks – Merging textiles with electricity can be difficult, and safety needs to be a top priority. In order to follow all safety standards and create the best possible product, we could end up behind schedule.

Design Risks – This product is the first of its kind. We’re not reinventing the wheel… we’re inventing it! We will create the best bag in the world, using the best textile designers on the planet. This may take some time. 
Also, we may not be able to deliver the exact bag designs and electronic specifications as advertised on this project. We will try our best, and hope if anything changes, they will be improvements!

TSA Approval – Going through airport security is already difficult. We don’t want to produce a bag that will make this process more difficult. We may have to jump through some hoops to get this done right the first time.

Fulfillment – These bags will be produced in high volume overseas. We guarantee a high quality product, and if the final product off the assembly line is anything less, we will decline the order. We will demand the finest materials and product for the best price.

Acts of God – Not everything can be predicted , but this title should cover any unforeseeable snags in development.
