story:
Project Description

The project started with an innovative idea to make traffic stops safer by improving communication between motorists and law enforcement officers.  We wanted to utilize technology to assist with one of the most dangerous activities in policing.  We felt that improving communication would make traffic stops safer for law enforcement and motorists. The app enables,  

• Motorists to send key information like driver’s license and insurance to law enforcement at the push of a button 

• Law Enforcement to gain more insight into the driver before approaching the car  

• More transparency for both motorist and law enforcement  

• Reduction in tension that sometimes occurs between both motorist and law enforcement 

• Utilization of GPS based information  

• Smarter policing

The goal of the app is to better utilize technology including smart phone technology and GPS technology to connect motorists with law enforcement.  It is meant to enhance the current procedures used by law enforcement during traffic stops.  It allows the motorists to introduce themselves to the officer by volunteering who he or she is before the officer even gets out of their vehicle and in return the officer name is sent back to the motorists.  We wanted to remove some of the unknown.  This is done by allowing motorists to tell a few key points about themselves like occupation (coach, homemaker, teacher, engineer).  They can also inform the officer of any physical or development impediments that could impact interaction during the stop.  This may include things like hearing issues, bipolar, PTSD, language bearer.  Other considerations can be situations like if the motorist has a special needs child that normally travels with them that could get excited, then that can be disclosed before the officer approaches the car.  With each party knowing just a little more about the other, we hope to reduce tension and therefore make the experience safer for all parties.

 

How Does Mysmart Stop Work

Allows motorists to connect with law enforcement officer and send information about themselves to police officers as soon as the officer begins to pull them over.  

  

  • App is free download for drivers
  • Communication must be initiated by the driver using the app by pressing a button
  • Key information about the driver like driver’s license, insurance information, CHL license are sent to the officer.
  • In return, officer name is sent back to the driver.
  • Special considerations about the driver that could impact the interaction also sent. Things like Language bearer, hearing issues, PTSD, Bipolar, medical issues, are just a few.
  • This ensures that the officer has more information before approaching the vehicle.
  • Text sent to Driver’s Designated Emergency Contacts
  • Information is compressed and sent securely for fast delivery.  Takes seconds to receive information.
  • Transparency for both motorist and police

Watch our demo video: 

Why This Project

Today there have been many reported cases of mistrust between motorists and law enforcement officers.  We started by asking a simple question: What can be done to make traffic stops safer? One of the biggest obstacles in our opinion is communication.  Better communication between motorist and officers at the beginning of a traffic stop can reduce some needless tragedies.  In fact, many states have adopted legislation on how to interact with police officers during a traffic stop.  The overwhelming majority of motorists are law abiding citizens.  If they are stopped for a traffic violation, they just want to get their ticket and go on with their day and return safely to their families.  Most Law Enforcement officers are also law abiding, hard-working individuals whom have one of the most dangerous jobs around and just want to do their jobs to the best of their abilities and make it home safely to their families.  Our goal is to build something that will assist both parties.

 

Why Indiegogo

Part of the idea behind the lean startup is to prove demand, and build an app with a lean team, using proven user centric design providing the best overall experience.  We feel that Indiegogo will help build demand for the app, build and grow a strong relationship with our early supporters, and use feedback to build the product that the public demands.  The app is also a free download so funding will help speed the development and support the production cycle.

 

Who Are We?

Mysmart Stop is a product of Velocity Technology Associates, LLC. Velocity Technology Associates is a start-up technology company led by President/CEO, Ben Williams.

Ben Williams is a seasoned information technology professional.  Throughout his career, Ben has filled a number of roles including,

  • programmer,
  • systems analyst,
  • team lead,
  • project manager,
  • principal consultant,
  • vice president of business development,
  • entrepreneur,
  • Business owner,
  • President/CEO,

We are always looking for ways to better utilize technology to build really good products.  Developing apps enables us to connect with the technology trends employed by Millennials, Gen X and Gen Y while still remaining on the leading edge of technology. 

Development Status

We are currently on the 2nd beta version of the app for IOS devices.  After the first beta version of the app was completed in April’2017, we spent a fair amount of time enhancing our team for success of this app.  We also met with a number of different law enforcement departments and officers to demo the app and discuss what features they would like to see and any obstacles they saw.  Finally, our patent pending communication technology is unique and will enable us securely and quickly transfer data.  Product development timeline,

  • Jul’2016 – Idea
  • Oct’2016 – Finalized team to build the app  
  • Nov’2016 – App Blueprint Completed
  • Apr’2017 – iOS Beta Version 1 of app complete
  • Jun’2018 – iOS Beta Version 2 of app complete after gathering more feedback from Law Enforcement and the Public
  • Oct’2018 – Indiegogo Campaign Launch

 

How will the funds be used ?

  • $30,000 allows us to Productionize the IOS version of the app and develop the android version.  This includes: enhancing user interface design, finalize the back-end database and processes
  • $15,000 allows us to complete piloting of the app with a police department, including making some enhancements, quality assurance, on-going support and maintenance of the app and delivery systems, enhanced security procedures
  • $10,000 is for on-going marketing strategy to continue to grow public support and usage of the app.  
  • Funds above our goal of $55,000 will be used for the on-going maintenance and cost of keeping the app free to motorists and to add features to make the app even more appealing.

 

Risks and Challenges

At this stage in the development of the Mysmart Stop app, we are in 2nd round of Beta testing and most issues and concerns with the functionality have been addressed.  We are using crowd funding not only to raise funds to complete development but to prove that there is demand for this product so we can complete production as well as getting an understanding of public demand to help to determine future enhancements.  If law enforcement personnel fail to adopt the use of the app, broader utilization could be a problem.  However, we have already met with several law enforcement agencies to demo the app and get feedback.  The feedback has been positive.  They indicated that this has a lot of potential.  We also discussed adding some features that will make it even more attractive to law enforcement and the public.  We feel that the time is right for this.  If the project is properly funded, through marketing and word of mouth as well as through public demand, we feel that the public will help champion the cause and that utilization will grow quickly and adoption will happen county by county and state by state.  In addition, we have a law enforcement officer with over 30 years of experience on our team.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute at this time, you can still help a great deal by getting the word out about our campaign.  Please use Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and any other social media outlets to get the word out.  Indiegogo has share tools that allows you to more easily do this.  Also, please do not forget about email as well.  In addition to social media platforms, I challenge you to email it to 10 people you know.
story_txt:
Project Description
The project started with an innovative idea to make traffic stops safer by improving communication between motorists and law enforcement officers.  We wanted to utilize technology to assist with one of the most dangerous activities in policing.  We felt that improving communication would make traffic stops safer for law enforcement and motorists. The app enables,  
• Motorists to send key information like driver’s license and insurance to law enforcement at the push of a button 
• Law Enforcement to gain more insight into the driver before approaching the car  
• More transparency for both motorist and law enforcement  
• Reduction in tension that sometimes occurs between both motorist and law enforcement 
• Utilization of GPS based information  
• Smarter policing
The goal of the app is to better utilize technology including smart phone technology and GPS technology to connect motorists with law enforcement.  It is meant to enhance the current procedures used by law enforcement during traffic stops.  It allows the motorists to introduce themselves to the officer by volunteering who he or she is before the officer even gets out of their vehicle and in return the officer name is sent back to the motorists.  We wanted to remove some of the unknown.  This is done by allowing motorists to tell a few key points about themselves like occupation (coach, homemaker, teacher, engineer).  They can also inform the officer of any physical or development impediments that could impact interaction during the stop.  This may include things like hearing issues, bipolar, PTSD, language bearer.  Other considerations can be situations like if the motorist has a special needs child that normally travels with them that could get excited, then that can be disclosed before the officer approaches the car.  With each party knowing just a little more about the other, we hope to reduce tension and therefore make the experience safer for all parties.
 
How Does Mysmart Stop Work
Allows motorists to connect with law enforcement officer and send information about themselves to police officers as soon as the officer begins to pull them over.  
  
App is free download for drivers

Communication must be initiated by the driver using the app by pressing a button

Key information about the driver like driver’s license, insurance information, CHL license are sent to the officer.
In return, officer name is sent back to the driver.

Special considerations about the driver that could impact the interaction also sent. Things like Language bearer, hearing issues, PTSD, Bipolar, medical issues, are just a few.
This ensures that the officer has more information before approaching the vehicle.

Text sent to Driver’s Designated Emergency Contacts
Information is compressed and sent securely for fast delivery.  Takes seconds to receive information.

Transparency for both motorist and police
Watch our demo video: 

Why This Project
Today there have been many reported cases of mistrust between motorists and law enforcement officers.  We started by asking a simple question: What can be done to make traffic stops safer? One of the biggest obstacles in our opinion is communication.  Better communication between motorist and officers at the beginning of a traffic stop can reduce some needless tragedies.  In fact, many states have adopted legislation on how to interact with police officers during a traffic stop.  The overwhelming majority of motorists are law abiding citizens.  If they are stopped for a traffic violation, they just want to get their ticket and go on with their day and return safely to their families.  Most Law Enforcement officers are also law abiding, hard-working individuals whom have one of the most dangerous jobs around and just want to do their jobs to the best of their abilities and make it home safely to their families.  Our goal is to build something that will assist both parties.
 
Why Indiegogo
Part of the idea behind the lean startup is to prove demand, and build an app with a lean team, using proven user centric design providing the best overall experience.  We feel that Indiegogo will help build demand for the app, build and grow a strong relationship with our early supporters, and use feedback to build the product that the public demands.  The app is also a free download so funding will help speed the development and support the production cycle.
 
Who Are We?
Mysmart Stop is a product of Velocity Technology Associates, LLC. Velocity Technology Associates is a start-up technology company led by President/CEO, Ben Williams.
Ben Williams is a seasoned information technology professional.  Throughout his career, Ben has filled a number of roles including,

programmer,
systems analyst,
team lead,
project manager,
principal consultant,
vice president of business development,
entrepreneur,
Business owner,
President/CEO,

We are always looking for ways to better utilize technology to build really good products.  Developing apps enables us to connect with the technology trends employed by Millennials, Gen X and Gen Y while still remaining on the leading edge of technology. 
Development Status
We are currently on the 2nd beta version of the app for IOS devices.  After the first beta version of the app was completed in April’2017, we spent a fair amount of time enhancing our team for success of this app.  We also met with a number of different law enforcement departments and officers to demo the app and discuss what features they would like to see and any obstacles they saw.  Finally, our patent pending communication technology is unique and will enable us securely and quickly transfer data.  Product development timeline,
Jul’2016 – Idea
Oct’2016 – Finalized team to build the app  
Nov’2016 – App Blueprint Completed
Apr’2017 – iOS Beta Version 1 of app complete
Jun’2018 – iOS Beta Version 2 of app complete after gathering more feedback from Law Enforcement and the Public
Oct’2018 – Indiegogo Campaign Launch
 
How will the funds be used ? 

$30,000 allows us to Productionize the IOS version of the app and develop the android version.  This includes: enhancing user interface design, finalize the back-end database and processes
$15,000 allows us to complete piloting of the app with a police department, including making some enhancements, quality assurance, on-going support and maintenance of the app and delivery systems, enhanced security procedures
$10,000 is for on-going marketing strategy to continue to grow public support and usage of the app.  
Funds above our goal of $55,000 will be used for the on-going maintenance and cost of keeping the app free to motorists and to add features to make the app even more appealing.

 
Risks and Challenges
At this stage in the development of the Mysmart Stop app, we are in 2nd round of Beta testing and most issues and concerns with the functionality have been addressed.  We are using crowd funding not only to raise funds to complete development but to prove that there is demand for this product so we can complete production as well as getting an understanding of public demand to help to determine future enhancements.  If law enforcement personnel fail to adopt the use of the app, broader utilization could be a problem.  However, we have already met with several law enforcement agencies to demo the app and get feedback.  The feedback has been positive.  They indicated that this has a lot of potential.  We also discussed adding some features that will make it even more attractive to law enforcement and the public.  We feel that the time is right for this.  If the project is properly funded, through marketing and word of mouth as well as through public demand, we feel that the public will help champion the cause and that utilization will grow quickly and adoption will happen county by county and state by state.  In addition, we have a law enforcement officer with over 30 years of experience on our team.
 
Other Ways You Can Help
If you cannot contribute at this time, you can still help a great deal by getting the word out about our campaign.  Please use Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and any other social media outlets to get the word out.  Indiegogo has share tools that allows you to more easily do this.  Also, please do not forget about email as well.  In addition to social media platforms, I challenge you to email it to 10 people you know.

story:
Some friends and I went to a bar after a long day at school. After a drink or two, all our phones were out of power. The bar had no chargers to borrow.

Instead of going home to charge, we ordered more drinks and brainstormed how to make our own power bank that could charge all types of personal devices without being plugged into the wall. The following day we designed a prototype.

The first prototype was made with a 2-liter milk carton. The second prototype was made of a small wooden speaker that we had to reduce by 1/3. Many hours and ideas later we found a design that worked. 

Pawā Box was born.

After a few months, we successfully created the very first plastic mold. The first production batch was for 50 boxes. We showed Pawā Box to friends and family, local restaurants, bars, and businesses. The feedback we received was exceptional so now we are setting out to make more with our first large production run.

Can we count on you to help us launch?

Paal Johnsen

Entrepreneur 

                              

                              100 % delivery safety, guaranteed.  If not 100 % refund

 

 

 

 

  

  

  

    

    

   

                                                                                  

 

 


           

 

 

 

 

                         

   

                                                          TECHNICAL FAQS 

How do I charge the Pawabox

Every Pawā Box comes with its own charger that plugs into the wall or into another charger.

When the Pawabox is fully charged, do I need to remove the charger as a precaution

This product has a “full charge power protection” feature meaning that when it is fully charged or has been continuously charging for 11 hours, it will automatically stop. Removing the Pawā Box from the charger is not required. If you need to recharge the Pawā Box, simply re-load the Pawā Box on the charger.

Can I play the music stored on my mobile phone on the Pawabox

Yes, you can play music from your personal device with the Bluetooth connection.

How do I turn on the Bluetooth function?

The Bluetooth function is activated when you turn on the Pawā Box. When activated, the blue LED light will blink.

Can I change startup music on the Pawabox

Yes, you can reload your own music file through the Micro USB connection on the Pawā Box.

How do I turn on or off the Pawabox  decoration led light

Press the Pawā button for three seconds to turn on the LED decoration light. To turn off the light, press and hold the Pawā button for three seconds. Press for one second to change the color.

How do I know the Pawabox is charging my device

The charging sign will be shown on your personal devices.

                                                                              Team Members
Einar Johnsen,
Member of original set-up team for 7/11 in Norway, CEO of Global Trading Company  

Paal Johnsen
Currently studying International Business at the American University of Paris.  Have experience from Finance, trade, and the high-end jewelry industry.  contributing substantially to launching Pawabox

 

 

Richard Keys
Partner at FDR Logistics, and Co-Founder of Food & Drink Resources.  25 + years experience in culinary sales and operations worldwide


Bjorn Bratz
Industrial experience from Norway and UK. Engineer and MBA background.  Currently CEO of an investment company. 

Henrik Bratz
Degree in Economics from Sterling Scotland.  Currently sales manager in Danish software firm.
 

Harald Johnsen
CFO of Global Trading Company.  Huge experience in sourcing and reselling products from far-east to Europe.

Ole Johnsen
Just Graduated, educated in communications.

story:
Why should everyone have TheiShare Lock?

 

  • According To statistics, large number of bikes are stolen in summer, save your bikes from theft this summer by having TheiShare locks. TheiShare lock is the best lock when it comes to bike safety and it is one of the reasons we are offering THREE years warranty.

  • Bike Crash Alarm  sends alarm to emergency services and nearby riders, this feature will definitely help to save all valuable lives.

  • TheiShare Lock will donate 5% of ALL amounts raised to help those who have lost jobs due to Covid-19. Support us by buying locks or sharing this campaign on your social media(s).

 

We are excited to introduce TheiShare, this project has been our passion since last summer. We have been working on the development of IoT based platforms since 2018. We have hands-on experience building IoT locks for the mobility sector. We believe TheiShare locks to be a groundbreaking product and one that will have a major impact on our handling bikes and ride-sharing experience.

 

ENHANCING BIKE SAFETY

SAVING YOU MONEY

SHARING AND GPS TAGGING.

 

Our mission is to digitize and secure bikes.

In an era of social distancing where taking public transport is NOT recommended, we firmly believe that TheiShare lock will play a vital role in society. Currently, it is NOT possible to share bikes with your neighbours or friends in case if you share a key then they have NO idea where the bike is parked? but with TheiShare lock, bikes can digitally be shared with neighbours/friends and shared members can view the latest location of the bike. Let's share our mobility assets and help each other in the neighbourhood <3

 

Mass production is already begun!

Everyone is back to work in China :) Here is latest footage of assembling TheiShare lock. We are producing 2000 locks per day.

 

 

The platform is already released and mass production has already begun, so this project is going ahead but we are hoping we can raise additional funds through crowdfunding which will enable user to increase inventory and widen our marketing scope, but more importantly, help build a strong base of early customers (hopefully you) to be part of this journey. share ongoing feedback and ideas for the future. We plan to treat all our early backers as part of this project and involve them in all new releases and developments. We welcome you to come on board, be part of this exciting journey and enjoy immediate and ongoing benefits.   We have created a Facebook group kindly join the group if you are interested to be part of this journey. 

 

Product Overview

TheiShare offers:

✔ Keyless unlocking method.

✔ AES 128 Encryption

✔ 80 cm long and 3cm Thick Chain with nylon cover

✔ Lock Sharing: Build your own private sharing network 

✔ 115 dB Anti-Theft alarm

✔ IP55 Weatherproof 

 

We believe TheiShare lock is a groundbreaking product and one that will have a major impact on our handling bikes and ride-sharing experience.

 

ENHANCING BIKE SAFETY

SAVING YOU MONEY

SHARING AND GPS TAGGING



 

 

 

 

 

 

Secure Your bike 

 

TheiShare locks have motion sensors which triggers alarm in case of any suspicious activity. 

 





 

Fitness

Cycling metrics such as speed, distance, calories, CO2 saved emission and time are tracked automatically as soon as you unlock the bike. No need to press “start” or “stop”, Frekis App will save every ride data securely.

 

 

Sharing Network 

In this pandemic, when it is difficult to meet and exchange keys, TheiShare sharing is perfect solution, simply add your neighbours, friends or family members and they will be able to see latest location of bike and unlock the bike by scanning QR code. 

 

 

Bike Crash Alarm 

Nearby bike riders will get notification about accident. Save valueble Lives by reporting accidents to Emergency services instantly. 

 


 

 

 

Technical Specification 


Timeline 

 

 

 

 

TheiShare locks Initiative #Supportlocal

 

If you are resident of Stockholm or Eskilstuna and you have lost a job due to COVID-19, you can borrow 10 bikes with TheiShare locks for FREE for next three months from us and will help you to run your own bike-sharing business in your neighbourhood. 

We want to help those who are facing terrible economic times. If you have TheiShare locks, you can start your own bike-sharing service in your neighbourhood by simply upgrading your account to "Operator". Riders will pay to the operator directly via the app. TheiShare or Frekis app will NOT take any share in revenue however you need to pay subscription fees 90 USD / month. With this subscription, you will be able to add unlimited assets in your operator account. On-demand bike-sharing public transport is much better transport alternative than buses and trains in this pandemic.

You will provide healthy and environment-friendly transport alternative in the neighbourhood #localhero 

Due to the economic situation, we are offering 50% discount on our "operator" service we will be charging only 45 USD/month for the next three months.

 

This would be our small contribution to easing your burden. 

Read more about it here https://theishare.com/bike-share/


 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

 

We understand and acknowledge that no project comes without risks and challenges. Despite our planning, there are circumstances that may be out of our control. If we are met with these events, we promise to communicate with full transparency to you, our backers, and work to resolve all issues in a timely manner. We don't foresee any major issues as we have been producing TheiShare locks. Our local Chinese team is working closely with the factory to ensure we get exactly what we have aimed for, including quality, design, functionality, packaging, backup and supply timing. This product has been developed and tested over the last one year to ensure it's ready to be launched. In regards to the Coronavirus situation, we do not expect it to impact our timeline as production is nearly 80% complete. We will, of course, keep you updated if anything changes.

 

Meet the team 

 

TheiShare team is based in Stockholm, Sweden, together with the R&D team from Shenzhen China, software development  from Ahmedabad India. We share the know-how, as well as the passion, to build TheiShare lock as an excellent product..

More than 2 Million bikers lose their bikes every year. It’s time to say NO!

Our vision is to digitize and secure every bike.

 

Why Indiegogo? 

We chose Indiegogo to launch our project because it's full of creative people. TheiShare is one of our most exciting products and we're eager to get it into the hands of Indiegogo's early adopters and hear your feedback.

Crowdfunding allows us to work with the factory to produce the right amount of units, without dealing with high storage costs and other related expenses. Because of this, we can spend more on development & the best components while saving you money on your purchase.

Please rest assured about backing us on Indiegogo. The shipping is guaranteed and we promise to give a FULL refund if we fail to ship you TheiShare.

story:
NOTE: For the hearing impaired, a written copy of the video script is located at the bottom of the presentation.   

      

               MADE IN USA             

NOTE: The presentation text is in ARIAL BOLD  and only black to aid the visually challenged.

 

WHY?  

Changes are occurring in today’s United States population which needs to be addressed. A few of these changes are the following:

Today’s population is aging. Ten thousand people turn sixty-five years-old everyday due to the baby boomers. 

Over two-thirds (68.8%) of the United States population are overweight or obese. More than one-third (35.7%) are classified as obese.  More than 1 in 20 (6.3%) have extreme obesity.· 

Conflicts around the world and other situations cause the number of disabled individuals to increase daily. Over fifty-seven million (19%) citizens of the United States, are disabled to some degree.

Industries today do not seem interested in addressing some of these problems with affordable solutions to help the afflicted remain mobile and independent – we want to help.

                                  

Our invention, “An Independent Step” is a perfect example of the old adage, “Necessity is the mother of invention.” We needed to transport some disabled persons to the Mayo Clinic in Jacksonville, Florida. The choice was made to rent a fifteen-passenger van for the trip. Due to previous experience we were concerned about the ability of our passengers navigating the twenty-inch step height while entering and exiting the van safely and quickly.

                                                                     
Our passengers included a four-foot eleven-inch tall eighty year-old lady, her eighty-one year-old husband with two bad knees and on oxygen and an obese lady weighing over four hundred pounds. Entering fifteen-passenger vans can be challenging for anyone but very difficult or impossible for elderly, disabled or obese. Exiting the van is more difficult as most people back out blindly while holding onto the arm of the seat. Both entering and exiting the van has the potential of causing an accident.

Visiting twelve medical supply stores and researching medical catalogues produced no information on an appropriate assistance apparatus. Hours of research on the internet turned up nothing of help. I had developed in my mind the prototype we needed. The stepstool we needed would have handrails to provide stability and a weight limit of five hundred pounds minimum.

My wife and I went to a hardware store where I put together the prototype. The step worked great on the trip. Courtesy vans drivers were asking what we were using to load and unload so quickly. They also noticed my passengers exiting the van forward instead of backing out. The trip was pleasurable, safe and less stressful due to the step prototype.

At the Mayo Clinic we saw that many other people were in the same dilemma and no help in sight. Bradshaw Solutions, L.L.C. was founded with a mission to develop products to help the elderly, disabled and obese maintain or restore their independence and be more active. “An Independent Step” is our first "step” toward our mission. We have some other products in the research/prototype stage. Success of ”An  Independent Step” will determine the timeline of more innovative, helpful and affordable products.

REFERRAL BONUS

How to Participate in a Referral Contest 

When you refer your friends and neighbors to help spread the word about a campaign, many campaign owners want to reward you with special offers and gifts. That’s why you often see referral contests announced on campaign pages throughout Indiegogo. How can I be sure that my referrals count?

Simply log in to Indiegogo if you have not already, or create an account by signing up here.  Then, visit the campaign page on Indiegogo and look below the main video to share and copy your unique URL.

To show our appreciation for your gifts, we want to offer you bonus gifts for referring your friends and neighbors. Our campaign's success depends on your referrals. To qualify, make sure you are logged into your account and use Indiegogo's Share Tool.  The following prizes are only available if we meet or exceed our $77,000 campaign goal.

  Prize 1: First 100 people to refer a friend or anyone who donates $99 (or more) will receive a "Thank You" gift adjustable baseball cap with our logo. 

  Prize 2:First 50 people to bring in $999 worth of referral gifts, receive a "Thank You" gift desk analog clock with wood base. 

  Prize 3: Person bringing in the most referrals who donate $99 (or more), you will receive a "Thank You" gift of our $299 “An Independent Step” with free shipping worldwide.

  Prize 4: Person bringing in referrals contributing the largest total sum of monetary gifts will receive a "Thank You" gift of our $299 “An Independent Step” with free shipping worldwide.

USES

The following “An Independent Step” uses list shows the versatility and the list is continually evolving and growing:

·   As stated earlier “An Independent Step” 10-inch model was initially produced to help persons entering and exiting fifteen-passenger vans.

                                             

  My family doctor bought the first 10-inch “Step” sold to the public for his patients to use for stability climbing on and off the examination table.

  Therapist may have patients that during home visits use the “Step” in their therapy session to simulate stairs.

·

   MRI and X-ray units use our “Step” for safe, stable assistance for patients to move on and off the examination table.

                                  

   The 10-inch “Step” also works best for most 4-wheel drive pickups and SUVs.

·  The 5-inch model is helpful for entering regular vehicles for people which have restricted mobility related to their legs and especially the knees.

·  Mini-buses use the 5-inch model to provide assistance at the bottom of their bus steps to supply handrails and an additional last step. For some passengers the last bus step is too high and needs our “Step” to compensate thus making the loading and unloading process easier and safer.

·  Mechanics buy 10-inch models to stand on while working under the hood of 4-wheel drive and other over-sized vehicles.

·  When using the “Step” for entering and exiting the today's higher beds, the model used depends on the individual and which size fits the particular situation.

·  Obese individuals are having problems sitting back into lift chairs. Sitting on the edge of the chair, some break the arms of the lift chair trying to push their bottom back further into the seat. Using the “Step” one sits on the chair, raise their legs to place the “Step” under their feet and push on the “Step” with their legs to push back into the chair.

                              

     I use my “Step” to wash my car. It is much safer than opening the door and standing on the running board while holding on for dear life.

·  Boats use the step to help people navigate boarding and exiting their craft.

·  RVs and campers use the “Step” for venues created by greater step height when leveling their vehicles.

·                                                    

   My wife and I love to use “An Independent Step” to work and store items on shelves.

·  With the handrails the “Step” provide a stable platform for changing light bulbs as well as other chores.

·  My wife recently discovered the "Step” works great as a gardening seat and the handrails help with standing up when finished.

·  TOMORROW?

What new use can you find? Contact us and we will add it to our list. The uses are only limited by your creativity although always error on the side of safety with your creativity as “An Independent Step” may not be the proper tool in all situations.

LOOK FOR

Every year about 33 million Americans are injured badly enough to require medical care. In every age group, the most common cause of non-fatal injuries is falling down.

Most falling injuries (including slip and fall injuries) result in minor cuts and bruises, but sometimes the injuries can be very serious. Catastrophic injuries like head trauma or broken hips can mean living with a permanent, debilitating condition that impacts every part of your life for the rest of your life.

                                

Stepstools pose a classic fall risk. In fact, over 1 million FOLDING stepstools have recently been recalled because of safety issues that resulted in two back injuries and one fractured leg.

NOTE: “An Independent Step” has no folding parts!

Falls from stepstools can be caused by structural or design flaws (e.g., the stool collapses) or by the person using the stool losing their balance. 

 NOTE: “An Independent Step” has a robust structure and has two handrails to provide more assistance with balance.

There’s nothing consumers can do directly about structural or design flaws, but we can help prevent falls from balance loss by choosing and using wisely. 

NOTE: Buy “An Independent Step” to avoid these flaws.

When buying a stepstool, make sure that –

• The legs are sturdy.

• The base is wider than the top.

• There is a handrail which extends above the top step.

• The steps are deep enough to fit your feet.

.NOTE: “An Independent Step” has all the above!

When using a step stool, make sure that –

• It is tall enough.

• It is strong enough (look at the label).

• It is placed firmly on an even surface.

• It is locked.  NOT “An Independent Step" problem  

                                    

When using your stepstool safely,

• You climb facing the steps.

• You do not stretch or lean forward.

• You only reach for items that are directly in front of you.

• You try to have someone nearby in case of emergency.

You should be able to stand on the top step and still have a firm grasp on the handrail. Don’t become a statistic! Use and choose wisely.

“An Independent Step” fulfills all these requirements and MUCH MORE.

  • Reach $1,000,000 S-T-R-E-T-C-H goal, all gifters of $99 or more may purchase one $299  “An Independent Step” at the discounted price of $149 which is a 50% discounted price. (TOTAL SAVINGS $149) as a “THANK YOU” gift.

A. ALL shipping related to "Thank You" gifts up to and including $249 gift is free worldwide. “Steps” shipped in the United States are also free of charge shipping. Q. Do I need to sign up for PayPal to donate?                                                           A. No! Any standard credit or debit card can be used through the PayPal gateway. Simply select the choice for people who do not have a PayPal account and enter your credit card information as you normally would.

Q. Do I pay any fees for gifting?                                                                                  A.  No! Any fees charged by Indiegogo and PayPal are taken out of your campaign gift.

Q. What is the anticipated retail cost of “An Independent Step”?                        A. “An Independent Step” will retail for $299 initially. In the future we plan to adjust the price when we buy in large enough quantities to receive discounts on raw materials. 

Q. Does “An Independent Step” come with a warranty?                                  A.Yes! We offer a one-year replacement warranty on all our products if failure due to workmanship. 

WHICH MODEL?

“An Independent Step” has six models, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 and 10 inch platform heights. The number represents the height from the surface to the top of the “Step” platform. The best method is to measure this ground to platform top  and divide this number in half and that determines which “An Independent Step” model needed. (Example: You take the measurement described above and it is 16 inches. The 8-inch model would be my suggestion as the 16 inches is reduced to 2 doable 8-inch steps.) NOTE: This platform height should also be no more than the height the main user can easily achieve. Steps at home are normally 8 inches tall so you can use a regular step to analyze the abilities of the potential users.

Some venues do not fit my method above. The mini-buses and tour buses make use of the 5-inch “step” to shorten the last step while adding stability with the handrails during exiting and entering. For example my mother required a 5 inch step to get in her Crown Victoria due to the lack of flexibility in her knees. One 90 year-old gentlemen bought a 5 inch step to get in and out of his sunken living room (remember those) which was an 8 inch step and he could not achieve safely. If unsure about model needed, contact me for assistance. We strive to sell you the most appropriate model for end user.

Recently the necessity for a two-step model has become apparent. A church has a higher van with a first step of 23.5 inches. I will complete this two-step prototype after this crowdfunding is completed. Should a two-step be needed currently you nest a 5 and 10 inch model to navigate 15 inches if needed.

Bradshaw Solutions, L.L.C.  Mission Statement

Bradshaw Solutions strives to enable everyone to live with dignity, while maintaining safety and more independence as long as possible.

SCRIPT - VIDEO

My name is Stephen Bradshaw, President and founder of Bradshaw Solutions, L.L.C. There is a large and growing number of elderly, disabled, and obese people in our communities. These somewhat immobile persons struggle to get into vehicles such as church vans and other situations requiring a step.  They want to participate in activities, but because of their physical disabilities it has become unsafe, extremely difficult or impossible for them to enter or exit a van and join their friends. This can be problematic, especially if these individuals are trying to get to medical facilities for treatments or checkups, and preventing them from getting services they need. Today’s stepstools do not offer the stability or weight limits required for today’s population. Typical stepstools are not sturdy, creating a potential for an accidental injury. 

We would like to use this opportunity to show our solution, a stepstool which weighs only sixteen pounds with handrails and a five hundred weight limit, “An Independent Step.” Our product is a totally unique and innovative stepstool. “An Independent Step” is so unique and innovative that nothing even remotely similar can be found on the Internet. Our innovations are the greatest improvements on stepstools since a fourth leg was added to the three leg model.

What makes “An Independent Step” different from other steps in the marketplace? This step composition of aluminum results in “An Independent Step” amazingly weighing only sixteen pounds making handling manageable by nearly everyone. The use of aluminum and the construction design result in a robust weight limit of five hundred pounds. The standard weight limit for most stepstools is two hundred fifty pounds or less.

Our step is produced totally of aluminum. The worry of UV deterioration of the plastic versions is eliminated totally. Uniquely our step has two handrails providing added stability for the user. These handrails are also removable from the base to make storage and travel much easier.

“An Independent Step” uses runners instead of legs. The runners provide eight times the surface area platform to ground contact allowing our step to be used in dirt, grass, or sand without sinking into the surface. The runners extending outside the platform increase forward and backward stability. Runners are also on the edge of the side of the platform to supply more right and left stability.

The three years of developing our product, “An Independent Step”, has been worthwhile because it helps restore people’s independence in their daily activities. Through the years our bodies change in ways that may restrict our activities due to development of disabilities great and small. This restriction of activities may ultimately result in obesity and loss of the feeling of independence.

You find yourself dependent on others for the smallest tasks such as entering a vehicle to go to the doctor or some other venue. Some doctors have concluded people may break their hip while straining to enter high ground clearance vehicles or other situations. The break may proceed the fall due to the straining to perform a task. We all know someone who needs and would benefit from “An Independent Step.” This person may be in your family or not. It could be your parents, grandparents, or yourself. 

An Independent Step” is not just for high ground clearance vehicles. Often new step uses are found by our customers such as getting into today’s higher beds or reaching items on shelves. 

We are proud of our product and now are educating the world to the need, existence and usage of this innovative invention, “An Independent Step.” Join us on the momentous and rewarding journey of sustaining or returning independence to everyone.

“We not only stand behind our step”

Then stand up on the step and say,

“We stand on it.”

If you would like to join our family in helping the world regain independence, click the “Contribute” button. Thank you for your time.


             MADE IN THE USA

        HELP MAKE IT HAPPEN            WELCOME TO THE JOURNEY

developed and in limited production. We currently have a "patent pending" on "An Independent Step". Part of the funds will be used to get the full "patent". This campaign is raising funds to
increase production capacity. Increased production will be accomplished with a
larger facility, more equipment and training of new employees. The more we
raise, the sooner we can meet the needs of everyone. “Thank You” gifts you receive for your funding gifts are listed in the right column. Referral of friends and neighbors will help greatly and you could win prizes. 
Q.
What comes in “An Independent Step”?                                                                  A. “An Independent Step Includes: 

Complete
     step platform of your desired height
Two
     standard height handrails
“An
     Independent Step” Owner’s Manual
                          Q. What are the stretch goals? 
A. The more gifts we raise, the more ”Thank You” stretch goal gifts given in return. 


Reach $150,000 S-T-R- E- -T- C- H goal, all gifters of $99 or
     more will receive “An Independent Step” stainless steel thermal mug as a “THANK YOU" gift.


Reach $500,000 S-T-R-E-T-C-H goal, all gifters of $99 or
     more will receive “An Independent Step” adjustable baseball cap as a “THANK YOU” gift. 


Reach $750,000 S-T-R-E-T-C-H goal, all gifters of $99 or more may purchase
     one $299  “An
     Independent Step” at the discounted price of $209 which is a 30% discounted
     price. (TOTAL SAVINGS $90) as a “THANK
     YOU” gift. 

Reach
     $1,000,000 S-T-R-E-T-C-H goal,
     all gifters of $99 or more may purchase one $299  “An Independent Step”
     at the discounted price of $149 which is a 50% discounted price. (TOTAL
     SAVINGS $149) as a “THANK YOU” gift. 
More S-T-R-E-T-C-H
     goals will be added if necessary. ( A GOOD problem) 

Q.
What are the shipping costs? Is International Shipping an option?
A. ALL shipping related
to "Thank You" gifts up to and including $249 gift is free worldwide. “Steps” shipped in the United States are
also free of charge shipping. We are
happy to ship internationally however you will be billed for shipping cost and payment must be made before shipment. Contact us for details.
Q. Do
I need to sign up for PayPal to donate?                                                           A. No! Any standard credit or debit
card can be used through the PayPal gateway. Simply select the choice for
people who do not have a PayPal account and enter your credit card information
as you normally would.
Q. Do
I pay any fees for gifting?                                                                                  A.  No! Any fees charged by Indiegogo and PayPal are taken out of your campaign gift.
Q.
What is the anticipated retail cost of “An Independent Step”?                        A. “An Independent Step” will retail for $299 initially. In
the future we plan to adjust the price when we buy in large enough quantities
to receive discounts on raw materials. 
Q.
Does “An Independent Step” come with a warranty?                                  A.Yes!
We offer a one-year replacement warranty on all our products if failure due to
workmanship. 
WHICH MODEL?
“An
Independent Step” has six models, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 and 10 inch platform heights.
The number represents the height from the surface to the top
of the “Step” platform. The best method is to measure this ground to platform top  and divide this number in half and that determines which “An
Independent Step” model needed. (Example: You take the measurement described
above and it is 16 inches. The 8-inch model would be my suggestion as the 16 inches
is reduced to 2 doable 8-inch steps.) NOTE:
This platform height should also be no more than the height the main user can
easily achieve. Steps at home are normally 8 inches tall so you can use a
regular step to analyze the abilities of the potential users.
Some
venues do not fit my method above. The mini-buses and tour buses make use of
the 5-inch “step” to shorten the last step while adding stability with the
handrails during exiting and entering. For example my mother required a 5 inch
step to get in her Crown Victoria due to the lack of flexibility in her knees.
One 90 year-old gentlemen bought a 5 inch step to get in and out of his sunken
living room (remember those) which was an 8 inch step and he could not achieve
safely. If unsure about model needed, contact me for assistance. We strive to
sell you the most appropriate model for end user.
Recently
the necessity for a two-step model has become apparent. A church has a higher van
with a first step of 23.5 inches. I will complete this two-step prototype after
this crowdfunding is completed. Should a two-step be needed currently you nest
a 5 and 10 inch model to navigate 15 inches if needed.


TESTIMONIALS....
...from Independent Step customers
"If
you need "An Independent Step", it is truly priceless."
- Pastor Tony
“I
have been attending the Med Trade Show for twenty-eight years and this is the
simplest, most innovative and most needed product I have ever seen!”        - Med Trade Show Attendee  
“As a
medical office, we have found “An Independent Step” to be an extremely durable
and useful device in helping us care for patients. The handles on “An
Independent Step” provide ease for patients who have disabilities and/or
limitations that make it hard for them to get onto the exam table without help.”                                                                                                                                     – Hildebran
Medical Center (Purchased the first “An Independent Step”)
With the step, I can ride in the church van
again."
- Harold S.
"I
wish "An Independent Step" had been available when my aunt came to
visit. We used a concrete block."
- Anonymous attendee to the Edison Project competition
"The
"Step" would help me climb in and out of my boyfriend's high pickup
while maintaining my dignity."
- Anonymous waitress
"An
Independent Step" has potential use for everyone. I can foresee every
extended family utilizing "An Independent Step" regularly. The
finished product requires no special handling or environmental control and can
be shipped easily anywhere."
- Stephen Bradshaw
  President of Bradshaw Solutions, L.L.C.  
MISSION
Bradshaw
Solutions, L.L.C. 
Mission Statement
The
mission of Bradshaw Solutions, L.L.C. is
to develop and manufacture innovative,
quality, and affordable products to
furnish assistance to everyone while
fulfilling necessities for some to live a more independent life. Bradshaw
Solutions strives to enable everyone to live
with dignity, while maintaining safety and more independence as long as possible.
SUPPORTERS
We would like to "thank" everyone that has supported us in this important journey to return the feeling of being alive by returning independence.
Catawba Valley Community College                                                                                      Jeff Neuville - Director of Small Business Center                                                       Debbie Sawyer - Assistant                                                                                                 Maggie Braum = Business Instructor, Motivator                                                    (These three people are friends who supplied knowledge, advice, and moral support.)     
Staff of Manufacturing Solutions in Newton, NC
Video (Thanks! Great job gentlemen)                                                                                 D Kirby Photography of Lenoir, NC                                                                                R Thomas Photography of Hickory, NC       
Photography Participants                                                                                                     Pastor Alan Barlow of Zion Hill Baptist Church in Lawndale, NC                             Loretta and Dana Keys (Neighbors and good friends)          
Social Media Management - Jackson Group in Hickory, NC
Rita Neill - sounding board and long-time friend          
Machinists                                                                                                                              John Lowman                                                                                                                      Ron Lail
SCRIPT - VIDEO


My name is Stephen
Bradshaw, President and founder of Bradshaw Solutions, L.L.C. There is a large and growing number of
elderly, disabled, and obese people in our communities. These somewhat immobile persons struggle to get into vehicles
such as church vans and other situations
requiring a step.  They want to participate in activities, but because of
their physical disabilities it has become unsafe, extremely difficult or
impossible for them to enter or exit a van and join their friends. This can be problematic,
especially if these individuals are trying to get to medical facilities for
treatments or checkups, and preventing them from getting services they need. Today’s
stepstools do not offer the stability or weight limits required for today’s
population. Typical stepstools are not sturdy, creating a potential for
an accidental injury.  
We
would like to use this opportunity to show our solution, a stepstool which
weighs only sixteen pounds with handrails and a five hundred weight limit, “An
Independent Step.” Our product is a totally unique and innovative stepstool.
“An Independent Step” is so unique and innovative that nothing even remotely
similar can be found on the Internet. Our innovations are the greatest
improvements on stepstools since a fourth leg was added to the three leg model.
What
makes “An Independent Step” different from other steps in the marketplace? This step composition of aluminum
results in “An Independent Step” amazingly weighing only sixteen pounds making
handling manageable by nearly everyone. The use of aluminum and the
construction design result in a robust weight limit of five hundred pounds. The
standard weight limit for most stepstools is two hundred fifty pounds or less.
Our step is produced totally of aluminum. The
worry of UV deterioration of the plastic versions is eliminated totally. Uniquely
our step has two handrails providing added stability for the user. These
handrails are also removable from the base to make storage and travel much
easier. 
“An Independent Step” uses runners instead of
legs. The runners provide eight times
the surface area platform to ground contact allowing our step to be used in
dirt, grass, or sand without sinking into the surface. The runners extending
outside the platform increase forward and backward stability. Runners are also on
the edge of the side of the platform to supply more right and left stability.
The
three years of developing our product, “An Independent Step”, has been worthwhile
because it helps restore people’s independence in their daily activities.
Through the years our bodies change in ways that may restrict our activities
due to development of disabilities great and small. This restriction of
activities may ultimately result in obesity and loss of the feeling of
independence. 
You
find yourself dependent on others for the smallest tasks such as entering a
vehicle to go to the doctor or some other venue. Some doctors have concluded
people may break their hip while straining to enter high ground clearance
vehicles or other situations. The break may proceed the fall due to the straining
to perform a task. We all know someone who needs and would benefit from “An
Independent Step.” This person may be in your family or not. It could be your
parents, grandparents, or yourself.  
An
Independent Step” is not just for high ground clearance vehicles. Often new
step uses are found by our customers such as getting into today’s higher beds
or reaching items on shelves.  
We are
proud of our product and now are educating the world to the need, existence and
usage of this innovative invention, “An Independent Step.” Join us on the
momentous and rewarding journey of sustaining or returning independence to
everyone.
“We not only stand behind our step” 
Then stand up on the step and say,
“We stand on it.” 
If you would like to join our family in
helping the world regain independence, click the “Contribute” button. Thank you
for your time.
             MADE IN THE USA
        HELP MAKE IT HAPPEN            WELCOME TO THE JOURNEY

story:
How Coordy works

Coordy lets you send a pre-written message that asks for help to 1-3 pre-saved phone numbers, by just pressing a button. In addition, the text message contains a Google Maps-link to your exact location.

If an emergency were to happen where you can't talk or type out a whole message, this can be useful, and even vital in certain situations.

Make a change

The money will be used for development of the application. Our goal is to expand to other mobile platforms too.

Since Coordy is free, it has no income, and development of the product costs a lot of money. Please help us make a difference by contributing!

Any contribution will be appreciated. Thank you so much!

story:
RapidChargerDuo, a world's fastest gadget devices in Car Charger or at Home Charger


As fast as 15 minutes for a decent smartphone. A charger that you must have with you all the time.

JUST INCREDIBLE!
  • Just use your existing USB charging cables to connect to RapidChargerDuo
  • Comes with LED to show whether it is connected properly
  • Full speed charging with low power consumption
  • Using high quality microchips components with built-in fail-safes
  • Never over power the charging device
  • With a unique dual-circuit protection system that prevents over voltage, overheating and short circuits.
  • Built with fireproof material
  • 1 year warranty










If our campaign reach and surpass the amount that we need, we will give a special additional colours for our beloved contributors to choose their desired colour.

Risks and Challenges

Rapid Charger Duo faces some risk in the beginning of design as our initial cost escalating, but we managed to put in under control, thanks to our solid team and also engineers from our China factory. Have been in this field for a long time, really help us manoeuvre this project smoothly. 


DELIVERY WILL BE MADE AS EARLY AS MAY


We really hope this campaign will be successful, same as our past products, thanks to all contributors.

PLEASE SHARE OUR CAMPAIGN TO ALL OF YOUR FRIENDS AND FAMILY. LIKE US THROUGH FACEBOOK AND HASHTAG RAPIDCDUO!
