story:
Mystand  is simple, necessary, stylish and personal!



About the project

MyStand  is a simple and elegant custom phone or tablet stand, with a picture of your choice digitally printed on it. Whether it is about watching a video or talking to someone via speakerphone, MyStand offers a stable base that enables users to make the most out of their devices. MyStand  is more than just a stand,  it is an everyday reminder of what we love and cherish.

A perfect birthday or holiday gift


We are a team of awarded designers named mydezigner. For more info about us and our work please visit www.mydezigner.co.uk

Our goal is to purchase the necessary  equipment (lasercut machine, uv flatbed printer) for our studio so that we can manufacture MyStand ourselves thus reducing the production cost.

Design Concept

The basic principles behind the final design of  MyStand  were:
- Create a stable stand for all uses
- A stand easy to re-assemble and easy to trasnport

- Offer the possibility to customize MyStand so that it has a personal feeling

How it is made

MyStand  is created by 2 acrylic pieces of 0.20'' thickness wich are precisely laser cut to adjust and interlock perfectly. The acrylic pieces are transparent and form an elegant and classy stand. The design is internationnaly patented for us by the Industrial Property Organisation.




MyStand comes in 2 sizes. This refers to the main back item.

·  Size 1, which is suitable for phones, smartphones, iphones and small e-book readers is 8x13cm (3,15x 5,12 inches).

·  Size 2, which is suitable for tables and ipads is 10x15cm (4 x 6 inches).



For the customized MyStand you have to send us a picture of your choice,  which should have a Length/Height proportion of 0.67. More specifically: the image for size 1 is 8x13cm (3.15x 5.12 inches) and   the image for size 2 is 10x15cm (4 x 6 inches).

__________________________________________________________________________

More than a stand, we wanted to offer the possibility to personalize it by adding the picture of your choice on it. The result is a stand that turns to a picture frame of our beloved ones or our preferable vacation spots.


What We Need & What You Get

Our current goal is $2.000, which will cover the cost of purchacing our lasercut machine ($1.000).  Initially we created several prototypes in order to check that MyStand works exactly like we want it. The following step was placing small orders to companies that posses a lasercut and  print machine, in an attempt to put our product to the market. Our goal now is to further lower the production cost for MyStand by purchacing our own lasercut machine.

In addition, the money will cover the cost and shipping of your rewards, paying Indiegogo and PayPal fees.  Any additional funds will go towards laserprint and promotional costs.

By contributing to our campaign you will be helping us boost our production line. However this is not the only way you can help us. As you see we are running a flexible campaign. Even if we don’t manage to assemble the total amount required for purchasing our machine, with your help we will be able to place a big order to our suppliers which will lower the production cost. On the other hand, if we manage to exceed our initial goal, you will help us go one step further and continue to phase 2, which is to further equip our studio with a digital print machine, so that we can do all the production phases ourselves! This is our ultimate goal! We dream big! Help us bring our vision to life!

Have a look at our list of perks to see all of the super cool things you’ll get if you decide to help us with our campaign!





The Impact

Our team has been working for more than a year, combining ideas and imagination with hard work and extensive prototype testing, so that we could create a beautiful product.
As you are helping us achieve our dream of growing this company, you are also joining us to the next phase! With your support we will be able to experiment with new shapes and materials, and maybe even create new versions of MyStand. You have a chance to be part of this creative process! And since we have already been producing and Shipping MyStand  throughout the world, we can assure you that we will be able to complete our promice and send you your very own version of MyStand !


Who we are

We are a team of awarded designers named mydezigner. For more info about us and our work please visit www.mydezigner.co.uk

Members of our team designed, produced and finally launched this very project. Christina, Anna and Manolis.

If you want to learn more about us, please visit www.mydezigner.com

You can also join us on our Facebook page www.facebook.com/Mydezigner

For "My-Stand" project visit: https://www.facebook.com/mystand.gr


Risks & Challenges

In this past year we have put a lot of work into the design process and we have created several prototypes in order to test our products. This way we were able to create the final version of MyStand. Furthermore, since we have started putting our product to the market, we have already established our network of suppliers and manufacturers.

For these reasons we believe that even if we do not manage to reach our funding goal, the risks associated with the manufacturing and shipping process are practically none and we will be able to complete the orders through our suppliers.

We are committed to shipping your perks to you at the end of the campaign.


Frequently Asked Questions

WHAT IS MyStand MADE OF?

The plain version of MyStand is made of 2 acrylic pieces which are precisely lasercut to adjust and interlock perfectly, thus forming a stable stand. So far we have 01 basic acrylic color which is “crystal clear”.

WHAT ARE THE DIMENSIONS OF MyStand?

MyStand comes in 2 sizes. This refers to the main back item.
·  Size 1, which is suitable for phones, smartphones, iphones and small e-book readers, is 8x13cm (3,15x 5,12 inches).
·  Size 2, which is suitable for tablets and ipads, is 10x15cm (4 x 6 inches).

The pictures for the customized MyStand  should therefore have a Length/Height proportion of 0.67. More specifically:
·  the image for size 1 is 8x13cm (3.15x 5.12 inches) and

·  the image for size 2 is 10x15cm (4 x 6 inches).

WILL IT WORK FOR MY PHONE/ TABLET?

Yes it will! MyStand comes in 2 sizes, one designed for phones and the other for tablets. Your device can be placed either on vertical or horizontal orientation, depending on the way you wish to use your device.

I ORDERED A CUSTOMIZED MyStand. WHAT NEXT?

In order to have a customized MyStand  (YourStand!) all you have to do is send us the picture of your choise at info@dezigner.gr  with the following subject: MyStand-Indiegogo-custom.

For further info about the image specifications please read the following FAQ

WHAT IS THE IMAGE SIZE FOR EVERY TYPE OF MyStand?

The images must be of vertical orientation. The images proportions (length / height) should be 10/15 (0.67).  In case there is a slight difference regarding the proportions, the image will be adjusted by us through Photoshop. Finally each image should be in good quality (starting from 300 kb but no more than 2mb) and in jpeg format, as this will produce the best detailed result.

I WANT TO CHOOSE AN IMAGE FROM YOUR STANDARD COLLECTION

All you have to do is send us the picture number from the samples listed in our collection (from n. 02-12) at info@dezigner.gr  with the following subject: MyStand-Indiegogo-standard. Remember, n. 01 is the clear transparent acrylic version, very elegant and classy though!

HOW MUCH IS THE SHIPPING COST FOR MyStand?

The shipping cost is 3.00$ for shipping worldwide + 1.00$ for any extra item and +5.00$ in case you desire registered shipping. Please choose the registered shipping perk if you wish so. You will receive an envelope which will contain your own MyStand inside its origami case.


Have a question? If the info above doesn't help, you can ask our team directly, through this site.


Other Ways You Can Help

Are you a designer, a reseller, a distributor, a journalist or you want to promote your company/ brand and you thought of some partnership we could put in place? Please send us an email at info@dezigner.gr. We will be happy to discuss your ideas.

Please help us spread the word! Share our campaign with your friends, like our facebook page and spread the word!

https://www.facebook.com/mystand.gr

http://www.mystand.gr

Thank you for your support !
story_txt:
Mystand  is simple, necessary, stylish and personal!
About the project



MyStand  is
a simple and elegant custom phone or tablet stand, with a picture of your
choice digitally printed on it. Whether it is about watching a video or talking
to someone via speakerphone, MyStand offers a stable base that enables users to
make the most out of their devices. MyStand 
is more than just a stand,  it is an
everyday reminder of what we love and cherish.
A perfect birthday or holiday gift

We are a team of awarded designers named mydezigner. For more info about us and our work please visit www.mydezigner.co.ukOur goal is to purchase the necessary  equipment (lasercut machine, uv flatbed printer) for our studio so that we can manufacture MyStand ourselves thus reducing the production cost. 
Design Concept
 The basic principles behind the final design of  MyStand  were:- Create a stable stand for all uses- A stand easy to re-assemble and easy to trasnport- Offer the possibility to customize MyStand so that it has a personal feeling
How it is made

MyStand  is created by 2 acrylic pieces of 0.20'' thickness wich are precisely laser cut to adjust and interlock perfectly. The acrylic pieces are transparent and form an elegant and classy stand. The design is internationnaly patented for us by the Industrial Property Organisation.





MyStand
comes in 2 sizes. This refers to the main back item. 
· 
Size
1, which is suitable for phones, smartphones, iphones and small e-book readers
is 8x13cm (3,15x 5,12 inches). 
· 
Size
2, which is suitable for tables and ipads is 10x15cm (4 x 6 inches).




For the customized MyStand you have to send us a picture of your choice,  which should have a Length/Height proportion
of 0.67. More specifically: the
image for size 1 is 8x13cm (3.15x 5.12 inches) and  

the
image for size 2 is 10x15cm (4 x 6
inches). __________________________________________________________________________More than a stand, we wanted to offer the possibility to personalize 
it by adding the picture of your choice on it. The result is a stand that
 turns to a picture frame of our beloved ones or our preferable vacation
 spots.


  What We Need & What You Get 
Our current
goal is $2.000, which will cover the cost of purchacing our lasercut machine ($1.000).  Initially we created several prototypes in order to
check that MyStand works exactly like we want it. The following step was
placing small orders to companies that posses a lasercut and 
print machine, in an attempt to put our product to the market. Our goal now is to further lower the production cost for MyStand by purchacing our own lasercut machine.
In addition, the money will cover the cost and shipping of your rewards, paying
Indiegogo and PayPal fees.  Any additional funds will go towards
laserprint and promotional costs.
By contributing to our campaign you will be helping us
boost our production line. However this is not the only way you can help us. As
you see we are running a flexible campaign. Even if we don’t manage to assemble
the total amount required for purchasing our machine, with your help we will be
able to place a big order to our suppliers which will lower the production
cost. On the other hand, if we manage to exceed our initial goal, you will help
us go one step further and continue to phase 2, which is to further equip our
studio with a digital print machine, so that we can do all the production
phases ourselves! This is our ultimate goal! We dream big! Help us bring our
vision to life!
Have a look
at our list of perks to see all of the super cool things you’ll get if you
decide to help us with our campaign!




    The Impact Our team has been working for more than a year,
combining ideas and imagination with hard work and extensive prototype testing,
so that we could create a beautiful product. 
As you are helping us achieve our dream of growing this company, you are also
joining us to the next phase! With your support we will be able to experiment
with new shapes and materials, and maybe even create new versions of MyStand. You
have a chance to be part of this creative process! And since we have already
been producing and Shipping MyStand  throughout the world, we can assure you
that we will be able to complete our promice and send you your very own version
of MyStand !


Who we are
 We are a team of awarded designers named mydezigner. For more info about us and our work please visit www.mydezigner.co.uk
Members of our 
team designed, produced and finally launched this very project. Christina, Anna and Manolis.
If you want to learn more about us, please visit www.mydezigner.com
You can also join us on our Facebook page www.facebook.com/Mydezigner
For "My-Stand" project visit: https://www.facebook.com/mystand.gr

    Risks & Challenges
In this past year we have put a lot of work
into the design process and we have created several prototypes in order to test our
products. This way we were able to create the final version of MyStand.
Furthermore, since we have started putting our product to the market, we have
already established our network of suppliers and manufacturers.
For these reasons we believe that even if we do not manage to reach our funding goal, the risks associated with the
manufacturing and shipping process are practically none and we will be able to
complete the orders through our suppliers.

We
are committed to shipping your perks to you at the end of the campaign.
Frequently Asked Questions
WHAT IS MyStand MADE OF?

acrylic pieces which
are precisely lasercut to adjust and interlock perfectly, thus forming a stable

story:
Lifecase doubles your MacBook's battery life instantly with the press of a button. We designed Lifecase exclusively for the MacBook Pro, and MacBook Pro Retina. Lifecase is thin, portable and incorporates high strength aluminum in its construction. We have models for the MacBook Pro and MacBook Pro Retina. Lifecase is 5mm thick for the 13" MacBook Pro, 15" MacBook Pro and the 13" MacBook Pro Retina. The 15" MacBook Pro Retina model is slightly thicker, but still only 9mm thick!


Simple Two Piece Design

Lifecase incorporates a simple two piece design. Allowing you to quickly attach and detach Lifecase from your computer. 

Lifecase comes with a high performance charger, allowing you to charge your computer and case simultaneously. This means you only need one charger, and even with double the battery it'll take the same amount of time to charge as your computer does now. 



Built in Battery Level Indicator

Lifecase has a built in battery level indicator, letting you know when it's charged and ready to go. On the same side, LIfecase also comes with a built in power switch, letting you use the extra battery when you need it!

Lifecase is made with the same type of high performance batteries that are already inside your MacBook. Insuring that your Lifecase lasts just as long, if not longer than your MacBook. Lifecase can also prolong the life of your MacBook batteries, by extending the time needed between charges. 


Anodized Aluminum Construction 

Lifecase is anodized, making it extremely durable just like your MacBook. It also gives us the unique ability to dye Lifecase in virtually any color and won't wear off like paint would. Meaning you can fit Lifecase to your own personality. The best part is on Indiegogo, backers will be able to decide which colors make it to production. 

Indiegogo Perks

16gb Flash Drive - $20


8Ah Power Bank - $40
Charge your iPhone up to 4x and your iPad 1x
Black and red available, specify which at checkout.

OneX T-Shirt (small,medium, large, extra large)  - $30
Specify which at checkout. 

Water Resistant Neoprene Laptop Case - $35
Comes in 13" and 15" sizes, specify which at checkout.


Our Calendar 

Here is our schedule from campaign launch to delivery. OnexGlobal has prioritized giving you top quality as well as getting the product to you on time. We've also factored in some extra time to allow for any unforeseen challenges/delays. We have already created a working model of Lifecase and have the manufactures set up, so we feel very confident in getting Lifecase to you on, or before our scheduled delivery date in April. 






OneX Global was founded by Zachary Fowler and Clay Reynolds in February of 2014 with the mission to create the first battery backup case for MacBooks. We were personally fed up with the battery life of our own laptops, as well as not having any kind of extended power solution besides a power adapter. The battery life just wasn't enough, we needed extra juice to get through our day. 

To our surprise, we discovered nothing was on the market to effectively increase the battery life of MacBooks. We wanted to make a product that increased battery life and was easy to use, so we set out to do just that.

Everyone's been there, whether you're on a plane, in class, a business meeting, or just a long day - We've all had times where we needed the extra life!

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
A great app that appeals to hundreds of million people around the world. 

If you like running (or just walking) while you are on business or on a city trip, you have probably been in a situation where you did not know which way to go from your hotel or guest house. So you ended up running or strolling in uninteresting places while the most beautiful sites were just a street away.

 

Runnin’City is a smartphone app that GPS guides you through over 100 cities around the world. In front of the main points of interest (for example the cathedral, an interesting bridge, a noteworthy museum, etc.), Runnin’City reads 30 seconds of touristic information, like an audioguide. With Runnin’City, you run, you discover, your learn, you “Run Smart”. 

 

Who are we? 

Both the founders are company directors with over 20 years of experience who extensively travel world-wide.

Christophe Minodier, 42, French, has turned around Recaro France, ran Red Castle International, & more recently expanded sales of toy manufacturer Smoby. Christophe holds a management degree from Reims Business School. He has 2 children & lives in Lyon. He is an « extreme runner ».

Olivier Lebleu , 45, Belgian, has managed several marketing departments (REDNET, Lasercom) & operating companies in Europe before creating & selling Nirva Software, a European software vendor & cloud operator. Olivier holds a Master in Management from Grenoble Business School & an MBA from the Henley Management College. He has 3 children & lives in Lyon. 

Christophe and Olivier have been joined by a 7-strong team of specialist app developers, as well as tourism and marketing experts to develop the app, its content, and promote it.

Why is this campaign important to us? 

This campaign is extremely important to us. 

There are over 400 million runners and 1.4 billion tourists world-wide. 

83% of the 1000+ people we surveyed world-wide found the idea great and are interested in running (or walking) with Runnin’City. 

We want to rapidly tell millions of them about Runnin’City and how it will make their running and business or touristic experiences more enjoyable, healthier and safer. 

To do this, we need: 

  • To develop the app for Android (it is currently available for iPhone) to reach over 70% of Smartphone users in the world. 
  • To feature more cities around the world. There are so many beautiful places on this planet that we want people to discover. 
  • To translate the touristic information to languages such as German, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, Italian, Russian, etc. on top of the English and French that are already available.
  • To promote the application world-wide, via Public Relations and more traditional marketing campaigns, inventive partnerships and intense social network activity. 

What are we looking for? 

The 2 founders have already invested 160,000€ in LM Sport Tourism. We are now looking at raising 500,000€ of funding through Indiegogo, bank loans and of course our own money. As every contribution helps, small or big, we have special perks for every level of investment (see on the side). 

If you cannot contribute with large amounts but like our project, do not hesitate to: 

  • talk about the project using the Indiegogo sharing tools,
  • share the Runnin’City page on Facebook or Twitter,
  • download the app and rate it on the App Store.

As we mentioned earlier, your funding will greatly help us deliver our strategy faster than we could without you. And you know how speed of delivery can make a difference in the digital age.  

We sincerely hope you will help us meet our funding objectives. 

What if we do not reach our funding objectives? 

If we do not reach our funding objectives, the available funding will go in priority towards marketing the application in as many countries around the world as possible, starting with Europe, North America and Oceania. 

Are there any risks? 

As with any business venture, there are obviously risks and challenges. However, to date, we have already achieved all our objectives on time. We have no intention to miss the next ones. 

We have self funded and spent the last 9 months:

  • validating the interest of our concept,
  • building our vision,
  • designing the business plan & marketing strategies,
  • recruiting the 7-strong team,
  • creating a unique and extremely productive methodology to build great routes around the world,
  • Selling a branded app (white label) to several cities and hotel groups. 

We have solved all technology issues & are fully organised. We have already raised over 100,000€ of funding through friends and family. But more importantly, we have delivered the second major version of our iOS application, and it is rated 5 stars in the Apple App Store. Version 3 is already underway.

Our management and technical teams have already had great successes marketing consumer and business goods around the world: toys, the Recaro Zen baby pram and several software products. Thanks to our experience, amazing motivation, the skills and expertise of our team and a lot of sweat, we believe we will also be successful with this new exciting venture. 

The more you contribute all together, the more likely we will reduce the biggest risk for our company: a too slow adoption or the arrival of a competitor.

What the press says about Runnin'City:

  • ‘’…A new way to practice running…’’ (VSD, Sept. 29, 2016)
  • ‘’…The app of the week…’’ (Grazia, Sept. 28, 2016)
  • ‘’…Combine efforts with culture…’’ (Challenges, Sept. 8, 2016)
  • ‘’…Kill two birds with one stone…’’ (Version Femina, Sept. 26, 2016)
  • ‘’…A pair of sneakers and headphones are the only things that you will need…’’ (Le Progrès, Sept. 12, 2016)
  • ‘’…You will discover a new way to run. Smarter. More entertaining…’’ (Le Journal de l’éco, Sept. 8, 2016)
  • ‘’…For the creators of Runnin’City, the world’s cities are effectively giant open-air museums which runners of all levels can head out to explore.’’ (AFP/Relaxnews, Sept. 20, 2016)
  • ‘’Firstly, your jogging time flies. Secondly, you end up being smarter AND fitter. Who can top that?’’ (Do It In Paris, Sept. 14, 2016)
  • « … let yourself be guided through the city and learn about the monuments, bridges, parcs, museums et districts via the audio comments as you run past … » (Running Attitude, novembre 2016)

Some of the 100+ cities that are featured: 

Paris, Berlin, London, Rome, Florence, Madrid, Barcelona, Brussels, Luxembourg, Amsterdam, Geneva, Lisbon, Lyon, Tel-Aviv, New York, Washington, Boston, Chicago, Miami, Atlanta, Dallas, Houston, Montreal, Québec, Toronto, Vancouver, Sydney, Tokyo, Singapore, Marrakech, Cape Town, etc.

Version 3 is already underway.Our management and technical teams have already had great successes marketing consumer and business goods around the world: toys, the Recaro Zen baby pram and several software products. Thanks to our experience, amazing motivation, the skills and expertise of our team and a lot of sweat, we believe we will also be successful with this new exciting venture. The more you contribute all together, the more likely we will reduce the biggest risk for our company: a too slow adoption or the arrival of a competitor.What the press says about Runnin'City:
‘’…A new way to practice running…’’ (VSD, Sept. 29, 2016)
‘’…The app of the week…’’ (Grazia, Sept. 28, 2016)
‘’…Combine efforts with culture…’’ (Challenges, Sept. 8, 2016)
‘’…Kill two birds with one stone…’’ (Version Femina, Sept. 26, 2016)
‘’…A pair of sneakers and headphones are the only things that you will need…’’ (Le Progrès, Sept. 12, 2016)
‘’…You will discover a new way to run. Smarter. More entertaining…’’ (Le Journal de l’éco, Sept. 8, 2016)
‘’…For the creators of Runnin’City, the world’s cities are effectively giant open-air museums which runners of all levels can head out to explore.’’ (AFP/Relaxnews, Sept. 20, 2016)
‘’Firstly, your jogging time flies. Secondly, you end up being smarter AND fitter. Who can top that?’’ (Do It In Paris, Sept. 14, 2016)
« … let yourself be guided through the city and learn about the monuments, bridges, parcs, museums et districts via the audio comments as you run past … » (Running Attitude, novembre 2016)
Some of the 100+ cities that are featured: Paris, Berlin, London, Rome, Florence, Madrid, Barcelona, Brussels, Luxembourg, Amsterdam, Geneva, Lisbon, Lyon, Tel-Aviv, New York, Washington, Boston, Chicago, Miami, Atlanta, Dallas, Houston, Montreal, Québec, Toronto, Vancouver, Sydney, Tokyo, Singapore, Marrakech, Cape Town, etc.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
We have internally discussed how we can show our gratitude to support of our backers.

So, we will send you one portable magic pad for free with random design to all of you who have backed all levels of rewards.

Furthermore, we would offer an upgraded reward to our supporters without additional expenses.

The retail price of Portable Magic Pad will be 3.5 USD and Multi Magic Pad will be 9 USD when it is officially released.

Magic pads have no specific expiry dates and therefore you can use them anytime after long periods of storage. They are also good gifts for your family, friends and colleagues. 

Please check the additional Magic Pads below for more information.


                                            





There has been no smartphone holder that fulfills needs for various situations that make you fix your smartphones. But you can experience greater comfort and freedom for both of your hands with iMarvel than using existing smartphone stands.

Adhesion technology used in iMarvel is the patented one making it easy for you to stick your smartphone to and remove it.

iMARVEL is also a product that you can use it in your daily life anywhere and anytime. You may use something to which you can attach your goods and keep using it in that way. But if you need something detachable, iMARVEL will be your one and only solution in the world.

We have participated in this campaign so that we can secure funding to produce of patented materials and print required for iMarvel.

 

iMarvel is a versatile, practical and aesthetically good looking product that will bring extra convenience to your life.

iMarvel will make you enjoy the freedom to use both of your hands while putting your smartphone on a smooth and flat surface in different places and situations of your life and its stylish design will also serve as part of your interior props.

You can use iMARVEL in every place of your lifestyle.

You can attach iMARVEL next to TV in the living room and you don’t need to look for the remote controller anymore. You can place iMARVEL in your children’s rooms and they will no longer have to look for their stationery all over the rooms.

You can also use iMARVEL in kitchen, bathroom, living room and on dressing table and it will bring whole new convenience to you when using in your car. In addition, iMARVEL is a magic pad available for any kind of places including offices and stores.



iMarvel is a collaboration between technical skills of Winic and decent designs of an illustrator named Geumhwang, and part of her artworks applied to iMarvel products are displayed in Creative Talking Gallery at COEX Aquarium.

We have combined convenient functions with paintings by Geumhwang to create iMarvel with handy functions and decent designs.

Geumhwang always thinks of people who will feel comfortable and happy with her works before starting to draw.

So we also hope you can feel comfortable and happy with paintings on iMarvel.



 

 Story behind the development of iMARVEL


iMARVEL is finished by 9 steps of processes and one of the most important processes is to test the limit of weight that iMARVEL can stand.

We will tell you the hidden story about the weight of the product that can be stuck to iMARVEL during the development.

Do you know the weight of the heaviest smartphone?

iPhone6 Plus - 172g 

Galaxy Note5 - 171g

We guess that the weight of the heaviest smartphone equipped with all possible cases and covers will not exceed 230g.

What we have used during the development was an iron mock-up that resembles a smartphone case.

Have you ever seen a smartphone case made of iron? We guess that you have never ever seen such a thing.

Give it a try to guess the weight of the iron smartphone case.

We had two iron smartphone cases. The first one weighed 405g and the other one weighed 414g.

The picture shows the iron smartphone case stuck to iMARVEL. It didn’t fall off from iMARVEL once being stuck to it.

So it would be absolutely fine with iMARVEL no matter what kind of smartphones you use.


We have performed a variety of tests while producing iMARVEL and we are really happy to share the story behind the development of iMARVEL with you.




iMarvel was designed based on shapes and forms of different smartphones and its both ends were rounded to deliver the feelings of those paintings on it and we have done a series of tests in order to make iMarvel appropriate for all kinds of smartphones with different form factors.


❖ The product colors may differ from what you see on your monitor.

  • Model : iMARVEL
  • Size: H75mm X W150mm
  • Thickness : 1.2T
  • Weight : 20g(Gross weight)
  • Materials : Polyurethane(Patented), Acrylic form

iMarvel had a positive result from the tensile adhesion strength test for quality control and also successfully completed tests in compliance with the Restriction of Hazardous Substances Directive (RoHS) stipulated by the European Union and common safety guidelines for kid products.







  • Remove the protective film on the back, stick it to things made of wood or glass and then remove the protective film on the front.
  • Press your smartphone on iMarvel ‘a little bit hard’ to make sure that your phone was attached to iMarvel completely and then let the phone hang on it. You will understand what it feels like after a few repetitions.
  • When you stick your phone in a vertical position, do not let the camera of your phone attached.
  • Use your both hands when removing your phone from iMarvel.
  • The backside of iMarvel will gradually be more adhesive.
  • When you remove iMarvel, make some spaces by holding the both ends and then stripping it off slowly.
  • Your phone will not be sticky after removing it from iMarvel.



  • Model : iMARVEL Stand (iMARVEL not included)
  • Size: H165mm X W81mm
  • Thickness : 5T
  • Weight : 100g
  • Materials : Acrylic, 4 Clear rubber dots, Silkscreening
  • Made in Korea


  • Model : iMARVEL Stand (iMARVEL not included)
  • Size: H90mm X W156mm
  • Thickness : 5T
  • Weight : 120g
  • Materials : Acrylic, 4 Clear rubber dots, Silkscreening
  • Made in Korea




A character called Miss Toriyang designed on the portable magic pad is a lovely girl who had a complex on her red hair. She finally overcame her complex and uses her red hair to offer healing experiences to people.

So you will feel a sense of healing with Miss Toriyang on your smartphone.

We will send you one portable magic pad for free with random design to all of you who have backed all levels of rewards.

As Portable Magic Pad will be produced in 6 different designs and therefore you will receive random design for your delivery.

You can stick the portable magic pad to any place inside your car for navigation or music playing.


  • Remove the proective film on the back of the pad and stick it to the back of your smartphone.
  • Open the cover, remove the protective film and then close the cover.
  • When you need the pad, open the cover and stick the pad to your phone.
  • After using it, detach it from your phone, close the cover and carry it with you.

Multi Magic can be cut into pieces so that you can use it at home or in the office for 
different purposes.

We are pleased to announce our upgraded reward that offers multi magic pads to express our thank for the help from all our supporters to this kickstater campaign. We are pleased to announce our upgraded reward that offers multi magic pads to express our thank for the help from all our supporters to this kickstater campaign.

You can cut the multi magic pad into pieces and stick the piece to the place where you want to use it.

It does not leave any sticky stain when detaching it.

The retail price of the multi magic pad will be 9 USD and therefore the reward 
level eligible for the multi magic pad will be the ones who supported 10 or more 
iMARVEL products.

We were very lucky to meet all of you through our indiegogo campaign.


Two multi pagic pads will be offered to those who supported 40 USD or more in addition to their existing reward and a limited number of 500 units will be offered including existing supporters.

The retail price of Portable Magic Pad will be 3.5 USD and Multi Magic Pad will be 9 USD when it is officially released.

Magic pads have no specific expiry dates and therefore you can use them anytime after long periods of storage. They are also good gifts for your family, friends and colleagues.

  • iMarvel products are supplied in random designs except for ordering a full set. So if you want specific designs, please let us know it. We can send you products accordingly.
  • iMarvel plus is supplied in random design.
  • iMarvel stand is basically supplied vertical type. If you want to have horizontal type, please let us know it. We can send you horizontal type.
  • Original postcards will be provided same as the ones in iMarvel products.


  • We need one month for production after the campaign is completed. Then, the delivery will start.
  • iMarvel products will have individual packaging for delivery.
  • We will offer free international shipping.
  • Once the campaign ends and we are ready for delivery, we will give all supporters tracking numbers.



It took more than 8 months to create iMarvel from planning, sample and prototype production, tests with various conditions to finished goods.

iMarvel is the one and only thing to perfectly fulfill your needs when you want to fix your smartphone in a vertical position.


We have completed all the necessary tests related to manufacturing processes of iMARVEL. Once the campaign ends, we will start to produce patented materials to manufacture iMARVEL. So our supporters will have iMARVEL as soon as possible.

 In addition, following this campaign, we will also make a new challenge for a portable version of iMARVEL and we will be back to you when we achieve new challenge. 


Have you ever heard of a song called "GANGNAM STYLE of PSY?"

Winic is a company located in Gangnam, Seoul, Korea and has produced iMarvel which is an anti-gravity smartphone holder. 

Our motto is to design an art on technology.

Our technology used in iMarvel is patented and we are planning to cooperate with various professionals including illustrators, photographers and designers so that they can express their ideas with iMarvel products. 

We will participate in this campaign with products of the first collaboration between Winic and one of those artists.


Q  What kind of smartphones and their cases can I use with iMarvel?
A  Your smartphone or its cover should have flat backside to put it on iMarvel. Some materials are not proper to stick it to iMarvel. So please check whether your smartphone or its case can be attached to iMarvel before using it.
   
Q  What kind of materials can I stick iMarvel to?
A  Its backside can be attached to glass, wood, steel, plastic and tiles. However, iMarvel may not be completely attached to such materials without smooth or flat surfaces. So please check the surfaces before using it.
   
Q  How long can my smartphone hold onto iMarvel?
A  Although your smartphone will not be separated from iMarvel once attached but please remember that iMarvel is not designed to fix your smartphone completely but to hold it for a while. So you need to be careful as its adhesion may gradually become weak.
   
Q  How long can I use iMarvel?
A  Its durability may vary depending on frequency of repeated use and other environmental factors such as temperature and humidity. So each product may have different durations for use.
When you feel that the adhesion of iMarvel is not that strong, clean it with water and dry it out to restore its adhesion.
   
Q What payment options do I have?
A You can pay via credit card or PayPal. Select a perk and you'll see the available payment methods at checkout.
   
Q How much is shipping and handling?
A Shipping is FREE worldwide.
   
Q How do I select which iMARVEL I want?
A If you want specific designs, please let us know it. We can send you products accordingly.

We can promote works by many artists to the public with this campaign and your money will be used to produce patented materials and print their artworks on iMarvel products.

We would like to thank all those supporters paticipating in this campaign. We love hearing from our backers!

story:
We Will Not Use Your Money For Marketing!

I know we got tons of comments that we are not smart. but we believe that we will not use your money to produce Fancy video or Fancy graphics!
We used All free tools and we believe Swiss Note is Real idea which make sense and we hope to share with you our believes and enthusiasm also we hope this campaign can change a lot in the mentality of crowed funding campaigns from commercial driven ones to Real ideas that comes to live supported by you.

What are we doing and Who are we?

We are group of engineers and business teams who live between US, Switzerland and Asia. most of us work in companies and attend a lot of meetings.
We got this idea because we fed up from carrying a lot of devices just to do a good meeting or lecture.
We decided to take a step in changing that. So We simply Put all of those devices in the blender and we Got our idea to live.


 

So What Swiss Note can do for me?

The swiss Note will be your friend in all the meeting or lecture rooms.
Let's picture the day like that:
You are attending a meeting and you should take then notes of the meeting. You will get Swiss Note and will start writing as normal notebook but your mobile is losing charge and you can't charge it? simple open your Swiss Note chose the cable fits your phone and charge your phone from your Swiss Note.


Also you can start recording the meeting from Swiss Note and don't lose one word in the meeting. Now you want to share your presentation? it is not a problem at all connect your swiss note and enjoy the external memory which can carry all your files.


Is that All?
Not really the Swiss Note comes with french design and seamless colors which will allow your to carry it on all occasions plus you have Card holders, Pen, Passport Holder and file management.

YES you are right it is the Swiss Knife o Notebooks. One Device to replace 5 or more devices you need to carry in each meeting.


Where we are now?

We finished the design, prototype and We have the full samples and We adore it. We want your help to get the Swiss Note to the market.
We promise to deliver it November 2016 and you know exactly what will be the Christmas Gift  this year.

You are attending a meeting and you should take then notes of the meeting. You will get Swiss Note and will start writing as normal notebook but your mobile is losing charge and you can't charge it? simple open your Swiss Note chose the cable fits your phone and charge your phone from your Swiss Note.





Also you can start recording the meeting from Swiss Note and don't lose one word in the meeting. Now you want to share your presentation? it is not a problem at all connect your swiss note and enjoy the external memory which can carry all your files.




Is that All?
Not really the Swiss Note comes with french design and seamless colors which will allow your to carry it on all occasions plus you have Card holders, Pen, Passport Holder and file management.

YES you are right it is the Swiss Knife o Notebooks. One Device to replace 5 or more devices you need to carry in each meeting.




Where we are now?
We finished the design, prototype and We have the full samples and We adore it. We want your help to get the Swiss Note to the market.
We promise to deliver it November 2016 and you know exactly what will be the Christmas Gift  this year.

story:
An Instrumentation Suite for Your Pocket

Whether you simply want to know what the air temperature is, or want to do something as complex as continuously monitoring a scientific experiment, the Maker Mod could be for you.  The set of sensors has not been finalized at this point, but on the short list are:

  • Temperature & Humidity
  • Hall Effect
  • Air quality / CO2 / VOC
  • Pulse Oximeter / Particle Count
  • Photosensor
  • IR Emitter & Detector
  • RGB LEDs for notifications
  • Standard LEDs in an array
  • Thermocouple inputs
  • Voltage measurement
  • Battery Voltage input and output
  • Solid State Relays for experiment/process control

 

Open Source

On the software side, this mod will have an android app that acts as a simple chart recorder, and display data from selected sensors over time.  But a simple app certainly won't cover all the possible uses for this set of hardware.   As such, we'll be making as much of this mod as possible open source.  That includes the android app, as well as the firmware for the mod's microcontroller.

We'll also try to release as much info about the hardware as possible, such as schematics, gerbers, and component part numbers.  It is however, likely that we'll have to leave out some information about the interface with the phone which Motorola considers proprietary.

 

The Impact of Your Contribution

At this early stage, we are just trying to gauge how much interest there is in this Mod, before committing a ton of time and resources to it.  By making a contribution, you'll encourage us to invest in the mod's development and also help pay for the costs of developing a prototype.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

At this point we're definitely interested in any ideas you might have to improve the design of this mod.  Whether there is a specific sensor or other bit of hardware you'd like to have included, or if you just want to let us know what color you'd like the circuit board to be, please feel free to get in touch.

story:
FanLyfe "Connecting People Through Sports." 

Natural disasters, Terrorist attacks, Racism, politics, no matter what happens in the world. There is a place where strangers come together. People of different backgrounds, people of different colors, different situations, yet their all sharing the same common goal.  And that is to cheer on their same favorite team. 

They share laughter’s and high five each other when the team is doing good. And they also share the frustrations; you know the all mans, or the you suck chants that might go on if the team is not doing so good. So FanLyfe have taken that experience that seem only to happen or be possible in the physical game setting, we have taken that and now made it digital. So with the FanLyfe app fans can now interact with one another, the same way they would with a face to face interaction, except now it's just a button or a click away.

Risks AND Challenges

While most indieGOGO campaigns launch with a concept or prototype, we feel that most of the risk in our project has already been cut by us moving far beyond that stage.

We have dedicated countless hours of research and development in this project since August 2015. FanLyfe's exploratory app was launched in 2016 were its research and development efforts were purposed to improve our mobile application strategies; with focuses primarily on customer experience, data collection & management, analytics, and mobile app design.

From that exploratory period, we have gathered hundreds of reviews from users, along with data entry to help kick off our analytics matching engine ( F.L.A.M.E).

We are dedicated to the success of this project. Nothing means more to us then connecting fans across the world. Our incredible and deeply experienced team will continue to expand its efforts during and after this campaign in preparation for an official launch date. 

 

FanLyfe is a Revolutionary Platform:

 

 

    

 

F.L.A.M.E 

 

Why we're doing this

It's overtime, as Tom Brady drives the New England Patriots down the field. The wind batters the backs of the Atlanta Falcons players it's 2 & Goal, and they're trying to stop them from scoring to win the Super Bowl.

As a New England Patriots fan, I sit nervously on the couch biting my nails only imagining what the other fans are thinking, doing, and feeling before the play even snaps. As I hear the crowd loudly awaiting, I wish I could connect with the other fans at this very moment.

 As the play snaps, James White gets the toss, breaks some tackles and Touchdown! I jumped up screaming with tears of joy accidentally kicking over my beer and hitting my friend in their head. At this moment, most of the Universe could remember where they were and the emotions they felt as the team they were rooting for won or lost.

Now, this is why FanLyfe was created.  FanLyfe is a home to the ultimate sports fan. No matter where you are in the world, now you can finally follow your favorite team news, connect with millions of other fans and share videos, game reactions or opinions in real- time from the comfort of your mobile phone!

You can take your phone out your pocket and have that same great sense of comradery, that great feeling around being with other fans, and also you can do some trash talking with those that may not like your team. 

This is not just another social media app.  Our team here at FanLyfe has created and developed a mobile sports app for all sports fans!  How many times have you been to the stadium or arena in the off season and it was open..? Well with FanLyfe there is no off season. It's a home for sports fans year around.

 

 

MEET OUR TEAM:

 

FAQ:

 

  1. Will the app be available for Android and iOS? 

       If we overly meet our goal yes. But if we meet only our initial goal, then it will only be released on iOS.

    2. What type of content will users be able to upload on an app?

       You will be able to upload pictures, and videos in story mode. Also on game day, there will be a feature where you can go live.

    3. How are you different from other social media apps?

FanLyfe is strictly a universal community for sports fans. Enjoy a platform with updates about the teams you love along with content and stories from other fans around the world. No outside content from individual social lives.

FanLyfe will have a "Live scoreboard" with real-time reactions from sports fans around the world along with live scores. "

"FanLyfe Game Day Challenges," is a weekly competition where fans can win cool prizes just having fun and being a fan of their team!.

"FanLyfe Events" which are virtual events that users can participate in week to week. FanLyfe events host weekly sports talks, commentary, tailgating specials, and more!

"FanLyfe Analytics Matching Engine ( F.L.A.M.E)." This is our biggest competitive advantage, F.L.A.M.E will personalize a sports fan experience while using the app. Based off user analytics, it will Personalize search results, and news content surrounded by your favorite teams, along with merchandise and fan deals. 

    4. How does the app work exactly?

       How it works: Choose your favorite sports team from each league. Next, record and share anytime about your favorite team with other fans straight to your team’s fan feed using our custom camcorder. Finally, rep your team, talk smack, share your game day moments and excitement live vs. other fans who is playing your team.

 

If You Love Sports, Your Support Is Invaluable!

Given the chance, we plan on finalizing and launching this die- hard sports app on all mobile platforms. Your generous contributions will help us cover operational expenses so we can fund all the prizes, events, and marketing cost to launch this NFL season! By selflessly donating to our project and spreading the word, you can help millions of sports fans just like you enjoy a one-of-a-kind sports experience!

If you can't contribute with money, no sweat!  There are still a few great ways you can help us make this project a reality:

Get the word out!  Use the Indiegogo share tools and tell your friends and family about the project.

  • Give us feedback.We LOVE feedback because we always strive to improve for our amazing users.So tell us what you think of the campaign, the perks, or anything!

 

Thank you for your support!

Become A Part Of The FanLyfe Community Today!

story:
We are seeking $100,000 to:

  1. Create mass-production commercial versions
  2. Complete international certifications
  3. Fulfil pre-orders & manufacture for direct sales, builders, Amazon
  4. Design and develop SKUs for international markets starting with UK, Europe
  5. Develop a distribution network across North America, then UK and Europe

Act fast to take advantage of discounted Early Bird and Indiegogo Pricing for your contributions at up to 50% off!

 

4AMPS is the world's first all-in-one charging solution for your mobile devices. It's the one clutter free and cost effective solution that truly frees up space in your kitchen, office and mind. Never struggle to find your charger before your phone dies again and untangle yourself from the wirey mess left behind in your life and workspace. 4AMPS frees you from your adapter and seamlessly integrates into your home or office. No more need for adapters, cords, power bars, bricks, extra batteries.

4AMPS is a powerful USB charger built into an outlet cover plate with an integrated 3-foot retractable cord and 2-device charging heads. Charges any USB device (smartphones, tablets, phablets, laptops, etc.) and eliminates the need for bulky wall warts or bulky charging stations. It installs in seconds on any standard outlet in your home with no electrician and no wiring. All you need is a screwdriver. For renters, this solution provides convenient wall charging that can be taken with you when you move. If you move out, just pop the old cover back on.

Gaining your support will enable us to ramp up our manufacturing into full production for existing and pending purchase orders, and also create some inventory for direct and Amazon sales, as well as begin development of our next generation smart software and hardware solutions which will further revolutionize device charging.

Patents Pending with United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO), Canadian Intellectual Property Office (CIPO).

 

       

 

Certifications Pending

        

          

 

The 4AMPS Charger was designed with you in mind. It contains the following features:

  • 3-foot integrated retractable cord
  • 2-device charging head
  • Installs in seconds with no electrician or wiring required
  • Charges any mobile device and head type
    • Apple Lightning, USB-C, Micro-USB
    • Smartphones, tablets, laptops

 

The 4AMPS Charger installs and is useable within seconds. Design and Utility Patents Pending with USPTO and CIPO.

 

We embarked on this road thinking that our solution was simple and elegant. What we did not realize was that the scale at which 4AMPS functions mechanically and electronically is both very difficult and complex.

Working almost on the scale of watches with complications, our engineers and designers slaved over perfecting all aspects of the 4AMPS design and function.

It works flawlessly. It looks beautiful.

 

 

Here's our progress until now:

  • MU with a global sales & distribution partner for hospitality industry
  • Interest from home, condominium and apartment builders across North America
  • Aesthetically perfect and fully functional products
  • Fully functional products for any device (Apple Lightning, USB-C, Micro-USB)
  • User testing

Next Steps:

  • We're seeking $100,000 to:
    • Create mass-production commercial versions
    • Complete international certifications
    • Fulfil pre-orders & manufacture for direct sales, builders, Amazon
    • Design and develop SKUs for international markets starting with UK, Europe
    • Develop a distribution network across North America, then UK and Europe
  • We're looking for distributors and partners around the world. Please learn more at: http://4AMPS.com/become-a-distributor/

 

 

  • April 2017 - Generation 1 Prototype
  • May 2017 - Generation 2 Prototype
  • June 2017 - Prototype Finalized
  • July 2017 - Launch Campaign
  • August 2017 - Scale Production
  • September 2017 - Fulfilment

 

As the proliferation of electronic devices has grown exponentially, so has the need for power to keep these devices charged at all times. The constant need for power requires the constant need for charging cables, adapters, and the correct cable attachment head for your device.

People all around the world suffer from what is being termed No Mobile Phobia.

9/10 people in North America and Europe suffer from low battery anxiety.

We buy and keep on us multiple cords and adapters.

Are you tired of the wires and mess all over your kitchen counter or office desk?
Are you tired of not having an adaptor or cord when you need it?
Are you tired of clutter everywhere?

4AMPS makes every power outlet a complete charger - all you need is your device!

 

 

Technically, the challenges facing 4AMPS are minimal in that we have already demonstrated a fully functioning product which is robust and aesthetically perfect. Early adoption of less than mass-produced volumes has been strong. We also have purchase orders and commitments from wholesalers and home builders across North America (US - NY, California, Florida, Arizona; Canada - Ontario, Alberta, British Columbia).

We have mitigated manufacturing risk in how fast we are able to move to mass production while managing costs and minimizing defects by partnering with an existing large scale global manufacturer of charging-related products and intend on leveraging their expertise. They are also an early stage investor in 4AMPS as a strong vote of confidence in our products and their viability.

We have mitigated minimal distribution risk in that this product cannot be flat packed or assembled by the end user, through geography-specific inventory management and direct link to manufacturing to fulfil demand and orders.

 

You can support us by engaging and sharing via our Social Media presence. Like and share us on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and so on.

Pass on our Indiegogo campaign link to your friends via the share tools! Please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!

Igg.me/at/4AMPS/

Facebook.com/4AMPS/

Linkedin.com/company/4AMPS/

Twitter.com/4_AMPS/

Instagram.com/4AMPS/

Pinterest.com/4AMPS/

Vimeo.com/4AMPS/

Youtube.com/channel/4AMPS/

 

How do I contact the campaign team?

YOU MAY EMAIL US AT HELLO@4AMPS.COM.

What is pricing when this fully launches going to look like?

WE ANTICIPATE PRICE WILL RANGE FROM $20 - $30 DEPENDING ON CHARGING HEAD CONFIGURATION.

What is the current power amount? What will it be in full production?

THE 4AMPS CHARGER PROTOTYPE CURRENTLY DELIVERS 1500mA OR 1.5A. WE ARE TARGETING 4000mA OR 4A FOR THE PRODUCTION VERSION, WHICH WOULD CHARGE A TYPICAL SMARTPHONE IN LESS THAN 30 MINS.

Can I pre-order a different number than in the Perks?

YES, YOU CAN SPECIFY ANY NUMBER OF UNITS AND WE WILL CONFIRM ALL SPECIFICS INCLUDING COLOR, HEAD SELECTIONS AND NUMBER PRIOR TO SHIPPING.

Can I buy this at stores?

WE WILL BE LAUNCHING IN STORES AT A LATER DATE. YOU CAN PRE-ORDER NOW ON INDIEGOGO, OR BUY ON OUR WEBSITE OR AMAZON (LAUNCHING SOON).

 

  • Customer Support Team
  • Design and Engineering Team
  • Operations Team
  • David Lashar - Business Development
  • Jade Sehbat - Marketing
  • Tom Marshall - Website Development
  • Charles Bern - Patio Interactive
  • Linar Ismagilov - Patio Interactive
  • Leonard Shen - UV Studio

 

The 4AMPS Team would like to thank the following for their contributions and support:

 

 

Please contact us via one of the methods below:

Email:     hello@4AMPS.com

Web:       4AMPS.com

Phone:   + 1 844 GO 4AMPS

                 + 1 844 464 2677

                 + 1 647 464 4763

story:
Laptop case is used to protect laptop from being damaged, but there is no other functions at all. While traditionally, the laptop stand is too bulky to carry out and often takes a lot of time to set up, which is turning it into a productivity-killer. Last but not least,  you may forget your health damaged after long time hunching work.

The Solution is, SINEX world’s first 3 in1 multifunctional laptop stand case,  combines the all advantages of laptop case, stand and wrist rest. It’s lightweight, portable, convenient, and can be used as laptop stand and wrist rest at the same time.

 

Sinex is a group of engineers and dreamers who believe human-oriented principle is the most important philosophy for creating a new product for human beings.

Sinex combines the all advantages of laptop case, stand and wrist rest, you will never be troubled by carrying too much items and forgetting to take one of them, because all are integrated together.

Easy to carry out on the go out/business trip, light and slim design, only bring more convenience and fun for travel.

 

It’s very convenient and protective for you to carrying laptop outside the office which is made of high quality leather and litchi grain imprinted. 

SINEX case is a perfect portable partner to carry out which it’s only 20mm thickness and 420g lightweight

 

With the built-in strong magnets, laptop still stays safe inside the stand case with heavy shaking.

 

 

It’s very easy for you to setting up Sinex laptop stand and only take few seconds to lift stand up and drop it down. 

SINEX stand is constructed with triangle structure, meaning it’s as strong and stable to hold dozens of books. 

SINEX stand has two adjustable elevation 15° or 35° degrees, making it easy to find the ideal height and comfort for different people on all kinds of occasions.

The high-lift mode greatly optimizes your sitting posture and applies an elevation angle of 35° to the computer screen.

The low-lifting mode takes a 2 inches elevation and can be perfectly adoptive to standing desks. 

 

The cover of laptop case is also the soft wrist rest, it’s effective to stop hunching and help eliminating pain and Repetitive Strain Injuries (RSI) for laptop users.

 

The water repellent fabric effectively avoid water, coffee and rain enter or pass through the case to damage laptop.  

 

 

SINEX is effectively to radiating heat with the space at laptop stand. Also, the soft high quality leather do no harm on the edge of laptop while stuck at Sinex. 

 

We provide SINEX laptop cases in 13-inch, 13.3-inch, 15-inch size and 16-inch size,  while also have warm gray，brown and yellow cream colors to meet kinds of users.

Sinex compares with other laptop cases, stands and hand rests (the average price at Amazon Top 10 ), showing that Sinex is a cost-effective product. It's a lightweight, portable and can be used as laptop stand and wrist rest at the same time

 
 
 
 

SINEX stands for Supreme, Incredible, Non-stop, Evolution and X , it dedicates that ’s principle for a better and new product to change human beings’ life. The future with infinite hope. 

SINEX team are proud of showing SINEX laptop cases to you and have a great expectation that our great product changes your life and brings more convenience to you. Your support is the driving force behind our continued progress. 

SINEX team contributed much time and effort to innovatively create this a laptop perfectly solves your troubles, the world's first 3 in 1 multifunctional laptop stand case. Make you safely carrying on laptop on the go and free yourself from laptop neck pain.    

 

 

 

[MacBook Air][MacBook Pro][Surface Computers][Dell Laptops][HP Laptops][lenovo Laptops]

story:
The story of CardGear Slim

Nowadays, we all carry little gadgets wherever we go. We have so much information and photos to store in our phones, computers, and cameras. Most of us like to carry extra SD cards to increase the memory. For travelers, we also carry an extra or two SIM cards to the countries that we like to go. The problem is we just don't have a right place to store these tiny cards. If we throw them into a wallet, we will run into the risk of losing them whenever we open the wallet. If we put them in a bag, they become so bulky. This is why we invented CardGear Slim. It is the minimalist way to carry and organize extra SD and sim cards. A perfect companion for travelers and photographers.

 

Essential for travelers

To carry extra memory cards

story:
More than just a Macbook charger

Fast, lightweight, compact multi-functional charger that does much more than a macbook charger. 

It's compact and powerful enough to charge your USB-C laptop, iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch; and  is a data hub for your printer, camera, etc.  It even has an HDMI port!

2x USB-C Ports   •   3x USB Ports    •    1x HDMI port

 

 

Charge your phone + tablet 2x faster

Unlike the macbook charger, you can charge multiple devices such as…

  • Your USB Type-C powered laptop
  • Iphone
  • Ipad
  • Apple Watch
  • Power bank
  • Headphones
  • Cameras
  • and more!

 


Fast Data Transfer

Without charging a laptop, JIBE Charger can also be your stand alone charging & data hub.  Transfer data at 5GB/second.


 

Includes: HDMI Port

HDMI Port included - Allowing you to connect your monitor, projector, TV and other media devices.

 

Compact: Grab & Go

Say goodbye to those pesky cords that get tangled and lost in your bed.  JIBE is your compact all in one solution that fits in the palm of your hands.

 

Best Value

On average you will spend $160.00 on chargers.  JIBE is launching at an EARLY BIRD price of $59 and is ready to ship as soon as this campaign ends.

 


 

As Seen On...


 

Product Specs

  • READY TO SHIP JANUARY 2018
  • Power Input: 1 x AC inlet
  • Integrated Connectors: 2 x USB-C 3.1 cable; 3 x USB-A 3.0 ports, 1 x HDMI port (4K @ 30Hz)
  • Power Input: 110-240V
  • Data Bandwidth: 5 Gb/s
  • Weight: 210 grams / 7.4 oz.
  • Dimensions:  8.6 cm x 5.8 cm x 2.7 cm / 3.39" x 2.28" x 1.06"
  • Available Colors: White, Black

Product Specs

  • READY TO SHIP FEBRUARY 2018​
  • Power Input: 1 x AC inlet
  • Integrated Connectors: 2 x USB-C 3.1 cable; 3 x USB-A 3.0 ports
  • Power Input: 110-240V
  • Data Bandwidth: 5 Gb/s
  • Weight: 210 grams / 7.4 oz.
  • Dimensions:  8.6 cm x 5.8 cm x 2.7 cm / 3.39" x 2.28" x 1.06"
  • Available Colors: White, Black



 

What does JIBE come with?
 

  • Your JIBE Edge or JIBE Pebble
  • 1 x power cord
  • 1 x 8 figure power cable
  • 1 x Complimentary weather-proof protective pouch

 

 

A team you can trust:

12 Years of manufacturing experience.

JIBE IS READY TO SHIP JANUARY 2018 

 

FAQ


Can Jibe be used without being plugged into a wall socket?

Yes and no. Jibe was conceived to replace your MacBook charger, so for most functions it needs to be plugged into a wall socket just like any charger. However, when not connected to a power source, Jibe can still be used for data transfer to your MacBook as well as pass-through charging of any device connected through its USB ports.

 

Is Jibe a battery pack?

Jibe is a new and improved MacBook charger and can charge your computer and up to three devices with traditional AC power. It does not have an independent battery of its own.


Does Jibe work with my computer (i.e. 15" MacBook Pro)?

Jibe is a USB-C type charger that was designed for the latest generation MacBook (2015+) and MacBook Pro (2016+). Jibe has been rigorously tested with these computer models, including both the 13" and 15" versions of MacBook Pro!


Which colors does Jibe come in?

Jibe is available in white and black!


Can I use Jibe in my country or region?

Yes! Jibe is compatible with different international voltage standards and will ship with the AC power cord that corresponds to your country or region.


How much is shipping? Can you ship to my country or region?

Shipping is free in USA.  We are able to ship to most major countries and regions with shipping rates $10 or less.


When will Jibe ship?

Jibe Edge will ship in January 2018 for all backers! Jibe Pebble will ship in February 2018.

story:
We were inspired by the stunning clean design of phones such as the iPhone 6 and HTC One M8, and set out to look for docks that would beautifully compliment these phones, and we found a few, but there was a common problem with them: functionality. We found that they were not universal, did not prioritize eco-friendliness, and did not offer enough versatility, thus we created MONOLITH. It is designed with 100% renewable bamboo wood. MONOLITH is a single piece of premium bamboo wood, backed by a sheet of cork, and includes two bamboo dowel rods that can attach to the back to position MONOLITH in multiple orientations. 


  • Phone sizes up to: 3.5" wide by 6.5" tall
  • MicroUSB and Apple Lightning charging capabilities 
  • Multiple orientations 
  • Eco-friendly and sustainable bamboo wood and cork construction
  • Elegant design


  

We do not believe in astronomical markups. In fact, we don't believe in markups at all! We are able to have such low prices due to the fact that our profit margins are incredibly small, and we are ok with that. For instance, it costs us a total of $15 to manufacture and ship MONOLITH, yet the cheapest perk package with MONOLITH is just $20! We believe in providing premium accessories to our customers at extremely affordable prices. We have not yet decided on a retail price point, but we do know that the prices we are offering here on INDIEGOGO are discounted one-time-only prices. Shipping anywhere in the continental United States is free, while shipping everywhere else in the world is an extra $20. All shipping is tracked and insured.

We are on INDIEGOGO because we need your help! To lower production costs, ensure any unexpected costs are covered, hire additional employees to manufacture MONOLITH, and to source quality materials at bulk prices, we have a funding goal of $1,000 USD. We saw INDIEGOGO as a perfect way to launch our dream, and we have all the puzzle pieces in place except for one, you! You are our last piece and we hope that by pledging, you can help fit this last piece into our puzzle. Although we have Flexible Funding enabled, we have properly adjusted the prices in order to ensure we have enough money to manufacture MONOLITH, even if we do not meet our goal. If we do meet the goal, it should make the manufacturing process a lot quicker, and may allow us to throw in a few free extra features. When contributing, we ask that you share our project on social media, and to your friends and family!

Since 2nd grade, Joe Malzone has had the dream to become an entrepreneur, and has worked towards that dream since then. In 7th grade, Joe started selling homemade smoothies to neighbors in his subdivision, and learned the process of marketing a product and calculating manufacturing costs. Two years later, Joe partnered with his friend Dan to create an online gaming service called The Hybrix Network to provide people around the world with a 24/7 gaming experience. Through this service, that is still being run, Joe has learned to manage a team of staff, manage customer relations, and troubleshooting unexpected problems that arise from daily operations. Now Joe is creating a division of the previous company, called Hybrix At Home, which has brought about this campaign.

We have an amazing team of staff, spread throughout the United States managing technical support, product development, manufacturing, marketing, and much more. We are all very passionate about our work and are devoted to creating the best experience for our customers. 


We would like to thank everyone for checking out this campaign, and would thrilled to have your support by contributing to our project! We would also like to extend a special thanks to everyone who has helped us along the way from friends and family, to complete strangers we meet on the street. Thank you so much for believing in our dream and helping us become who we are today!

story:
-Built your App with us.

-Built your network with our Apps Network. 

-Connect with 1000's of Event Professionals and Event Fans ! 

Use your chance now, in 50% lower cost than any offer, available for limited time during for our Events Ambassadors project!

We offer the most advanced App features available: Event registration, Event attendance, Event listings, Podcast, Online Booking, Unlimited Push notifications, Points of interest, QR coupons, GPS coupons, Loyalty Card, One click to call, Food ordering, Mobile Shopping and much more!

Take advantage of Networking, App Downloads and Customer Loyalty.

If you are an event or travel professional who want to expand your business and revenue, if you are a professional who want to improve customer loyalty and  develop within the wide network of the travel and events professionals, if you love travelling and  events, Events Ambassadors has something for you.



Our project Events Ambassadors. Why we invite you to be a part of it?


We will invest funding to a series of dedicated Apps for every destination connected to a network of event and hospitallity partners supported by an extensive Web Forum. 
New York, Los Angeles, San Francisco, Houston, Las Vegas, London, Moscow, Berlin, Barcelona, Athens, among cities, Cyclades Islands(includes Mykonos and Santorini), Dodecanese islands(includes Rhodes and Kos), Crete, Chalkidiki, Cruising, among Holiday destinations. 

Greece, an epicenter of our Holiday destinations, an amazing country, where I made my first steps in travel and events industry, a wonderful destination where every event has its unique character. If we would speak for weddings for example, you will find it very difficult to choose your wedding Venue among the Aegean islands(me and my wife chose St Paul, in Lindos, Rhodes. Google it, you will see what I mean).


Benefits for Professionals, an App for your Business and a Great Network which means more business! Our Perks:


Built Travel and Events Profs App $450
We will create your App available for iphone, ipad, android, html5, in any language you want. Additional laguage +25%. 
We offer the most advanced features in the market: Event registration, Event attendance, Event listings, Podcast, Online Booking, Unlimited Push notifications, Points of interest, QR coupons, GPS coupons, Loyalty Card, One click to call, Food ordering, Mobile Shopping and much more!
Also you enter for free to our partner network as recommended partner . As a partner, your can create your own community, a fan wall in our Destination or Event App for your prefered destination, prefered event, prefered property, and support your services.
Additionally, you can lead forums in our App/web platform and expand loyalty, revenue, your B2B and B2C networks.
Last but not least you will have a 25% discount for life for the support/hosting monthly subsrciption, which is 39 euro, billed quarterly.

 
Built Professional App $450 

We will create your App available for iphone, ipad, android, html5, in any language you want. Additional laguage +25%. 

We offer the most advanced features in the market: Event registration, Event attendance, Event listings, Podcast, Online Booking, Unlimited Push notifications, Points of interest, QR coupons, GPS coupons, Loyalty Card, One click to call, Food ordering, Mobile Shopping and much more!

Also you enter for free to our partner network as recommended partner . As a partner, your can create your own community, a fan wall in our Destination or Event App for your prefered destination, prefered event, prefered property, and support your services.
Additionally, you can lead forums in our App/web platform and expand loyalty, revenue, your B2B and B2C networks.
Last but not least you will have a 25% discount for life for the support/hosting monthly subsrciption, which is 39 euro, billed quarterly.

Please click below for our digital guide about our Apps and what they can do for your business:

Apps catalogue - All Native Apps Features included - Free publishing

Thank you for getting on board!


Benefits for travellers and events lovers. Our Perks:

Our rewards for each Perk give you equal value coupon to spend among hundreds of different Holiday Packages, City Breaks and Cruises, with the support of a wide network of travel agencies. 
Some popular offers:
Luxury Honeymoon, Sea View, Aegialis Hotel & Spa 
8 days Athens-Mykonos-Santorini
Booking.com prices are the upper limit for our prices, on which you can use your coupon. Also, you will be given exclusive access to create threads for you prefered events in our forums and for life exclusive offers for Events Ambassadors not available in public.

story:
You might know me from Red Power Station, however, I'm progressing on to something new...

It is called Crowdshooters...

It involves multiple audience members (Crowdshooters) streaming live events from their phones to the internet as a professionally produced TV show.

This is no ordinary filming; all the CrowdShooters phones are streaming live to a central vision mixer where a professional TV director is producing an online show. Crowdshooters' live streams are supplemented with professional camera operators to enhance the quality of the show.

As far as I know, this has never been done before. This is truly a ground breaking TV production.

Post event the content can be edited to create additional content.

There is an opportunity with our friends at True Skool to Crowdshoot a live hip-hop event on Friday 17th of April, hence the reason for this campaign.

I don't have the funds to do this and I need your help to make this a reality.

The output of this event will be a marketing video that we will use to sell these services to Marketing Agencies (thank you Square Elephant for helping out on the making of video) through a new company called Crowdshooters.

We are looking to raise £700 to pay for camera hire, software and streaming costs. All the crew are volunteers and a special thank you to Will Kinder from the BBC for helping out as our live director.

We are really excited about the potential of the technology but we need your help to make this a reality.

This is a world first; streaming a live music show using 15 mobile phones and 3 professional cameras, streamed as a professionally produced show online.

Really appreciate your help on this, and feel welcome to contact me with any questions.

Thanks,

Iain Clark
