story:
About this Project

What is the Shock Shutter?

Approximately 2400 children are injured every year when they stick small objects into the slots of electrical receptacles.* In order to reduce the number of these injuries, The National Electrical Code (NEC) was revised in 2008 to recommend that all new buildings use tamper resistant (TR) receptacles for power outlets. To date, 38 states now require TR receptacles and the remaining 12 states require TR receptacles on a local level. Installation of TR receptacles is costly, takes hours, requires the circuit breaker to be shut off, and will need to be installed by a licensed electrician. We, at High Performance Engineering, developed an affordable, alternative solution that also meets the NEC’s tamper resistant requirement. We call it The Shock Shutter. The Shock Shutter is a tamper resistant (TR) outlet cover that provides the same level of safety against electrical shocks as TR receptacles.

*http://www.esfi.org/resource/q-a-tamper-resistant-receptacles-207

Key Features

o Prevents injuries caused by electrical shock from sticking small objects into the slots of electrical outlets

o Quick and easy to install

o Does not require shutting off the circuit breaker

o Can be installed by anyone (No need to hire a licensed electrician)

o Cheaper to install than installing TR receptacles

o Meets NEC’s 2008 tamper resistant requirement

o Made in the USA

How does it work?

The Shock Shutter is an electrical outlet cover with a built in Tamper Resistant (TR) shutter system. The shutters block many objects including paperclips, keys, pins, forks, knives, scissors, and screw drivers. These shutters only open when something is inserted into both slots in the power outlet such as an electrical cord. When a common household item such as a paper clip, pin, or key is inserted into only one of the slots, the shutters do not open, preventing serious and possibly fatal injuries from electrical shocks.

Quick and Easy Installation

Installing the Shock Shutter is quick and easy. Anyone can install The Shock Shutter. You do not need a licensed electrician. The only tool that you will need is a screw driver.

Keep Your Children Safe

Shock Shutter Tamper Resistant Outlet Covers are a great way to childproof homes. It’s budget friendly and easy installation make it a much better alternative to installing Tamper Resistant Receptacles or using Outlet Plugs (which are known to be a choking hazard).

Why Do We Need Your Support

After months of hard work, we are finally ready to introduce the Shock Shutter to the world. We need the Indiegogo community’s help with funding production, marketing, and distribution. We want to prevent injuries caused by electrical shock and make the world a safer place. With your help, we can achieve our goal.

What styles and colors of Shock Shutter are available?

The Shock Shutter will be available in both duplex and décor styles. The Shock Shutter is designed for installation over standard duplex or decor 2 plug outlets. We are making the Shock Shutter in various colors including: white, ivory, and red / orange for hospitals. We will contact you prior to shipping to determine which available color and style you want.

Help us spread the word about Shock Shutter!!!

Risk & ChallengesAs with all Indiegogo projects, we face numerous risks and challenges. We will keep our backers up to date on our progress. We are currently working hard to market the Shock Shutter and find retailers who will sell our product. We are confident that the Shock Shutter will meet your expectations. We plan on shipping rewards on time to meet our estimated delivery date. If an unforeseen issue occurs and we are forced to delay shipping, we will let our backers know as soon as possible. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to send us a message. Thank you for your support. Electrical Safety is our top priority and your support will help make the world a safer placeHelp us spread the word about Shock Shutter!!!

story:
Looking for funding to get a few computer Immersion cases out to people for product review and product endorsements. Our secondary goal is funding to move into a larger facility here in the USA.

A little about us, Immersion technology, and its benefits.

Crypt’N Computer Case Company is an American manufacturing start up created to develop full immersion computer cases. Established in 2011 by founder Arlo Christianson and self-funded, he went to work designing and creating various models and prototypes. All along coming closer and closer to a product truly revolutionary, one that you will be using for years to come. Arlo has funded this endeavor up to this point. We have reached a critical stage now that the utility patents have been prepared and are now pending. We need capital to go into full production and we need to build product recognition and awareness. That is where we need your help to fund a few cases so we can get them out to be reviewed and to build product awareness. Crypt'N is based in Great Falls Montana. One of our core tenants’ is bringing manufacturing jobs back to America.

In 2011, during a computer build, Arlo wanted to submerge the whole computer. He set out to find an immersion case for his build but was unable to find anything that would work. Needless to say he was rather disappointed in the lack of available options and was determined to do something about it.

It was then the decision was made to start the Crypt’N Computer Case Company for the purpose of bringing immersion technology to personal computers. The budget has always been tight from the start, however this would not deter him. He would spend all his extra time and money over the last four years developing this product, to the point at which it’s ready for the world. Our patents are now pending and we need your help to fund the next stage.

Having an immersion case that was multi fluid capable was one of the most important goals. We’ve had set backs along the way. One example would be our Prototype 2.5 version. Quickly after startup we realized there was a problem. The heat was being pulled out of the case too fast, stress cracks where developing in the acrylic. The system still worked great as Arlo over-engineered the material thickness of the pressure vessel for safety.

(This was awesome, we had an idea this might be possible but the low boiling point fluid worked better than we expected.) 

To find a solution we had to redesign the case to fit our small annealing ovens. This was a good thing which lead to a more user friendly case design and better quality. However one key brake through came during testing  was pressurizing the containment area and cooling system so that the system would work with almost all types of dielectric fluid, not just the well-known mineral oil but also low boiling point dielectric fluids. And by holding the increasing pressure in the system made the low boiling point fluids work better yet. Immersion technology also helps protect your computer from hazardous and harmful environments by fully encapsulating your core computer components’. Our immersion cases use single phase cooling with the option to use external dual phase chillers if lower temps are needed.

Immersion technology

Immersion technology has been around for a long time. First Arlo heard of it being used was in Seymour Cray's super computers back in the 80's, but it has been around allot longer. It has been adapted for use in sensitive data systems in large companies, government entities, and the military. This technology allows those systems to be more powerful, run faster, be smaller, and last longer.

Immersion technology has a significant advantage over air in heat transfer ability. Which allows for denser configurations increasing the amount of electronics per cubic area that an enclosure can maintain and operate safely. By increasing the cooling capacity of your PC cases, we allow you to run your components harder, faster and longer than an air cooled PC is possible of doing.

Another benefit from using our immersion cases’ is that it seals the computer inside away from harmful environments such as humidity, smoke and dust. Keeping your computer as clean as the day you put it in the case.

Best of all you will not void the warranties on your computer components like some high end water cooled set ups will. And our immersion cases are multi-generational capable. Meaning you will be able to change the internal components as you see fit. Now and into the future.

"Crypt'N relegates water cooling to the history books."

Now you can have this advanced technology at work for you, in your home or office. Become Elite. Maximize your computers potential with immersion cooling from Crypt’N. And as the public embraces immersion technology in their homes and offices, motherboard and CPU manufacturers will be able to take the restrictions off, on how dense the electronics can be placed. Which should logically lead to a wider variety of multiple CPU motherboards and in smaller form factors. Get ahead of this trend and support us today. Donate to our crowd funding campaign to help us bring about innovation.

Our immersion cases include:
  • A lifetime warranty on materials and workmanship and a limited replacement warranty on ware parts such as fluid transfer pumps and LED's.
  • Thick impact resistant acrylic view window in the pressure vessel.
  • Black sleeved power and data cables.
  • Multiple drive bays with case matching covers.
  • Fluid transfer pump. 
  • High quality heat exchangers.
  • Pre plumed and tested fluid transfer lines.
  • Color changing LED fiber optic trim. (On selected models only.)
  • A sealed pressure tank to safely hold and protect your computer components. 
  • Mounting hardware.
  • Changeable rear I/O pass-through manifold.
  • Changeable drive bay power and data pass-through manifold.
  • Front side power switch.
  • Back side reset switch.
  • Removable dust filter.
  • Stubbed out quick connects for expanding cooling capabilities.

Maintenance has been made easy. Start by looking through your display window to verify fluid level. Wipe the outside of case with a soft cloth and some case cleaner then vacuum the front side dust filter or remove for easy cleaning. (Yea we said vacuum.) We have made the pump accessible, if it ever needs to be changed, as well as the LED lighting and optical drive bays.

Three sizes available. Small, medium, and large. Large size cases hold HPTX, XL-ATX, EATX, ATX, or M-ATX motherboards. Medium size cases hold ATX or M-ATX boards. And the small size cases hold M-ATX boards. (We currently don't offer a WTX size because they are primarily a server board and our patents only cover personal computers.)

The minimum funding goal is set at $12,500.00 to help get some cases out for product reviews. We have made a stretch goal of $3.75M which is the equivalent of running out of the $2,500.00 contribution level. As we approach this level larger manufacturing facilities can be secured and large production can proceed. To celebrate that accomplishment the Special Outlaw immersion computer cases will be upgraded to a Limited Edition Founders Elysian Immersion Computer Case. And as a bonus each case will have special silver or gold plated badging and be Hand numbered.

If that goal is not reached during crowdfunding, no one should feel let down. The special Outlaw Immersion case is also a limited edition. This run of cases are to be white with color changing LED lighting also hand signed and numbered. And will only be offered during crowdfunding. The Outlaw Immersion case will be offered later in our standard line with black exterior and a choice of blue, red, orange, or green non-lighted trim colors.


Prototype 1 series

-Prototype 2.0 and earlier series images unavailable due to Arlo’s earlier paranoia someone would steal his idea if he allowed cameras in his work shop. We here at Crypt’N apologize for this and have corrected his thinking. Here are some drawings from those earlier designs, thank you.

Prototype 2.5 pics.

-Notice above the CPU doesn't need the heat sink installed for low boiling point dielectric fluids, however the heat sink is required if using mineral oil like product or more heat dispersal area while overclocking but we didn't find it necessary while allowing the board to overclock every thing automatically using the overclock genie.

-Frustrations below with early cable management lead to a better motherboard tray lay out and exchangeable pass-through manifolds.


The following are two design of Immersion cases that have been approved by Arlo for crowdfunding gifts/rewards.

Notice: Appearance may vary slightly from images. (Small size Special Outlaw Immersion case shown above, dimensions 14.25x29x14.25, med- 17.25x29x14.25, large- 18.25x36x14.25) 

The Elysian was designed to operate with less dielectric fluid, making it easier on your wallet when using engineered dielectric fluids. A vapor condenser integrated into the bulk head of the pressure vessel plus other space saving innovations keeps the units smaller to save space. (Depending on customer feedback, the quick connects may be tucked inside with a removable hatch in future models. Quick connects are used for connecting to external dual phase chillers for colder operating temps.)

Due to lack of space and tooling we are unable to make the Elysian at this time without having to farm it out, we would rather grow into a larger facility to accommodate the required equipment and build here in the United States.

Hence our secondary funding goal to raise funds for a larger facility. Going down this route we will be able to keep strict quality controls over production providing a better product overall.


Risks:

The Outlaw Immersion case will be our first batch run.

There are always risks associated with manufacturing, from worker issues to supply delays and a host of other problems. Our team has years of manufacturing experience to help overcome and avoid potential problems. Their experience include but is not limited to: Project Coordination; Quality Control; Product Engineering; Design Engineering; Management; Logistics; and Sales. This diversity helps us identify potential problems quickly and find efficient solutions.

Special Commemorative Tokens will display year and amount raised from this crowdfunding site on one side.

*To stay compliant with the terms and conditions for using this funding site, please note that "Commemorative Tokens" Are a Collector’s Item only and have no cash value. Crypt'N however will allow you to turn in for recycling to Crypt'N Computer Case Company during future promotional offers in exchange for other Crypt'N products and/or merchandise. We also make no claims or promises to equity and/or repayment in any form.
**Commemorative token credits are issued so contributors won’t have to spend so much in shipping and handling. Actual tokens will be shipped out to contributors upon request with an additional charge for shipping and handling.
***Computer Hardware, Software, and Dielectric fluid are not included. We recommend using low boiling point dielectric fluid (50o C) similar to 3M's Novec649. However our cases are designed to work with all types of dielectric fluids. (3M and Novec649 are registered trademarks of 3M corp. Crypt’N Computer Case Co. is not affiliated with 3M, nor are we paid to endorse them.)

ready for the world. Our patents are now pending and we need your help to fund
the next stage.
Having an immersion case that was
multi fluid capable was one of the most important goals. We’ve had set backs
along the way. One example would be our Prototype 2.5 version. Quickly after
startup we realized there was a problem. The heat was being pulled out of the
case too fast, stress cracks where developing in the acrylic. The system still worked
great as Arlo over-engineered the material thickness of the pressure vessel for
safety. 


(This was awesome, we had an
idea this might be possible but the low boiling point fluid worked better than
we expected.)  

To find a solution we had to
redesign the case to fit our small annealing ovens. This was a good thing which
lead to a more user friendly case design and better quality. However one key
brake through came during testing  was pressurizing the containment area
and cooling system so that the system would work with almost all types of
dielectric fluid, not just the well-known mineral oil but also low boiling
point dielectric fluids. And by holding the increasing pressure in the system
made the low boiling point fluids work better yet. Immersion technology also
helps protect your computer from hazardous and harmful environments by fully
encapsulating your core computer components’. Our immersion cases use single
phase cooling with the option to use external dual phase chillers if lower
temps are needed.
Immersion technology
Immersion technology has been around
for a long time. First Arlo heard of it being used was in Seymour Cray's super
computers back in the 80's, but it has been around allot longer. It has been
adapted for use in sensitive data systems in large companies, government
entities, and the military. This technology allows those systems to be more
powerful, run faster, be smaller, and last longer. 
Immersion technology has a
significant advantage over air in heat transfer ability. Which allows for
denser configurations increasing the amount of electronics per cubic area that
an enclosure can maintain and operate safely. By increasing the cooling
capacity of your PC cases, we allow you to run your components harder, faster
and longer than an air cooled PC is possible of doing.
Another benefit from using our immersion
cases’ is that it seals the computer inside away from harmful environments such
as humidity, smoke and dust. Keeping your computer as clean as the day you put
it in the case.
Best of all you will not void the
warranties on your computer components like some high end water cooled set ups
will. And our immersion cases are multi-generational capable. Meaning you will
be able to change the internal components as you see fit. Now and into the
future. 
"Crypt'N relegates water cooling to the history books."Now you can have this advanced
technology at work for you, in your home or office. Become Elite. Maximize your
computers potential with immersion cooling from Crypt’N. And as the public
embraces immersion technology in their homes and offices, motherboard and CPU
manufacturers will be able to take the restrictions off, on how dense the
electronics can be placed. Which should logically lead to a wider variety of
multiple CPU motherboards and in smaller form factors. Get ahead of this trend
and support us today. Donate to our crowd funding campaign to help us bring
about innovation.
Our immersion cases include: 

A lifetime warranty on materials and workmanship and a
     limited replacement warranty on ware parts such as fluid transfer pumps
     and LED's.
Thick impact resistant acrylic view window in the
     pressure vessel.
Black sleeved power and data cables. 
Multiple drive bays with case matching covers. 
Fluid transfer pump. 
High quality heat exchangers. 
Pre plumed and tested fluid transfer lines. 
Color changing LED fiber optic trim. (On selected
     models only.) 
A sealed pressure tank to safely hold and protect your
     computer components.  
Mounting hardware. 
Changeable rear I/O pass-through manifold.
Changeable drive bay power and data pass-through
     manifold.
Front side power switch.
Back side reset switch.
Removable dust filter. 
Stubbed out quick connects for expanding cooling
     capabilities.
Maintenance has been made easy.
Start by looking through your display window to verify fluid level. Wipe the
outside of case with a soft cloth and some case cleaner then vacuum the front
side dust filter or remove for easy cleaning. (Yea we said vacuum.) We have made the pump accessible, if
it ever needs to be changed, as well as the LED lighting and optical drive bays.
Three
sizes available. Small, medium, and large. Large size cases hold HPTX, XL-ATX,
EATX, ATX, or M-ATX motherboards. Medium size cases hold ATX or M-ATX boards.
And the small size cases hold M-ATX boards. (We currently don't offer a WTX size because they are primarily a server
board and our patents only cover personal computers.)
The minimum funding goal is set at
$12,500.00 to help get some cases out for product reviews. We have made a stretch goal of $3.75M
which is the equivalent of running out of the $2,500.00 contribution
level. As we
approach this level larger manufacturing facilities can be secured and large
production can proceed. To celebrate that accomplishment the Special Outlaw
immersion computer cases will be upgraded to a Limited Edition Founders Elysian
Immersion Computer Case. And as a bonus each case will have special silver or
gold plated badging and be Hand numbered.
If
that goal is not reached during crowdfunding, no one should feel let down. The special
Outlaw Immersion case is also a limited edition. This run of cases are to be
white with color changing LED lighting also hand signed and numbered. And will
only be offered during crowdfunding. The Outlaw Immersion case will be offered
later in our standard line with black exterior and a choice of blue, red, orange, or green non-lighted
trim colors.


Prototype 1 series
-Prototype 2.0 and earlier series
images unavailable due to Arlo’s earlier paranoia someone would steal his idea
if he allowed cameras in his work shop. We here at Crypt’N apologize for this
and have corrected his thinking. Here are some drawings from those earlier
designs, thank you.

Prototype 2.5 pics.-Notice above the CPU doesn't need
the heat sink installed for low boiling point dielectric fluids, however the
heat sink is required if using mineral oil like product or more heat dispersal area while overclocking but we didn't find it necessary while allowing the board to overclock every thing automatically using the overclock genie.-Frustrations below with early cable
management lead to a better motherboard tray lay out and exchangeable
pass-through manifolds.

The following are two design of Immersion cases that have been approved by Arlo for crowdfunding gifts/rewards.



Notice: Appearance may vary
slightly from images. (Small size Special Outlaw Immersion case shown above,
dimensions 14.25x29x14.25, med- 17.25x29x14.25, large- 18.25x36x14.25)  


The Elysian was designed to operate with less dielectric fluid, making
it easier on your wallet when using engineered dielectric fluids. A vapor
condenser integrated into the bulk head of the pressure vessel plus other space
saving innovations keeps the units smaller to save space. (Depending on
customer feedback, the quick connects may be tucked inside with a removable
hatch in future models. Quick connects are used for connecting to external dual phase chillers for colder operating temps.)

Due to lack
of space and tooling we are unable to make the Elysian at this time without
having to farm it out, we would rather grow into a larger facility to
accommodate the required equipment and build here in the United States. 
Hence our
secondary funding goal to raise funds for a larger facility. Going down this
route we will be able to keep strict quality controls over production providing
a better product overall.
Risks:
The Outlaw Immersion case will be
our first batch run.
There are always risks associated
with manufacturing, from worker issues to supply delays and a host of other
problems. Our team has years of manufacturing experience to help overcome and
avoid potential problems. Their experience include but is not limited to:
Project Coordination; Quality Control; Product Engineering; Design Engineering;
Management; Logistics; and Sales. This diversity helps us identify potential
problems quickly and find efficient solutions.


Special
Commemorative Tokens will display year and amount raised from this crowdfunding
site on one side.
*To stay compliant with the terms and conditions for using this funding site,
please note that "Commemorative Tokens" Are a Collector’s Item only
and have no cash value. Crypt'N however will allow you to turn in for recycling
to Crypt'N Computer Case Company during future promotional offers in exchange
for other Crypt'N products and/or merchandise. We also make no claims or
promises to equity and/or repayment in any form.
**Commemorative token credits are issued so contributors won’t have to spend so
much in shipping and handling. Actual tokens will be shipped out to
contributors upon request with an additional charge for shipping and handling.
***Computer Hardware, Software, and Dielectric fluid are not included. We recommend using low boiling point dielectric fluid (50o
C) similar to 3M's Novec649. However our cases are designed to work with all
types of dielectric fluids. (3M and Novec649 are registered trademarks of 3M
corp. Crypt’N Computer Case Co. is not affiliated with 3M, nor are we paid to
endorse them.)

story:
It is new picturesquely app where everybody can find their picture of their interests and lifestyle they live. It is important to us because we want to give humanity easy way to find aspirations they seek through the app and fulfill it with real life.


Human tendency is to live a free life and do what they love most. With Sayari, our goal is to inspire people to follow their interests by creating a small corner where they will feel most comfortable. Someone loves cars, someone loves art, travel, sport, photography… please! Create a profile by your aspirations and find inspiration!

 

Nowadays, people are lost and do not have time to devote to themself, but with Sayari, we will be able to put life we want to live in one app, so that we can awake the freedom of creativity in each individual causing a positive benefit for our world.

                  

 

It is a special reason why we have a project called Sayari, which in the language of Swahilli means - the planet!

 

We are    group from Croatia, artists, writers and dream chasers who want to change world to the better. 

Our campaign is about newest social network application which works like no other app before. It is important for us because app like that can surely do many positive things and discover the beauty of each individual of our planet.

Contributors can help us in a great way to make the app being finished and working. App is still in a making procedure and any help is so much helpful to us.

             

What We Need & What You Get

Most importantly, you are supporting the kind of project that can be useful for you. Surely, each of you has many goals he wants to achieve in life. So why not make it easier path to your goal with the support that Sayari can provide you? You want to be what you have visualized for yourself? Let Sayari be an additional reminder of your day that will take you on the highway to reach your goal.

We need around 50 000 $ and all the money will be invested to improve the app and make it finished. 

  • 15 000$ we need to make it complete and workable 
  • 35 000$ for advertising and upgrade.

The money will be wisely spent for:

  • Programming 
  • Updating 
  • Maintaining 
  • For ads on facebook, blogs ... for everything that will make the application successful and quality. Even if we do not reach our flexible goal all money for sure will be invested in Sayari.

We will be so much grateful if you can help us. Helping someone is an action of honour, and for each help someone give to us we will make it in the future 10 times more for those who needs help like we do now. We are all humans, and helping each other is the way of life!

In addition, in order to our company is that in the future we develop ideas in the initial stage as it is ours, and to support young innovators as now we are.

 

The Impact

If You fund us we will be grateful entire life. If you fund us we can have a chance to reach our dreams and do positive things we want to do. If You fund us the world will have a chance to get something new, something for people to make them happy and lead them through their life.

 

Risks & Challenges

With any new venture there are risks, but we aren't starting from thought that it can not be done. That this is not an option for us and we've always stayed strong throughout.

 We are patient and fully positive group. The possibilities are infinite and there is always a way to get where we want to be. We will do whatever it takes to reach our goals. This campaign is one of opportunity and why not make a use of it.

Our plan is to keep going until we went on the top where we imagine ourself. We do not believe in failure, only in progress which is easier and more teasingly, and we like it.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please, if you can not help us here share our campaign to those who can. Every action you give to us will be helpful. We are just a humans who need help from other humans. The world was not build by one man but all of them by helping each other.

You can use Indiegogo tools to share our campaign. Thank You!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Frank Kurka and I have a small company called usedipaq.com.

We have been supporting users of hp ipaq PDA for applications such as bookscouting, medical records, and other mobile applications long before the ipads, iphones, and tablets even existed.

Eventually technology moves on and the older systems fall by the wayside, ending up in closets, junkyards and shredders. But some of it might not have to end up this way.

This campaign breathes new life into certain older high quality PDA power supplies by offering a way to reuse them with some modern devices that get their power charge from usb type A cables..

By reusing these older supplies, the gear once again makes a contribution to todays technology, the landfills have less to absorb and if you have one/some you don’t have to buy as many new AC chargers as you might have to otherwise. And they won’t burn up and start fires because they have built in crowbar circuits to shut them off if they get too hot.

What We Need & What You Get.

While there are possibly millions of these power supplies around, I’m estimating at least a few thousand might be resued this way if the adapter was available.

I’d like funding to make a few hundred and then to develop a “dongle version” that is smaller than a cable style adapter..

If you can donate $100 - I’ll send you 5x cable-type adapters and power supplies or 10 adapters without supplies, and offer a substantial discount on any future designs when available.

If we don’t reach the full goal, we’ll have enough funds to take care of anyone who did buy a set of 5 . We just won’t be able to make more advanced versions (yet).

The Impact

Advantages?
1) If you need extras for the new gear and your old one works, you don't have to buy another one

2) the older designs are high quality products with advanced features such as thermal crowbar which keeps it from dangerously overheating.

3) the cord is much longer and you can charge more easily on a nightstand or desk. 

Why throw away perfectly good power supplies that respresent high quality engineering and can still do the job?

Why fill the landfills with even more still good electronics?

This is only the beginning, there are more such ideas for reviving products that may become real if this project gets going.


Risks & Challenges

I’ve worked with these devices for 12 years and know what they can do,

The working prototype works, now on to productions, testing, promotion and support..

What about type C cables?

In the future we will develop a Type C - Type C cable adapter.

Currently you can use a Type A to Type C cable, but you will have to pay attention to the current draw. However, unlike cheap power supplies which may over heat, this power supply shuts down for 30 minutes instead of burning up.

In the future, we plan to also offer both wireless charging devices and quick disconnect magnetic cables that work with this power supply.

Other Ways You Can Help

Make a money contribution.

... and get the word out and make some noise about the campaign.
Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

THANKS

story:
NOTE: The closed-beta participation period has concluded and will no longer be available for vgersion 1.0. Backers who select this item will be offered the chance to test future updates.

Our Team

We are freshmen at Babson College with an idea and the determination to pursue it.

  • Will Battel is from Edina, Minnesota. His passions include technology, entrepreneurship, and stock trading. Will is responsible for guiding the app through development and preparing the business for operations in April.
  • Ben Ventura is from Newburyport, Massachusetts. He loves sports, business, and is now experimenting with photography. In addition to accounting, Ben is tasked with ensuring our users are satisfied with the app.
  • Youcef Ziad was born in Algeria and grew up in Holbrook, Massachusetts. He also loves sports as well as art and Mexican food. Youcef is in charge of marketing and is working tirelessly to ensure a successful launch.

The App

Introduction

The next big thing in social media is here. Introducing HiLight, the app that's changing the way we interact with the people around us. Start by activating your very own "HiLight" to see your nearby friends. Want to check another location? Drag and drop additional HiLights onto the map and see who's there. When you're on the move, you can enable notifications that help you connect with friends near you when you otherwise would have missed them.

Inspiration

Our original inspiration for this app was to create a platform that would notify the user when they were near their friends in public. This would solve the problem of missing your friends at big venues such as concerts, festivals, or parades because you were not aware of their presence. We often go to these events and don’t realize that other people we know were there until afterwards. Starting only from this small idea, our app has grown into much more than we originally intended.

What We Need & What You Get

The Costs

Building and launching an app is expensive! See what we're paying for below.

  • App development: design, coding, website, testing, and launch. $$$
  • Cloud-Hosting: making the app accessible to you. $
  • Marketing: Getting the word out and starting the buzz. $$
  • Legal: Creating and protecting a fledgeling business. $$
The Rewards

Check out the cool perk lineup we've put together! Rewards include:

  • Publicize your support in the app.
  • Participate and share your thoughts in our closed-BETA test in April.
  • Discounted price on a powerful new feature coming this summer.
  • Limited-edition HiLight t-shirts (high-quality & comfort)
  • Private newsletter with updates on the project.

Other Ways You Can Help

Want to help but can't contribute? Look below for other ways to help.

  • Share our campaign with your friends.
  • Visit our Facebook page.
  • Download and share the HiLight app when it's released in April!

More About Our App

Using Facebook integration, HiLight allows you to add friends who have the app, or invite those who don't. If you want to meet new people however, you can go public and see everyone else searching publicly. In your settings you are able to set age and gender restraints so you get a feed of those people who are around you. Once you click on their profile, you get their name, pictures, bio, and ability to message them. If you want to know if people are somewhere ahead of time, somewhere out of your current search radius (5 miles), you can place a HiLight in that location and it allows you to view who's there. For example, you're going on vacation and want to see if anyone you know is there or just see what types of people are there. That's the initial app we're releasing but we have a lot of cool features, improvements, and optimization that will be going into updates in the months following our release.

story:
FYNPICK is an online market place for products, services and properties. Think of it as a global medium for sellers and buyers to meet and have a great online buying experience from customer-to-customer (C2C), customer-to-business (C2B) and business-to-business (B2B).

We started building FYNPICK for a simple reason. We want to secure online transactions and make customers’ experience as great as possible

We always put in mind the benefit that would come in building this project. We have realized that building FYNPICK will not just create a good buying experience. It can also improve our economic status by empowering Filipinos to offer great freelance services and unique products online internationally.








The first $4,000 is only enough to cover another 3 months of our full time development. We actually need $50,000 dollars to cover full time web, ios and android development for another 9 months. It would also be enough for us to pay 1 year secured cloud data hosting with maximum backend security. Other donations will go directly to our R&D team for features improvement and maximum customer happy support experience.

$50,000 Financial Breakdown






$7 - We have a common goal

You understand why secured payment and verified customers feedback is important for buyers like you and you want to help us bring this to the world.

You will also receive an A+ Certificate of Appreciation in (PDF Format)



$35 - 32GB OTG Flash Drive (Limited Editin)

Get a cool OTG 32gb Fynpick's USB Flash Drive, limited edition

USB, OTG iPhone, iPAd + OTG Adapter for Android



$35 - Early Bird - Journal for 2016

A 2016 Fynpick’s Journal – Limited Edition 2016 is the year of creativity and changes. Start yours by writing down your dreams, plans and motivation.

Available in different colors.

$41 - Exclusive Fynpick’s T-Shirt

An exclusive Fynpick T-shirt to show your support to our project.

Available in different designs.

$88 - Be known forever

Have your name exclusively displayed on our About page ‘People who made FYNPICK’ section forever. Participate on our online collaboration and decision making.

Also receive an exclusive design '2016 Fynpick's Journal'. Available in different colors.



$103 - 20% Off Duo Pack

We started building FYNPICK for a simple reason. We want to secure online transactions and make customers’ experience as great as possible


We always put in mind the benefit that would come in building this project. We have realized that building FYNPICK will not just create a good buying experience. It can also improve our economic status by empowering Filipinos to offer great freelance services and unique products online internationally.





The first $4,000 is only enough to cover another 3 months of our full time development. We actually need $50,000 dollars to cover full time web, ios and android development for another 9 months. story:
imu is the latest in smartphone security, enhancement and attachable accessory that allows you to comfortably and naturally grip and expand the use of your smart device.

•  Premium Smart Grip & Kickstand

•  Patented Swivel Hinge

•  Strong & Secure Adhesive

One Hand Typing,taking photos, recording, iMu is incredibly to handy to have around.

Can be applied & removed anytime w/o leaving any excess residue.

Pressure sensitive adhesive can be run under water when dirty and be reapplied again and again.

Suitable for all mobile phones and tablets

Compact/slim design and rotates 360 degrees and swivels 180 degrees

THE TEAM:

Other Ways You Can Help

If imu is not for you - maybe you have family and friends who can make a good use of it? Please share on your Facebook, tweet on Twitter, and plus on Google+ - every share is heartily appreciated! You can share through links at the top this page or through our imu page.

story:
On  day  two  of  a five  day  hunt with friends,  I  went  to  my tree  stand  early  to fix  a problem I was having with my tree stand roof. I tried to fix the thin, leaking fabric that was supposed to be keeping me dry. No matter what I did, the roof would tilt badly with the slightest wind. This battle continued for the rest of the day until I cut it from the tree and let it fall to the ground. Instead of enjoying my time outside I was distracted, wet and cold. 

After that day, I vowed that I would find a tree stand roof that would keep me dry or I would build one. 

That’s when the idea that would become the Buck N Cover was born. After five years of research, developing, testing and securing a patent; the Buck N Cover is ready to be shared with hunters, outdoorsmen and outdoorswomen everywhere. We just need your help and support to get our first mass production order filled.   

What is The Buck N Cover?

Imagine sitting in your tree stand under a light weight, structurally strong, long lasting tree stand roof that locks onto the tree and can be left in the woods for many seasons. Now imagine your bow and gear are hanging exactly where you want them as you remain dry on those wet winter days. You my friend, are sitting under a Buck N Cover.


Universal Tree Stand Roof Design

The Buck N Cover is a patented solid tree stand roof made to fit over single and double ladder-stands, climbers and chain-on stands. Throw away your umbrellas and flimsy protection covers and invest in a solid structure that will help protect you from Mother Nature for years to come. ­


American Structure, Quality Built

We designed the Buck N Cover with the highest respect for quality, durability and longevity. The approximately 4’ x 4’ powder coated aluminum frame will not rust and is engineered to be a permanent addition to your tree stand. With the durable camouflage poly-vinyl roof, the Buck N Cover can hang over your stand for this hunting season and seasons to come.

Perfect Limb Technology for Hands-Free Hunting

Designed by hunters for hunters, enjoy the freedom the Buck N Cover brings by giving you custom options for hands-free hunting. We created perfect limb technology right on the roof that gives you the choice of 30 separate and adjustable hanging locations for hooks that can twist 360 degrees. Now you can hang your gear and stay out of the rain with just one product.

Easy, Swift and Safe Assembly

Built with safety as a priority, the Buck N Cover was designed at an impressively low weight of 13lbs. In just 20 minutes, assemble the Buck N Cover at ground-level; then raise and fasten the tree bracket to the tree; bring up the roof and maneuver it over your head with one-hand, leaving your other hand free for safety; attach it to the tree bracket and prepare yourself to have your most enjoyable tree stand hunt yet.


Want to See the Buck N Cover in the Rain?

Watch our quality roof in action in this short rain demonstration video. Remember the last time you were out in the forest under a cheap, flimsy tree stand umbrella? We hope you can see why our innovative, hands-free, patented product is the solution you have been looking for. 

 

What Others Are Saying About the Buck N Cover

We are looking forward to hearing what you have to say about your new quality tree stand roof! Head over to our Facebook page or Shoot Us An Email if you have any questions at all. We hope to build a long lasting relationship with you all, our first supporters, and welcome any feedback you have.  

Here's What's Included When You Get the Buck N Cover

                                

The Perfect Christmas Gift for Tree Stand Hunters 

Keep your loved ones protected, dry and shaded while they spend all day up in their tree stands. If you know a tree stand hunter that could benefit from having customized locations to hang their gear, give them the gift of hands-free hunting this season. 

The quicker you purchase your Buck N Cover, the quicker we can get our first production orders to our American-based manufacturer. While we cannot make promises of delivery before Christmas, we can promise to keep you constantly updated as to the delivery status day. 

                               

If you would like us to include a customized holiday card in our perks, we will send out a special stocking-stuffer card to deliver Christmas Day. Head over to our Facebook page or Shoot Us An Email to let us know you would like us to add this Christmas Card holiday perk. 

Is the Buck N Cover tree stand roof for permanent or temporary use?

The Buck N Cover is meant to be a permanent solution for your tree stand, but can be removed with ease if so needed. We recommend putting the Buck N Cover over your favorite tree stands and leaving them all season long.

What kinds of maintenance does the Buck N Cover require?

The Buck N Cover needs very little maintenance. We recommend removing the “roof assembly” at the end of the season to reduce debris build-up on top of the roof. We also recommend checking the ratchet strap for wear and tightening any loose nuts and bolts.

Is the Buck N Cover compatible with all tree stands? 

Yes, the Buck N Cover attaches to the tree above your single, double, chain-on or climber tree stand.

Can I buy more hooks for my Buck N Cover?

Yes, we sell packages of hooks. Contact us to learn more about how to place an order for additional hooks.

What tools are needed to assemble and disassemble?

The only tools needed to assemble and disassemble the Buck N Cover are a pair of ½” wrenches. Watch our Buck N Cover instructional and tips videos for help.

How long does it take to assemble the Buck N Cover?

Assembly of the Buck N Cover at ground level takes 15 to 20 minutes. It takes about 10 minutes to raise and attach the Buck N Cover to the tree.

What material is the roof and frame made out of?

The Buck N Cover roof is made of waterproof 18 ounce polyvinyl material that resists sun and weather degradation. The frame is made of light weight powder coated aluminum so it will not rust.

How much weight can the Buck N Cover hold?

We recommend less than ten pounds of total weight on the “roof assembly” and less than 10 pounds on the “tree bracket” equipment hooks.

How long will my Buck N Cover last?

The Buck N Cover frame does not rust and the polyvinyl material resists rot, wear and tear. We have left a Buck N Cover in the woods for over 2 years straight and it still looks and performs like new.

Is the Buck N Cover safe for children and teenagers to use?

The Buck N Cover is safe for children and teenagers to sit under as long as they are wearing a safety harness, following the tree stand manufacturer’s safety instructions and have adult supervision.

When will my order be shipped?

We will begin manufacturing as soon as our Indiegogo campaign has finished. Since we produce the Buck N Cover in the United States, we should start shipping shortly after that. We will send email updates on the progress of your order.

Can I gift my order to someone?

Yes, just fill out the ordering information and ship the Buck N Cover to that special someone.

Do you sell other high quality outdoor products?

The Buck N Cover is Stand Outdoors first product, but we have several other products on the drawing board. With your support, we can bring you more quality products in the future.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share our campaign with friends and family. Spreading the word is the best and fastest way to help us reach our goal! 

What Kind of Company Are You Supporting?

We think it's important for you to know more about us as a company and our hunting styles. Only then can you fully appreciate how your contributions and support will affect our brand and all future products we intend to bring to the market.Visit our Facebook albums dedicated to showcasing who we are as people, hunters and our way of doing business.

story:
3D printing has boomed in the past few years. Every variety of printer from cheap desktop models to prohibitively expensive industrial-grade models have saturated the market. While choice for the consumer is good, sometimes it can be confusing to find just exactly what you require for personal use. 

So, we went out and made it for you. 


While 3D printers are "trending towards the mainstream" we still haven't found one that quite fits the needs of individual users, hobbyists, free-lance professionals or small businesses. One that is affordable, compact and sacrifices little, if nothing, in terms of printing resolution.


Because a normal DLP engine shoots its beam in a wide spectrum the range causes large variability in light intensity throughout the beam. The light towards the center shines the brightest and most intensely while the light at the edges are comparatively very weak. Such uneven light produces unevenness in the resulting print out, causing variance with the modeling data you inputted.

The 100% UV engine equipped on the G Printer is focused so that it provides a much more uniform beam in terms of light intensity. This allows for greater precision in printing particularly when it comes to smooth surfaces and straight lines.

The G Printer Design Functionality in a compact Design. The G Printer was designed to fit in any sort of working space. Whether you're working for home or the office, we guarantee G Printer can operate without being a burden. However, for this small size, G Printer has an extraordinary printing capacity being capable of printable sizes of 5.1x 3.1x 5.5 (inches).


Working with "Materialise", we also developed our own proprietary G Printer Studio that comes with Materialise software embedded. We also pre-installed automatic support software. There is no need for you to worry about properly placing supports to maintain the structure of your work. 


Materialise produces the best performance software for 3D printing solutions. G Printer and Materialise have partnered together to deliver the best 3D printing solution out there. Success or failure of a complete print is dependent on having the right supports added to your design when utilizing SLA and/or SLA-DLP. 

Through our G Printer Studio, you will be provided strong automated structure features so your design will come out with the right supports it needs to come out as a sturdy object. G Printer Studio supports various file types such as STL, OBJ, PLY, 3DS, etc. Easy operation provides quick and automated support for data slicing. 


With our software, supports will be placed in the most efficient locations so that you don't waste a drop of resin. Simply use the built-in support function.


Photocurable resins start to cure once they receive UV light. General Digital Light Processing (DLP) utilizes 90% visible rays. The remaining 10% is UV. This means that general DLP printers are wasting 90% and print slow. The output accuracy is also low because the resins are not fully cured. 


G Printer is 100% UV. Because of this, printing speeds are fast and precise while guaranteeing that the resins are fully cured. Details on a 3D printout are shown on the XY resolution, and is measured in microns. The G Printer is capable of printing details at a 100 Micron degree of precision, meaning it has the ability to make holes as small as 100 Micron-long as well as 100 Micron-long cylinders.

The UV rays are used to harden the photopolymer resin. 100% UV projectors are more precise as the beam radiates only on the wavelength of 405 nanometers("nm"), the violet part of the spectrum . Most commercial projectors radiate light from 350nm to 700nm. By focusing the beam to only the light useful for curing resin, precision printing results.



By using a 100% UV engine, the G Printer minimizes heat production as well. Commercial projectors, by radiating all over the spectrum, create a huge amount of energy waste which produces excess heat. The creation of this excess heat can lead to overheating, which is why most projectors require a cooling system such as a fan. While in larger settings this may be OK, in a small office or home, having a fan running constantly can create distracting noise pollution.


Overheating also has the detriment of potentially overworking your machine causing it to lose battery life and functionality over time. In addition, this energy waste often forces you to replace the projector bulb more frequently, and the bulbs are not cheap. Our G Printer, with its 100% UV Projector lasts longer than other 3D printers and will last for at least 10,000 hours so there's less of a need to replace the bulb.


In cooperation with a local company, we have made our own line of resins that work seamlessly with the G Printer. Our current offering includes both standards resins, which have been ensured to be sturdy and non-harmful to the human body, and a casting resin.

However, G Printer users are free to use whatever resins they are comfortable with. G Printer is highly compatible with a variety of lines of resins including typical UV resins.

3D printers on the market with expedient functionality are too costly for an individual user to invest in. The G Printer maximizes the strengths of a 3D printer yet makes it fully accessible for individual users. Not only its price but also in its overall design. G Printer was conceptualized with the express purpose of making a 3D printer available and useful to all without sacrificing printing resolution.

Finally the power of 3D printing is available for all!





Risks & Challenges

With any campaign, there are always risks and challenges when it comes to dealing with production and logistics. With that said, we're confident in our final prototype and it's ready to go. All we need is the proper funding to product G Printer while keeping the costs as low as possible so backers and enthusiasts can get their own printer for their home or office. We're hoping all of you will find out printer worth supporting and want to thank everyone in advance!
story_txt:
3D printing has boomed in the past few years. Every variety of printer from cheap desktop models to prohibitively expensive industrial-grade models have saturated the market. While choice for the consumer is good, sometimes it can be confusing to find just exactly what you require for personal use. So, we went out and made it for you. 


3D printing works by creating one layer at a time. Printing speed depends on how fast a printer can print each layer. Something that's very important. UV DLP printing is able to print an entire layer at a time versus Laser printers that must focus their beams on a single point in a layer and move from there. Imagine writing the alphabet. UV DLP printing would print the entire alphabet at once, like a stamp. A laser printer would need to draw out each letter one at a time (like handwriting). 




UV DLP 3D printing speeds work regardless of object size or count whereas Laser printing is greatly affected by object size and count. As the size or count increases, Laser 3D printing times will increase exponentially. 





While 3D printers are "trending towards the mainstream" we still haven't found one that quite fits the needs of individual users, hobbyists, free-lance professionals or small businesses. One that is affordable, compact and sacrifices little, if nothing, in terms of printing resolution.Because a normal DLP engine shoots its beam in a wide spectrum the range causes large variability in light intensity throughout the beam. The light towards the center shines the brightest and most intensely while the light at the edges are comparatively very weak. Such uneven light produces unevenness in the resulting print out, causing variance with the modeling data you inputted.The 100% UV engine equipped on the G Printer is focused so that it provides a much more uniform beam in terms of light intensity. This allows for greater precision in printing particularly when it comes to smooth surfaces and straight lines.The G Printer Design Functionality in a compact Design. The G Printer was designed to fit in any sort of working space. Whether you're working for home or the office, we guarantee G Printer can operate without being a burden. However, for this small size, G Printer has an extraordinary printing capacity being capable of printable sizes of 5.1x 3.1x 5.5 (inches).

Existing DLP printers must be controlled through the connection of a PC. This is because although the printer has a PCB to control the DLP, they must rely on graphics processing from the connected PC. This means that printing is heavily dependant on the connected PC and will determine success or failure. 
Disadvantages of non-embedded systems:



Printing stops if the connection between your PC and printer is disconnected. 



Printing stops if your PC freezes or the power fails.



Printing will be affected depending on what other programs are being run simultaneously on your PC that take up a lot of system resources.




G Printer works without the need for a connected PC or network. The embedded support system manages the graphics video signal and DLP engine directly. This guarantees stability when printing. 


G Printer is the first UV DLP 3D printer that eliminates the need for a PC or wifi network for those long printing hours. Our embedded system allows simple plug and play from a standard USB drive and the system will read the files on your drive and print directly. You don't need to worry about the power on your computer going out or your network having lag issues. 


Working with "Materialise", we also developed our own proprietary G Printer Studio that comes with Materialise software embedded. We also pre-installed automatic support software. Because of this, printing speeds are fast and precise while guaranteeing that the resins are fully cured. Details on a 3D printout are shown on the XY resolution, and is measured in microns. The G Printer is capable of printing details at a 100 Micron degree of precision, meaning it has the ability to make holes as small as 100 Micron-long as well as 100 Micron-long cylinders.

Most commercial projectors radiate light from 350nm to 700nm. By focusing the beam to only the light useful for curing resin, precision printing results.

The creation of this excess heat can lead to overheating, which is why most projectors require a cooling system such as a fan. While in larger settings this may be OK, in a small office or home, having a fan running constantly can create distracting noise pollution.





Overheating also has the detriment of potentially overworking your machine causing it to lose battery life and functionality over time. In addition, this energy waste often forces you to replace the projector bulb more frequently, and the bulbs are not cheap. Our G Printer, with its 100% UV Projector lasts longer than other 3D printers and will last for at least 10,000 hours so there's less of a need to replace the bulb.





In cooperation with a local company, we have made our own line of resins that work seamlessly with the G Printer. Our current offering includes both standards resins, which have been ensured to be sturdy and non-harmful to the human body, and a casting resin.
However, G Printer users are free to use whatever resins they are comfortable with. G Printer is highly compatible with a variety of lines of resins including typical UV resins.
3D printers on the market with expedient functionality are too costly for an individual user to invest in. The G Printer maximizes the strengths of a 3D printer yet makes it fully accessible for individual users. Not only its price but also in its overall design. G Printer was conceptualized with the express purpose of making a 3D printer available and useful to all without sacrificing printing resolution.
Finally the power of 3D printing is available for all!






















Delivery of perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.






We want to help those around the world create and find their own value with a personal Gooo3D G Printer. 
Make your dreams into reality with our 3D Printer and create what your mind can only imagine. 
We will not continue to strive until every one of our supporters is happy with G Printer.

Risks & Challenges
With any campaign, there are always risks and challenges when it comes to dealing with production and logistics. With that said, we're confident in our final prototype and it's ready to go. All we need is the proper funding to product G Printer while keeping the costs as low as possible so backers and enthusiasts can get their own printer for their home or office. We're hoping all of you will find out printer worth supporting and want to thank everyone in advance!

story:
With MOQI’s built in buttons there’s no need to use the touch screen or accidently click off the game. You’ll have a quicker response, more customization, and better gameplay than any opponent you meet online.

You don’t need to be in front of a computer or console to get the feeling of playing E-sport games. With MOQI’s built in 360-degree thumbstick (tested and rated for 5,000,000 uses) you’ll be able to conquer any challenger. And thanks to its built-in tracking and connection you’ll never experience any lag between moving your joy-sticks and moving your in-game avatars!

MOQI arrives with pre-built controls for almost any games! You can set and change the controls to fit your play-style for any game you’re playing. Check out the preset button arrangement for PUBG below!


 

You can even create macros and link several combination of buttons together to activate at once. These can be used as rapid-fire buttons to give you an edge over an opponent. You can even set the time you want between buttons to be activated, ranging between 0.2 to 1 seconds.


 

The MOQI Helper is built to support your gaming by being able to recognize a connected keyboard and mouse so you can make your PUBG matches even more efficient. MOQI Helper makes the connection process simple and ensures no unnecessary adapters are required to turn your smartphone into a precise gaming experience.

Become a pro at any mobile game with MOQI. No lag, no overheating, and total control of your actions are waiting.

Jump into a game of FortNite or PUBG and dominate the competition with moves and speed they’ll never see coming thanks to the built-in controls, all the while without having any lag thanks to a powerful and quick CPU and loads of RAM.

The MOQI is compatible with almost all kinds of Android emulators so you can play your console favorite games on a smartphone designed for gaming.

Enjoy playing old school Pokemon or jumping back into your favorite old school RPGs like Final Fantasy X. And with the built-in controls and joysticks you will have the entire screen to play (no sacrifice of screen space for touch screen emulated controls!) while also having the joy of touching and pressing physical buttons!


MOQI’s unique Do Not Disturb function ensures you will never have a text or call take you out mid-game, while also monitoring MOQI’s overall CPU load and auto assigning tasks to prioritize your gaming.

Become a pro at any mobile game with MOQI. No lag, no overheating, and total control of your actions are waiting.

Play like a pro in any mobile game with MOQI. Jump into a game of FortNite or PUBG and dominate the competition with moves and speed they’ll never see coming with the built-in controls, or slay rows of mobs in Diablo Immortal without any lag thanks to a powerful and quick CPU and loads of RAM. Don’t let the specs of your current phone hold you back anymore.

MOQI uses the Snapdragon processors as the are designed to give users a perfect balance of power and efficiency while optimizing AI, power, rendering and performance for your mobile gaming experience.

With 6GB of RAM the MOQI will be able to load, process, and run your favourite mobile games while also allowing you to multitask and run multiple apps at once without any loading time.

With so much memory to fill up you’ll never run out of space. Download and play your favourite games without fear of running out of space. And if you do find yourself low on GB’s you can expand the memory with MOQI’s Micro-SD/TF slot to add an extra 258 GB of space.

MOQI's 6” screen stands out from competitors and boasts a 1920x1080 display, delivering an unbelievably visual experience through an HD display and better color accuracy to take your gaming to next level.

MOQI's powerful 6000mAh battery lets you game all day. Run multiple apps without draining your power down quickly to get even more enjoyment out of your phone.

MOQi is eschewing the standard practise of having a built-in battery. MOQI’s large battery is fully removable and replaceable, allowing you to swap it out in a pinch if you’re running low on power with no outlet in sight.

Spend less time charging and more time playing thanks to MOQI’s use of Qualcomm QC 3.0 fast charging technology, which is a fourfold increase in charging times over conventional charges and a 40% increase since they first introduced QC.

You can’t play hard without hardware. Our cooling system efficiently sustains the best working temperature thanks to its liquid cooling tech to provide higher average frame rates, for a cooler and more comfortable experience.

Using Qualcomm smart speaker power amplifier’s to create a stereo sound experience for any games or videos you’re playing, MOQI is able to deliver unrivaled gaming sessions.
MOQi uses Android 8.1 OREO for a smarter, faster, more powerful and sweeter OS experience. It provides a 2x faster boot speed on apps and tastes and minimizing background activity to keep your device running optimally.

MOQI supports the use of dual SIM cards. With a second SIM card is installed, the MOQI allows users to switch between two separate mobile network services manually, has hardware support for keeping both connections in a "standby" state for automatic switching, and has individual transceivers for maintaining both network connections at once.

Countries Carriers
USA AT&T, Verizon, T-Mobile, Sprint, ...
Canada Bell, Rogers, Fido, ...
UK O2, Vodafone, EE, 3(Three), ...
German Telekom, Vodafone, O2, E-Plus, ...
France ORANGE, SFR, BOUYGUES, Telecom, ...
Additional Euro Countries TIM, Swisscom, KPN, Comviq, E-plus, T Mobile , ...
SIG Singtel, Starhub, Mobile One, ...
HK PCCW, 3HK, Smartone, CMHK, UnicomHK, ...
... ...

 

If you can’t find your carrier in the chart above please check the Band Details section below in our Tech Specs Portion of the campaign to see if your carrier's band is compatible. 

OR

Visit https://www.frequencycheck.com/countries and manually cross-reference the available bands in your home country to see if they are compatible with the MOQI Phone.

MOQI is built with a 16mp HD camera so you can capture stunning photos or Pokemon in vivid clarity! It’ll even make running discord or mobile streaming a simple and clear experience.

Basic Information
Screen Size 6.0inch, 16.7M colors
Touch Panel Gorilla Glass 3, Capacitive touch panel, OGS
Screen Resolution 1920*1080
Network Type Dual cards Dual standby (Nano cards)
Network Mode LTE/WCDMA/GSM
Wireless LTE FDD/TDD R9 Cat12 DC-HSPA+ 42/11Mbps/EDGE
Wifi 802.11ac /abgn，Bluetooth 5.0+HS，GPS + AGPS， Support Qualcomm aptX
Frequency Bands GSM: B2, B3, B5, B8
CDMA: B5
WCDMA: B1, B2, B5, B8
TD-SCDMA: B34, B39
CDMA2000: B5
LTE FDD: B1, B2, B3, B4, B7, B8
LTE TDD: B38, B39, B40, B41
Keyboard and Buttons Virtual QWERTY keyboard, dual joysticks, gamepad
Color Black
Size 207*96*15mm
Weight About 330g (battery 117g)
Hardware Information
System MUCH UI (Based on Android 8.1, Customized)
CPU SDM710
Cores OCTA-core
RAM 6GB 
ROM 64GB 
Battery Type Lithium Polymer Battery (replaceable)
Battery Capacity 6000mAh
Basic Functions
Type-in Virtual keyboard, handwriting
Call Records Received+Called+Missed
Unique Functions Text message sending delay, Button Adjustment, One-touch clear to background task, Notification and message sections, Start-up task manager, Charging-time reminder, Double Joystick, Buttons gaming control, Passive shutdown reminder,free of disturbance while gaming, Key code DIY
Other Functions SMS, MMS, Recorder, Radio, Airplane Mode, Scene Modes, Themes, Alert, Calculator, Note, Schedule, Calendar, Movie Studio, etc.
Product Features
GPS Built-in GPS, A-GPS Available
Sensor 9-axis gravity sensor, Light sensor, Proximity sensor
Other Functions Map App, 3D Acceleration, Flashlight
Camera Functions
Rear Camera 16MP
Flash LED lighting
Auto-Focus Available
Digital Zoom Available
Macro Shooting Available
CMOS Available
Front Camera 5MP
Entertainment
Video 4Kx2K30fps Hard Decoding, H.265, H.264, MPEG4, MPEG2, VC-1, H.263, etc. available
Audio MP3、WMA、WAV、OGG、WMAlossless、APE 、AMR、FLAC、AAC etc. available, 2-way D-type amplifier stereo output
Interface
USB Type C Support 12V1.5A /9V 2A/5V 3A quick charge QC3.0
Headphone Four-part 3.5mm stereo headphone interface (CTIA standard)

 

 

MOQI is a subsidiary of Snail Digital. We have been producing the original sound button mobile game for 8 years, building 10 products since 2011. Our aim is to give mobile gamers a better gaming experience.

Founded in 2000, Snail Digital is an early 3D virtual digital technology research and development enterprise in China and an Internet company engaged in the research and development of 3D online games in China. It is also an innovative virtual carrier business in the game industry. At present, the snail digital business covers the field of games, communications and hardware, forming a whole industry chain development system integrating software and hardware. It is a combination of technology development, content development, global distribution, platform operation, traffic management and terminal manufacturing capabilities.

Snail Digital's game business covers PC large-end games, mobile games, web games, VR games, AR games, console games and many other fields. Since the successful development of the 3D online game "Navigation Century" in 2004, Snail Digital has accumulated a number of independent research and development of virtual digital technology intellectual property, including the Voyager engine, D1XN engine, Flexi engine, etc. It has operated more than 100 different versions of digital entertainment products such as "Nautical Century", "Age of Wushu" and "Taiji Panda".

story:
What is Bask?

Bask is one of the worlds first autonomous mobile chargers. It uses a mixture of light and VpGB (vibrations and movements) to continually charge itself on-the-go. 

We have designed Bask to be portable, sleek and reliable. It can fully charge in as little as one hour and will provide you with up to 60 minutes of talk time or 120 minutes of stand-by time.

We will start off by offering Bask or the iPhone 5/5S, iPhone 6/6S and 6 Plus/6S Plus. We will expand to iPad Mini/Air and other mobile devices.

  • Durable and waterproof casing.
  • Carrying Sleeve
  • Fully charged after just 1 hour in the sun
  • Harnesses power from VpGB technology 
  • Provides up to 60 minutes of talk time (120 minutes standby) 
  • Comes fully charged
  • 2 year warranty
  • Patent Pending
  • Trademark Submitted


How does it work?

Within Bask are two batteries. The first is a VpGB (vibration powered generating battery) which creates and stores power from your daily movements. The second is a rechargeable battery which is powered by the solar cells located on the front and back of Bask.  
Bask has been tested with an output of 2.5 amps.


What phones is Bask compatible with?

Bask has unlimited potential and can be designed to accompany any number of devices. Currently Bask is only compatible with:

  • iPhone 5
  • iPhone 5S
  • iPhone 6
  • iPhone 6S
  • iPhone 6 Plus
  • iPhone 6S Plus

If we reach our stretch funding goals, we can also bring Bask to iPad as well as other devices. 


What will the funds be used for?

The funds raised from this campaign will be used for the following:

  • Legal Costs (Attorney Fees, Corporate Filings, Etc.)
  • Trademark and additional patents
  • Manufacturing a minimum of 2,500 Bask units
  • Marketing materials and advertising 
  • Company Overhead (Office Space, Equipment, Supplies, Insurance, Etc)
  • Shipping Materials
  • Postage Cost
  • Business and financial consultants regarding Series A funding.

How does Bask attach to my phone?

We designed Bask to fit securely. Once on the phone, Bask snaps into place and there's no risk of it detaching during use.


What are your challenges moving forward? 

We've managed to develop and create a prototype, and we're ready to share it with the world. However we do face a few challenges moving forward, the first of which is covering the cost to manufacture the first 2,500 units. 

The second challenge we're facing is product awareness. We hope by launching our campaign we can reach our minimum funding goals and help bring product awareness to Bask with the built in customer base IndieGogo provides.


Funding Goals?

Bask has unlimited potential and with your help, we can expand to additional mobile devices and tablets. 

Our minimum funding goal of $25,000.00 will allow us to offer Bask for the iPhone iPhone 5/5S and iPhone 6/6 Plus. Our stretch campaign goals would allow us to offer Bask for the iPad Air and iPad Mini as well as Samsung devices.

  • At $75,000.00 we can offer additional colors and finishes.
  • At $125,000.00 we can expand to the iPad Mini.
  • At $200,000.00 we can expand to the iPad Air 2.
  • At $250,000.00 we can expand to include Samsung devices.

Evolution of Bask? 

Bask took months to develop and perfect. Here are the first early renderings of what led to Bask.


Our first 3D printed prototype


Our first working prototype on an iPhone 5S


What does your Warranty mean?

We believe in Bask and the quality of our product so much we are willing to back it by a two year warranty. If your device ever stops working or breaks in the first two years, we'll replace it, no questions asked. 


Color Options?

Currently we only offer black however we are working hard to bring a wide variety of colors and finishes to the product line. We've developed a line of premium finishes to allow users to make a statement.

Black (Standard)


Gold (Near future)


We will also be launching a wide variety of colors to better fit your individual style. 

Have a color suggestion? Tweet it to us! @baskmobile


How else can you help?

If you can't afford to contribute, we would still love your help. Please share our campaign with your friends and family. Tweet. Facebook. Instagram.

We sincerely thank you! 

Updates?

We're happy to keep you updated on our progress along the way. Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for weekly updates.


FAQ

Will you be making one for non iPhones?

Absolutely! If we can reach our goals, we'll expand to the Samsung Galaxy line.

How do you charge it?

You can charge bask two different rays. (1) shake it for a good 5 minutes and you can recharge the VpGB battery located inside. Rather than shake it, you can just carry it in your pocket or purse, your daily walking and movements will help charge the battery. (2) the second way to charge Bask is to lay it in the sunlight, either in a window or dash of a car, within one hour, it will be fully charged.

How much of a charge will Bask give my phone?

This varies from each individual user's daily use. In product testing, Bask provided an additional 60 minutes of talk time or 120 minutes of standby use. Since Bask is constantly recharging, the charge obtained may provide more than the estimated 60 minutes.

What is the amps output?

We have tested Bask at 2.5 amps.

Rather than shake it, you can just carry it in your pocket or purse, your daily walking and movements will help charge the battery. (2) the second way to charge Bask is to lay it in the sunlight, either in a window or dash of a car, within one hour, it will be fully charged.
How much of a charge will Bask give my phone?
This varies from each individual user's daily use. In product testing, Bask provided an additional 60 minutes of talk time or 120 minutes of standby use. Since Bask is constantly recharging, the charge obtained may provide more than the estimated 60 minutes.
What is the amps output?
We have tested Bask at 2.5 amps.

story:
You may have experienced the followings when you drive:

  • Your phone rings when you are driving
  • You don’t like the playlist in your phone
  • You need to use GPS when you are in somewhere unfamiliar
  • The phone is locked when you want to check the time

Caution – Using your mobile phone when you drive causes distraction and even danger!


Now, we proudly present eDriving – a device that allows you to focus on driving.

  • It can play and control the playlist in your phone
  • Display GPS of higher accuracy when you drive
  • Pick up or decline call simply by one button
  • Fast turn-on of Siri
  • Lock/unlock your phone by one button without touching the phone
  • Even more convenient usage with the dedicated app
  • Offer Framework Library for free, communication with 3rd-party APP for eDriving


For both driving and biking

eDriving is also applicable to bikes
  • Same functions to suit different needs
  • eDriving features Bluetooth 4.0 for quick and stable connection to mobile phone
  • Minimal energy consumption – the built-in battery can be used up to two years, which is more environmentally-friendly
  • Suitable for different conditions and users


3 Colour options for each type


Use eDriving and focus on the drive!




FAQ

Q:How does it work?

A:Easier mobile phone control is enabled through connecting eDriving to the phone by Bluetooth 4.0.

Q:How to connect?

A:Turn on the Bluetooth function on the mobile phone. Click “eDriving” and connect the phone to the device.

Q:Why the connection fails?

A:Please check if the Bluetooth has been turned on already. If so, please shut it down and turn it on again. If it still fails, please change the battery and try all over again.

Q: eDriving is applicable to what device?

A:iPhone 5,5S,5SE,5C,6,6S,6 Plus,6S Plus

Note: iOS7 or more updated iOS version is needed.

Q: Does eDriving run on Android?

A:Yes for Android 4.4 to 6.0, however, Android does not support call pick-up.

Q:Where can I download the eDriving App?

A:Open the Appstore on your phone and search for “eDriving”.

Q:Does eDriving use mobile data?

A:It will use mobile data when you use an eDriving App or other software to play online music, or when you use GPS.

Q:Can eDriving control Whatsapp / Line / Pandora or the other 3rd party Apps?

A:These 3rd party apps didn't use our Framework,we cannot promise to control them.

Q:Can I still use eDriving without downloading the app?

A:Yes. Through Bluetooth connection, eDriving can perform basic control over your phone. However, you are recommended to download the App for a more holistic experience.

Q:How long does the battery last?

A:The battery normally lasts for two years.

Q:Is eDriving water-proof?

A:eDriving is slightly water-proof. You are suggested to keep eDriving away from water.

Q:What should I do if water leaks into eDriving?

A:Remove the battery immediately. Put it and the eDriving with a moist absorber in a cool and dry place.

Q:How long does the delivery take?

A:It depends on the distance for the delivery.

Q:Can I refund?

A:Please contact indiegogo

Q:Is eDriving also available at other channel?

A:eDriving is only available at indiegogo.

Q:How can I contact you if I have other questions?

A:Please contact us by:

Email：jasonyang84022@gmail.com
