story:
What is Apid?

Apid is the first safe online store where anyone can sell mobile apps or software for Mac or Windows. Anyone can sell for free with our easy to navigate design and take over 75% profit from each sale, thats more profit from selling on Apple's App Store or Google's Play Store. We have designed the website and are in final stages of designing the companion mobile app. Apid is something different because never before has there been a site where you can safely purchase mobile apps and PC or Mac software in the same place. There are no fees to pay which means it's perfect for starting out developers, no matter what they're developing.

What Makes Apid 'Safe'?

Everything sold on Apid is tried, tested and approved before being published onto the site. We understand that this means that applications are not immediately available for download but it does allow it to be as safe as possible. 

How Apid Came To Be

As app developers we're always looking for more ways to get our apps to the people, and we noticed that not every android device we bought had google play on it. And whilst looking for even more software to make our apps better we couldn't find a site with the software we wanted that didn't look like we were going to download a virus. So from there we came up with the idea of a safe, cheap option for all developers that'll work with all android devices.

We Need Just £500 from you!

What? Just £500, why so little?

Well we only need your support and for you all to show your interest in our idea. We only need enough money to launch our beta. The website will be in controlled beta testing with the money raised; it'll help improve security, improve app connectivity and test high traffic situations. From showing your interest and support, after beta sponsors and investors are willing to pay the rest. However for that to happen we need you to show your interest and  support.

The Impact

Your contribution and support could change the whole internet for the better. Our project not only makes purchasing apps for your mobile or software for you computer easy and safe it will persuade other websites to improve safety features too. All this by simply showing your support. Not only will it impact other websites but starting out developers; it'll provide them with a great free mobile app market environment that they'll take a better percentage per app than Google Play and the App Store.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you wish to help in any other way please contact us at theiconapps@gmail.com to arrange something else. If you want to get involved and help out please also feel free to contact us via the email provided.

Thank you for showing your interest in Apid.

To find out more go to http://adf.ly/1RyigV or email us at theiconapps@gmail.com

story:
Short Summary

Hello! I am a visual artist who graduated with a Computer Science degree. My twin-brother and I developed professional software for visual artists working on Microsoft Windows and Mac OS. This program received great responses from professionals. 

What We Need & What You Get

Right now, our aim is to release a version for the new iPad Pro. We do not want this app to be limited in functionality; however, since it is just two of us working on it, we are having a hard time, which is why we are asking for your help. 
Our goal is to raise 7000$. A significant part of the sum will go for recruiting programmers. Another part will be used to promote our software through distinguished visual artists. In case we fail to achieve the set goal, we will certainly complete our software, but it will much more time and work for each individual in this project. 
We can assure that the Ipad version will inherit every feature of published PC and Mac versions. If you are interested in how the finished product will look like, you can find the main features of the Mac and PC versions on our website: http://www.paintstormstudio.com/index.html

The Impact

We can assure that the iPad version will inherit every feature of published PC and Mac versions. If you are interested in how the finished will look like, you can find the main features of the Mac and PC versions on our website: http://www.paintstormstudio.com/index.html

Other Ways You Can Help

We would be appreciate to you for sharing this project to your friends! If you have some questions or ideas to improve our software you can contact me by email: kai@paintstormstudio.com

story:
As mentioned on:

       

                     

 

                       

           

 

We Are Yuni! (With You. For You. Together)

Mission Statement:

Yuni Design LLC mission is to design, develop, manufacture and market an add-on system for people with functional disabilities on powered wheelchairs. Our main focus is to improve people’s lives and have our products built with high quality, performance, safety and functionality. Our focus motivates us every day to achieve compelling product solutions for our users through efficiency in product development, manufacturing and service at an affordable cost.﻿

Company Vision:

"Yuni Design, LLC is composed of close friends and family willing to create innovative devices to meet the needs of the assistive technology community. I founded Yuni Design in September of 2015 as I wanted to start up my own technological company. I have a passion to help lead and create designs to introduce society to innovative technologies that could benefit them in the long run. I see some innovation in the world today, but feel that innovation is limited from not continuing what was started. I envision this company in pushing its limits further in creating enhanced innovations that take advantage of technology’s true potential.﻿﻿"

﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿

Phuoc Phan 

Founder and CEO﻿

How & Why YuniDetect Started

Our current beta-tester(To protect the identity of the beta-tester and health care facility that the beta-tester attends, this information can not be disclosed) is currently participating in the Orthopedic Therapy Program at the Health Care Facility in Worcester, MA.  This facility has been caring for people who have the ability to thrive when given the support needed. Their mission is to serve others which has been the cornerstone of the foundation. They are the go-to service for families that support their loved ones with a disability. The Assistive Technology Program is one of their most important initiatives to support families and their loved ones. 

Our Beta-tester has good use of the left arm, meaning the beta-tester has good functionality from the shoulder to the fingers.  The beta-tester also has good strength in both the left arm and leg.  The beta-user right appendages are not nearly as strong and not functional in comparison to the left side.  The beta-user left hand has the fine motor skills needed to operate the electric wheelchair joystick and press buttons, while the right hand can not even hold objects steady for the left hand to use.  Even though the beta-tester has good strength and coordination in the left appendages, the beta-user has slow reaction times with them.

The beta-tester is able to follow very basic directions.  The beta-tester can understand and answer yes/no questions and understand who/what/where/when/why questions.  The beta-user is also able to pick a solution from 2-3 options that are given.  The beta-user attention span to tasks only lasts for about 30 minutes and needs to be supervised while operating the electric wheelchair.

Therefore, Yuni Design was able to design and create a wheelchair add-on system, which gives the user the independence to drive the powered wheelchair with a reduction of crashes. Anyone who is wheelchair bound could utilize this system in order to reduce collisions with other people or objects in their path.  This system will warn, stop, or automatically turn the user away from an object/person in order to reduce collisions that could potentially harm the user.

Importance of Spreading the Word

After our experience in making our add-on system for our beta-tester, it has taught us that there are a lot of people in this world that are in need of technology helping them to live a better life. While working with the beta-tester, we saw that the technology that the beta-tester was using, was doing its job, but fell short in providing independence,saftey and happiness for the user and the caregiver. I was able to see the beta-tester smile again and in a sense gain some independence and saftey back with the technology we created. After seeing what we created was successful we wanted to share this opportunity with others, like our beta-tester.   

What is YuniDetect

YuniDetect is an external add-on wheelchair system that is portable due to its small size and ability to be used across multiple wheelchairs or electrical transportation devices with minor changes. While the potential competition has the product built into the wheelchair or electrical transportation device, our product allows the user to transfer the invention to other powered wheelchairs or other electrical transportation devices in which results a lower price cost than our competitors. Further, it gives the user true ability to experience a user friendly system due to its variety of operational modes that suits the user’s needs. Currently it has been tested on the Quickie QM-7 Series wheelchair. 

How does YuniDetect Work

Our system is designed so that the sensors are mounted to provide an almost 360 degree perimeter zone of protection around the chair. Our system is designed to reduce the number of collisions while operating the wheelchair. The system stops the wheelchair user from colliding into walls or objects, as long as the override mode is not enabled. There are 5 different modes this system can be operated with.  The first mode to describe is the override mode.  This mode disables the sensor conditions and allows normal operation of the wheelchair.  This mode acts like our system isn’t even a part of the wheelchair.  The next two modes are the distance requirements.  The two distances are short and long.  This is how far the wheelchair will stop from an object or wall to ensure the reduced collision and safety of the wheelchair user.  The final two modes are auto-assist enabled and disabled.  If auto-assist is DISABLED, then the system will stop the wheelchair at the short or long mode that is selected.  The auto-assist ENABLED mode will stop the wheelchair at the short or long mode selected and will also pulse the wheelchair in the opposite direction of the tripped sensor.  The sensors are grouped in the software as front and back.  This means if the front right sensor gets tripped, it will pulse the wheelchair backwards.  If the back right sensors get tripped, the wheelchair will pulse forward. 

 

                                                

The system we are currently displaying is our prototype and is the one our current beta-tester is using today. We plan to have the transparent cover and a touch interface. We have made our final prototype device even smaller with a more discrete look, and hopefully with your donation we can make it into reality.  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

 

What We Need & What You Get

This is how we plan to use the money you donate to this product. 

                       

This is how we plan to break down the costs in making our product possible.

                                           

Indiegogo Timeline

                           

Perks for our Indiegogo Contributors

                            

The last two perks, may be purchased for someone you know or you can donate it to a healthcare facility, examples such as Seven Hills Foundation, etc. (currently works for Quickie wheelchairs only.)

Even though we strive to reach our goal and beyond, we have a back up plan. If we do not reach our goal we will use the money to refine our R&D efforts and present this to a wheelchair manufacturing company. Any perks chosen for the product donation, we will work with 3D printing companies to still deliver the system to the selected facility by the contributor or to the contributor.

Risks & Challenges

We are really excited about launching the company’s first product. However, we know that the most important part of our process is that we fulfill our promise to you, our backers, and deliver the product on time!

Though we have some preliminary agreements with manufactures, we want to inform you of any potential issues along the way. Now since we have a working prototype, we will face new challenges related to production, packaging and shipping. At Yuni Design, LLC we will ensure the best quality product. We will continue to work hard, and of course, keep you informed every step of the way!

Thank You,

Yuni Design Team

 

Note: Please Note that shipping to any country outside North America and Canada may be delayed or cancelled depending on the feasibility of local product approval requirements or local import regulations. In a case of cancellation we will refund your pledge. There are many additional duties, fees or taxes raised by the authorities in your country. You may need to take care of them yourself when receiving the shipment.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help. We understand. Help us by getting the word out and make some noise about our campaign. Especially those who you think would really benefit from our product.

check out Indiegogo's own share tools too !

Look at our website as well: www.yunidesignllc.com

What We Need & What You Get
This is how we plan to use the money you donate to this product. 
                       
This is how we plan to break down the costs in making our product possible.
                                           
Indiegogo Timeline
                           
Perks for our Indiegogo Contributors
                            
The last two perks, may be purchased for someone you know or you can donate it to a healthcare facility, examples such as Seven Hills Foundation, etc. (currently works for Quickie wheelchairs only.)
Even though we strive to reach our goal and beyond, we have a back up plan. If we do not reach our goal we will use the money to refine our R&D efforts and present this to a wheelchair manufacturing company. Any perks chosen for the product donation, we will work with 3D printing companies to still deliver the system to the selected facility by the contributor or to the contributor.

Risks & Challenges
We are really excited about launching the company’s first product. However, we know that the most important part of our process is that we fulfill our promise to you, our backers, and deliver the product on time!
Though we have some preliminary agreements with manufactures, we want to inform you of any potential issues along the way. Now since we have a working prototype, we will face new challenges related to production, packaging and shipping. At Yuni Design, LLC we will ensure the best quality product. We will continue to work hard, and of course, keep you informed every step of the way!
Thank You,
Yuni Design Team
 
Note: Please Note that shipping to any country outside North America and Canada may be delayed or cancelled depending on the feasibility of local product approval requirements or local import regulations. In a case of cancellation we will refund your pledge. There are many additional duties, fees or taxes raised by the authorities in your country. You may need to take care of them yourself when receiving the shipment.

Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help. We understand. Help us by getting the word out and make some noise about our campaign. Especially those who you think would really benefit from our product.
check out Indiegogo's own share tools too !
Look at our website as well: www.yunidesignllc.com

story:
The Idea 

  •  Amazon Echo is a wonderful device to free your hands and this Charging Cradle frees your Alexa
  •  Amazon Echo is known to use a unique 15V, not a universal DC/AC adapter cord. It’s not so convenient to move around in the house, and there may not be a power source to the front porch or back yard
  • This Charging Cradle is built in 8000 mA poly lithium battery, and matches snugly with the Amazon Echo, and it powers your Alexa directly, which lasts for about 3-4 hours if playing in middle volume, with the stand-by time of about 6-8 hours. If you connect the 5V Input to the cradle, it will be always ready
  • You can use a universal 5V USB charger to re-charge the cradle. 





Perks

  • $15 get 8 pcs protective skin for the amazon echo
  • $45 get 1pcs charging cradle
  • $55 get 1pcs charging cradle and  8 pcs protective skin for the echo
  • $90get 2pcs charging cradle and 16 pcs protective skin for the echo

Time Line

  • Jan 2016,  came up with the idea 
  • Mar 2016, making the sample of 3D print model
  • April 2016, test & improving
  • May 2016, identifying the final sample; testing; conducting small-scale production; starting the Indiegogo Campaign
  • June 2016, conducting bulk production and shipping

Risks & Challenges

We have already completed a small（test) production and sent some of them to the actual users for a test, and the collected feedback are better than expected. Now, we’re in the process of mass manufacturing. Moreover, the only risk that we can forecast is a possible slight delay in terms of the starting date to ship

FAQ

  • How long will Echo work when being unplugged with this base?
    Stand-by time: 6-8 hours; it lasts for 3-4 hours when playing in middle volume.
    If you connect the 5V Input to the cradle, it will be always ready.
  • Will there be a case in the works to hold the echo and the base together like the Tap
    Currently NO
  • How to re-charge the cradle and how long it takes to charge it to full battery ?
    • You can use a universal 5V USB micro charger to recharge the cradle, and it takes about 5-10 hours to charge it to full, which depends on what 5V adapter you use. Fast charging is well advised, for example, 2A adapte
  • Can the cradle power the Amazon Echo and charge other mobile device at the same time 
    YES, and the 5V output is a fast charging port with the maximum output of 2A
  • Is the protective skin easy to install ?
    • YES, it is easy to install and remove it without any sticky residue.

Referral Program

 We’re very excited to announce a referral program for our backers - starting TODAY! You can earn $10 in campaign credit every time your referral links leads to the purchase of a charging cradle.

You must refer people using a unique URL generated through your Indiegogo account. We will track all referrals through our dashboard and contact you via the information you provided when you made your purchase on our page.

HOW TO SHARE
There are two ways. First you must make sure that you are LOGGED IN to your Indiegogo account. If you aren’t logged in, we  will not be able to track your referrals!

REFERRAL STEPS - METHOD 1
1. Visit our campaign and contribute at any perk level.
2. A confirmation email will appear in your inbox. Scroll down to the bottom of the email.
3. Click on the social media icons and follow the instructions.

REFERRAL STEPS - METHOD 2
1. Visit our campaign page.
2. On the left side of the page, you will see share icons.
3. Click on the link icon to generate your unique URL.
4. Share it via social media and email.

You may track all referrals through your Indiegogo profile.

Can I Participate If I Am Not A Backer?
If you have not contributed to our campaign but want to participate, thank your for the help! However, we will not have access to your contact information, so it will be your responsibility to get in touch with us at the end of the campaign. From there, you will be offered a credit towards purchase of a new charging cradle, or you receive a free charging cradle based on how many referrals you contributed.

I Have Made Referrals Before The Program Was Announced - Will They Count?
Yes! Anyone who has made referrals in the past will also be able to receive campaign credit.

How Will I Receive My Rewards?
At the end of the campaign, we will contact everyone that participated in the referral program. We will have access to how much money you have raised from referring friends.

We will then either issue you a refund based your purchase, or give you credit towards purchase of another perk on our campaign.

Is There A Limit to How Many People I Get Credit for Referring?
There is no limit. Share freely to continue racking up your rewards!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
The 365Ally Mobile App Story...

You're thinking to yourself...not another app. Well yes, but this app is different. Much different. It's the 365Ally mobile app.

  • I'm Lawrence Ross, author, lecturer, writer, strategist. I solve problems, particularly around inequities centered around systemic racism. I'm a partner in The Metaphor Club in Los Angeles, an intentional Black space for creativity. My book, Blackballed, deconstruct racism on college campuses. My next venture, 365Ally app fights business inequities one purchase at a time.
  • The 365Ally app for iOS and Android is a directory & marketplace helps allies support local and national businesses owned by Black, Latinx, Native American, Asian American, Women of color, persons of color w/disabilities, and LGBTQ persons of color.
  • Forty percent of Black businesses nationwide are closed for good because of the Covid virus pandemic.
  • Black & Latinx businesses are systemically discriminated against for business loans.
  • 365Ally destroys the systemic racist, sexist, homophobic, and ableist silos that perpetuates generational wealth gaps between marginalized businesses and white businesses.
  • How? White allies typically don't get to support marginalized businesses and communities because of housing segregation in the United States. 365Ally gives them the opportunity to find and support these businesses.

Why support this 365Ally Fundraiser?

The 365Ally fundraising campaign is designed to:

  • Pay for the construction of the iOS and Android versions of 365Ally app. To build my app, I chose Kollective Mobile, a Black woman owned mobile development shop.
  • Pays for all of the legal stuff associated with the app.
  • Pays for the server fees.
  • Pays for a collective group of high school coders to scrape the Internet for businesses owned by marginalized groups. I'm looking to find over 100K businesses upon launch.
  • Pay for all of the unexpected fees I haven't thought about yet.
  • And if you help out, I have swag to give you!

The Big Impact

The 365Ally mobile app is designed to do a number of things:

  • 365Ally is a directory for marginalized businesses. Businesses can also enhance their listings and sell items in our shop, store, and superstore.
  • Allies are able to do a hyper local search of businesses from marginalized businesses in your zip code.
  • The 365Ally app also acts as a virtual swap meet, so you don't have to be a business. You can sell stuff you don't need. That exchange matters too.
  • With each purchase, the 365Ally app tracks how much you've spent with each marginalized group
  • This is a chance for white allies to move from performative activism to real allyship.
  • And you'll be exposed to quality Black, Latinx, Native American, Asian American, women of color, disabled persons of color, and LGBTQ of color businesses you may not have known about before.
  • So...Let's...Do...Epic...Shit!

What are the Risks & Challenges?

The biggest challenges is trying to find all of the eligible businesses. In order to do that, we'll need to search through every city and town in the country, and that takes time and money to do.

  • I'm looking to get over one million marginalized businesses on the app
  • I'm looking to get over one million individuals on the app

Other Ways You Can Help

365Ally depends on YOU spreading the word. We need businesses to join, and we also need allies to join. Joining 365Ally is an intentional act of deconstruction of inequity and empowerment of those marginalized. So what can you do?

  • Donate...and then spread the word about 365Ally
  • If 2400 folks donate, we're at full funding!
  • You can use Indiegogo's share tools, so do it!

And that's all there is to it. Let's see if we can get one million folks signed up!

story:
The world's most sophisticated magnetic connector!

MagNeo is by far the most compatible and usable USB-C magnetic connector out there. Its the first and only magnetic connector that does not only power, but data and video as well. Finally, your USB-C port can be used as intended, not just for charging.

HERE IS OUR NEW DESIGN (UPDATE 1/18/2017):

New and old models

NEW custom magnet improves connection strength

 COLOR OPTIONS ARE AVAILABLE, SELECT YOUR COLOR PREFERENCE WHEN FINALIZING YOUR REWARD PLEDGE!

Color options available: Space Grey, Gold, and Silver

 

BELOW IS OUR ORIGINAL CAMPAIGN SHOWING OUR OLDER HOUSING DESIGN. ALL INFORMATION REGARDING DEVICE CAPABILITIES STILL HOLD TRUE FOR THE NEW DESIGN!

Comparison

MagNeo has 3X the functionality of other magnetic connectors, with the unique capability to provide all the USB-C signals required of new peripherals. Not only is the connector rated for up to 100W charging capacity, it also allows up to 5K video and Thunderbolt 3 speed data, all while maintaining USB-C reversible connector capability.

 

Design

Made from ultra high quality materials, MagNeo is design to withstand the wear and tear of daily use.

Gold plated pogo pins provide a secure connection with ultra low power losses at the contact surfaces. These contacts are designed to last up to 1 million cycles. 

   

Compatibility 

MagNeo is compatible with ALL devices that have a USB-C connector, including all Thunderbolt 3 devices. From the latest 2016 Macbook Pros (13" & 15"), to USB-C Hubs & Docks, to Google Pixel smartphones, MagNeo has you covered.

 

Magnets Save

Cables tangle easily and nothing is worse than tripping on one, causing damage to your device or yourself. Magnetically coupled connectors remove this hazard as the cable will unlatch before causing problems. Save your gadgets.

 

Another bonus to magnetic connectors is the simple and easy connectability... Don’t risk scratching your beautiful device with that plug, let the magnets guide the connection for you.

Rewards (Graphic soon to be updated for indiegogo)

Timeline

Designed & Engineered in the heart of Silicon Valley

 

Branch is a small but experienced team, based in the tech capital of the world, San Jose. We have successfully delivered our previous product, the technically challenging BranchBox USB-C hub, to over 30 countries worldwide.

 

Risks and challenges

Every project has its challenges regardless of the scope, however we have done our best to minimize the risks as much as possible. We are not relying on outsourced engineering, we design our products In-House. Our team has great relationships with multiple contract manufacturers, who we have used in the past with fantastic results. We also understand logistics and shipping, having delivered countless Branch products all over the world.

story:
About MIX Memory

The MIX Memory allows users to:

  • Transfer files conveniently
  • Run different operating systems without changing hard drives (ex: PC, Android or IOS)
  • Keep important files on hand
  • Troubleshoot or repair computer problems
  • On-The-Go technology  


Functionality：

MIX Memory allows users to safely, quickly, and easily save or move data between computers, IOS, Android and other digital products. It does not require any streaming services or networks. Moreover, MIX Memory has a reading function which allows users to connect devices independently for display or usage. 

Connection

  • MIX Memory is the first 3-port (IOS Device, USB, Android) USB flash drive. It features Plug&Play technology or if you feel more secure, there is an app for that! Transferring and storing files has never been so easy, no matter what choice you have for formats.

  • Like every lighting, MIX Memory can be plugged in with both way, it will not influence using headphone.

  • For ios devices，we adopt the real lighting，can be plugged in by both way and it will not influence other accessories using like headphone. 


Usage 

Our technology enables you to stream your media on your phone with the MIX Memory. You worked late night on your presentation and forgot to bring your laptop with you? No problem, since moving files from one computer to the other has never been this simple! Need to update your colleague on the go with the reports? We got that covered, just connect MIX Memory to your phone and show it there. Better than that, send it to him/her or let them get it from your devices, because we don’t need installation! The future is on the go! 


Storage 

It has been a common problem since the coming of Smartphones. The storage issue. When is it enough? When is it too much? You can never calculate how much a user would need, that is why it needs to be flexible. We give you another boost with that! Even for the IOS devices!


Security 

(encrypting on computer by default or does this come with an additional encryption?) Not only will you know exactly where your files are stored, both physically and virtually, we offer additional encryption with the app coming with our device!  

Design：  

MIX Memory is a light-weight 3-in-1 portable storage. Its slim design makes it easy to carry and an iron shell guarantees physical protection and an encryption system for digital protection. With us, you will always know where your data is, it will not get lost in the cloud and the chances of being hacked are significantly lowered! 

Flashlight：  

For Android phone, the work light of phone will flash when MIX Memory plug in or working.  

The All Mighty App：  

The MIX Memory app has the following functions: -Transferring data regardless of operating system -Encryption -Uploading files on Social media 

Rewards:

pocodoro high quality transparent shell for IPhone 6/6plus/6s/6s plus

story:
Introducing POISE the Detachable Smartwatch

 

 

"I'm using Smartwatch but I don't feel like I looked smart when making a call"

It all started when our creator, Lex, answer a call on his smart watch. In between talking to the wrist, and bringing it to the ear, Lex still find himself having to ask the other person to repeat what he was saying time and time again. "I'm using a Smartwach but I must haven't looked so smart" Lex think to himself. That sparked the idea to create POISE, the smartwatch that can ensure you a comfortable, clear, cool-looking communication experience.

 

Detachable Communicator and Clear Sound Quality

 We didn't stop there - like we said we want to improve your call experience - so even without utilizing the detach feature of the communicator and using it conventionally, we guarantee that the sound quality is top-notch

We want to make something adorable yet affordable.While  some simply equalized affordability with being cheap, we opt different way to look at it. We did our best not to make unnecessary compromises that would hurt user's convenience. We aim to be cutting edge not cutting corners.  

 

So, while we keep POISE's smart watch affordable, we make sure POISE will have everything you expect a proper smart watch to have.

POISE's simplistic and sophisticated design will compliment your looks in any situations, be it in boardroom or bar room, or even when you are taking your leisure time at home. 

  

  

"simplicity is the utmost sophistication" -- Albert Einstein 

That is what we have in our mind while designing POISE Smartwatch. While you will definitely receive a charging cable along with your Smartwatch, you can charge POISE Smartwatch with any microUSB cable which head looks like this :  

Yes, custom charging dock is flashy and all, but once you go travelling and you forgot to bring your charging dock, or in the event your one-and-only custom charging dock break down, now what? 

And haven't we mentioned? You only need to charge POISE for 2 hours to get the 150 hours battery life.  

 

 

 

Compatible With  More Than Just Smartphones 

POISE let's you connect the  Smartwatch not only to your smartphone but also any device with Bluetooh feature. Skype calls with your Tablet? POISE Smartwatch can handle it.  

 

FREE SHIPPING Worldwide

Yes, wherever in the world our beloved backers are, we offer them a Free Shipping service. We know you love it, so we accommodate it.

 

One Year Warranty

Rest assured knowing that POISE Smartwatch come with a 1 Year Warranty.

 

Campaign Timeline

 

 

Risks and challenges

First of all, we are sure and confident that we can deliver this project on time.
However, uncertainty and risks may arise during the shipping process (regardless we having entrusted it to a reliable and competent shipper).
The shipping time will take approximately 3 or 4 weeks.
During the numerous miles your POISE travel to reach you, a rough handling or some mishap during the shipping process may cause damages to the goods (have no worries though, the chances are slimmer than expected). Should the case arise that when reaching you the POISE Smart Watch is damaged, rest assure that we can replace it in just 48 hour time fro the time that the claim is received and validated.
story_txt: Introducing POISE the Detachable Smartwatch  "I'm using Smartwatch but I don't feel like I looked smart when making a call" It all started when our creator, Lex, answer a call on his smart watch. In between talking to the wrist, and bringing it to the ear, Lex still find himself having to ask the other person to repeat what he was saying time and time again. "I'm using a Smartwach but I must haven't looked so smart" Lex think to himself. That sparked the idea to create POISE, the smartwatch that can ensure you a comfortable, clear, cool-looking communication experience. Detachable Communicator and Clear Sound Quality We didn't stop there - like we said we want to improve your call experience - so even without utilizing the detach feature of the communicator and using it conventionally, we guarantee that the sound quality is top-notchWe want to make something adorable yet affordable.While  some simply equalized affordability with being cheap, we opt different way to look at it. We did our best not to make unnecessary compromises that would hurt user's convenience. We aim to be cutting edge not cutting corners.   So, while we keep POISE's smart watch affordable, we make sure POISE will have everything you expect a proper smart watch to have.POISE's simplistic and sophisticated design will compliment your looks in any situations, be it in boardroom or bar room, or even when you are taking your leisure time at home.     "simplicity is the utmost sophistication" -- Albert Einstein That is what we have in our mind while designing POISE Smartwatch. While you will definitely receive a charging cable along with your Smartwatch, you can charge POISE Smartwatch with any microUSB cable which head looks like this :  Yes, custom charging dock is flashy and all, but once you go travelling and you forgot to bring your charging dock, or in the event your one-and-only custom charging dock break down, now what? And haven't we mentioned? story:
AFbox 1.0

We've developed a product which allows you to connect easily with every device that has an built-in wifi function. You can receive data like documents, pictures, videos and more.

 We all know the distress of tangled cables or finding the right cable. This and also USB devices ar in the past! The only thing you will need to start moving files with your AFbox, is an free app which you can download quikly in your apple or googleplay store. After you installed the app you only have to push the button on your AFbox and you can start moving files up to 6 hours without charching from various iOS, Android or Apple devices. Also from tablets, computers or TV's. Our AFBox is avaibable with either 16 or 32 gygabites of storage. Our biggest wish, was to offer you an external storage device which isn't bigger than an box of matches at all. The AFbox fits in every pocket and doesn't even need a cable.

story:
1. In the Los Angeles area alone, 10 metric tons of plastic fragments—like grocery bags, straws and soda bottles—are carried into the Pacific Ocean every day.
  2. Over the last ten years we have produced more plastic than during the whole of the last century.
  3. 50 percent of the plastic we use, we use just once and throw away.
  4. Enough plastic is thrown away each year to circle the earth four times.
  5. We currently recover only five percent of the plastics we produce

 

 

Greenhouse gases keep heat close to the earth’s surface making it livable for humans and animals. However, global warming is happening largely due to an over-emittance of these gases and fossil fuels (natural oil, gasoline, coal)

According to the U.S. Global Change Research Program, the temperature in the U.S. has increased by 2 degrees in the last 50 years and precipitation increased by 5%.

there are the little-known health risks of butane.  Butane lighters are more environmentally friendly in that they are refillable and seldom see a landfill but here’s the thing; butane can kill you (Source: US National Library of Medicine). Not only that, butane also added to the greenhouse gas problem that’s the driving force behind global warming.

 

 

 

 

We say thank you to everyone who contributed to our first campaign ! 

As you all know GBP Currency dropped significantly after BrExit .

Shipping all perks, we are left in debt and this is why we are re-launching.

New campaign will help us bring more funds to our project and clear our debt as well as making world a bit cleaner !

story:
This is flexible goal so every backer gets the product.

 

Needed to create new project for USD check this link:

https://igg.me/at/wunderstand2/14911622

 

Story

My name is Miikka Salomaa and I'm a software engineer from Finland. I use a laptop stand to get my laptop's display to the same height as my external display. I previously used a metal laptop stand but they aren't ecological, are bulky and don't easily fit in your laptop case.

My colleague had designed a light-weight alternative that you could easily take with you wherever you went. I wanted to make it more durable and beautiful which is why I chose to use Finnish quality plywood as the material. Thus, Wunderstand was born. 

Wunderstand also splits into four pieces that can easily fit in envelope.

Why I need funding?

I need funding for marketing. I want to bring Wunderstand to offices around the world and get people choose Wunderstand over impractical and unecological metal laptop stand. I also need volume to keep the price reasonable and develop Wunderstand further (I have great ideas how to make it even more practical.). Every small change today can have a huge impact to the World’s future! We can make our offices more ecological while not giving up good ergonomics.

Benefits of using Wunderstand

Workplace Ergonomics / riyaz.net

Without Wunderstand your posture isn’t good and can cause neck pain. With Wunderstand your posture gets better and it reduces pain in the neck.

  • Get better working posture.
  • More elegant workstation.
  • Easy to carry around.
  • Ecological alternative for metal laptop stands.
  • Cheaper alternative for metal laptop stand.
  • Be cool.
  • Care about environment.

Does it work with my laptop?

Wunderstand is designed to be used with Apple's laptop.  Other vendors' laptops can be used but it's not guaranteed to fit perfectly.

Help share the story

If you don't need a laptop stand, please share this to others! It's also good way to show your support.

story:
BaBash - queue and hassle free quality time!

It’s hard to think of a better way to spend your time than with the people you truly love and care about. Nowadays possibilities to have a good time are endless. You can order food with couple of clicks, enjoy a movie without getting up from your bed and see your loved ones without having to travel thousands of miles.  

Technology is getting us closer to the life of convenience, but not in all areas. Some areas are still in the 20th century.

 

Imagine being with your friends on a Friday night. You’re having a good time and decide to take the party outside - you want to relax and leave your work or studies behind. You decide to go to a nightclub or a bar and it feels amazing. People are dancing, chatting and having a good time. You find a table perfect for you and your friends. In order to enjoy your weekend even more, you decide to get the next round for you and your friends. You are excited,  but as you approach the bar, your excitement slowly decreases. The queue behind the bar is stretching all the way to the dance floor. You’re bummed. You see your friends sitting behind the table, chatting and having a good time. You on the other hand are standing in the queue and waiting in line. Sounds familiar?

 

After experiencing it ourselves for years and not seeing any improvement, we decided to take the matter into our hands.

 

BaBash is the Worlds first Nightclub app that will make you feel like the VIP - no queues, no hassle, orders delivered at your table and much more.

 

 

Here is the list of features that BaBash will have:

The first version of the app will have the 8 must-have features to enjoy hassle free night-out. We already have other feature-ideas to be added, so stay tuned.

 

NO QUEUE

Order your beverage without having to stand in the queue for 20-30 minutes. Just sit and enjoy the quality time with your friends while your order is delivered to your table.


 

ORDER PICKUP

If you don’t have a table, order your beverage to the counter. Get notified when your drink is ready and go pick it up.
 

CASHLESS

No need to worry about the extra weight of pennies in your pocket or the lost money in the club - everything is done via app. Your receipt will be sent to your email.


 

SURPRISE SOMEONE

You had the most intense eye contact with a boy or a girl at the next table? Surprise him or her with a drink and see if the feeling is mutual.


 

NIGHTCLUB ENTRY TICKET

It’s winter and you’re freezing, or summer and you’re melting in the queue to the Nightclub? - Get in like a VIP by using BaBash.
 

TABLE BOOKING

Not sure if there are any tables available in the club - book it in advance using BaBash.


 

SPENDING LIMIT

Afraid that your clubbing tour will end up as the last time - spending waaay to much? We got you covered - set a spending limit and we’ll notify you once you’re getting closer.
 

NIGHTCLUB/BAR DATABASE

Would like to hit another club but don’t know where to go? Get information about all nightclubs and it’s performers - maybe there’s an impromptu Tiesto or Martin Garrix performance somewhere nearby.

 

How Funds will be Spent

We've built a prototype of the app and now we need your help to fund building a production version that will make your quality time hassle free and smooth like Cadillac.All funds will be spent on the development of the BaBash App, and on costs surrounding that development. Included in those costs are personnel costs, travel costs, hosting and design costs.

  • BaBash is not a local app. It’s a worldwide app. Funds will be used to expand BaBash to other markets.
  • $15,000 gets us production version of the app, $30,000 to expand to European markets and $100,000 to get this app to every nightclub in the world.
  • Typically a project of this magnitude would be well into six-figure range. Due to strategic partnerships, we will be able to make BaBash with much less.
  • Funds above $50,000 will be spent on Stage II development, which includes further optimizing the application based on community feedback, readying the app for important clinical trial testing, and sharing the app with millions of people around the world.

 

About us


 

Andrei(26), Tõnn(26), Joosep(24)


Andrei, Joosep and Tõnn are natural born entrepreneurs from Estonia. They got their entrepreneurial knowledge by selling educational study guides door-to-door in the United States as a summer program, while still being college students. They worked 12,5 hours a day, 6 days a week and helped over 1500 families with education during that time. This experience taught them to embrace challenges and always finish what they’ve started.

 

BaBash is the result of their love for the quality time they spend with friends and family. They know how important it is to enjoy the time with people you truly love without stress and hassle. Their hope is that BaBash will make it happen.

 

“Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much” - Helen Keller.

story:
Enjoy multiple features in a single case for your iPhone. This is the most advanced protection case that not only protects the iPhone but give you double the battery time and lets you enjoy more amazing features with your phone.

 

Military-Grade Protection

Our target is to bring the slim case which easy to carry but with full protection for your iPhone, that is why Magcase is engineering to provide a case that meets the Military Standard for drop & shock protection.

Thousand time of drop and shock tested made.  Drop from the pocket of the jacket, office chair, coffee shop table, 2 meter of the ladder, the stair, the roof, 2nd floor and the 4th floor of the building to the ground.  After generate all the data from the different crash, we had now bring you the Magcase.

 

Screen Protection

Magcase took it a step further to protect your phone even if you drop it screen-face down with the resistant skid pads surrounding the screen.

 

[MFI] Magnetic Power Bank

Our magnetic power bank for iPhone with 2500mah is MFI (Made for iPhone) certified by Apple, which give you more confidence with the Magcase.  A lot of the people is worrying on the safety of battery pack, and Magcase magnetic power bank not just MFI ready, plus it have all the safety certificate we need.  For iPhone 6/6s/7, the power pack come with 2,500mah, which the newest iPhone 7 is only 1,960mah.  For iPhone 6+/6s+/7+, the power pack come with 4,500mah, which the newest iPhone 7+ is only 2,900mah.  

 

 

 

Magcase Style

 

Magnetic Mount

Free magnetic mount will given to backer in indiegogo.  (not come in with regular retail pack)

 

FAQ

What is the Magcase?

The Magcase is slim and thin military-grade protection case with a magnetic function add-on.  It can use with it own design MFI power pack, which give you double of your phone battery life time.

Who created it?

We, Imazing, are a team of high technology fans who have years of experience in bringing technology products to market. Our goal is to bring new idea item to the market which easy to use, safety, reliability, quality performance and recognized for design. Every aspect of our products are constructed with the end user feeling. 

How much does it cost? 

Our early backers can get the up to 80% off the retail price.

Where can we buy it? 

Right here on Indiegogo! Pre-order yours today to be one of the first people to get the Magcase.

Why are you crowdfunding?

We love crowdfunding! For us, it's a perfect solution to ensure that we meet minimum order quantities for the first production batch - our tooling and developing is done and we're ready to scale up our manufacturing.

How long does the battery last?

For iPhone 6/6s/7, the power pack come with 2,500mah, which the newest iPhone 7 is only 1,960mah.  For iPhone 6+/6s+/7+, the power pack come with 4,500mah, which the newest iPhone 7+ is only 2,900mah.  

What other additional features are available?

All Magcase cases are embedded with a steel plate that allows for magnetic mounting.  And now with indiegogo backer will come with the free magnetic mount which you can easily holding your phone on the wall, mirror, or even in the car.

Have you got licensing for the power pack?

MIF (Made for iPhone) is ready and it is Apple certified. 

When does shipping begin?

Shipping for ALL outstanding cases and power pack is on track to commence June 2017.

When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps?

All orders are expected to be delivered to your doorsteps for Before End of June 2017.

Where does it ship?

We're proud to ship our cases worldwide. 

How much is shipping?

Please see reward details for all other locations. Local taxes not included.

I'm interested in a distribution partnership.

Please contact sales@imazing-power.com and including in your email the region(s) where you distribute to.

How do I choose more than one reward? 

To get more than one perk, please make a new contribution for each perk.

How can I check the status of my pre-order?

By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information.

If I have other questions, who should I contact?

sales@imazing-power.com

story:
Stream Flash anywhere

You asked for it. We’ve made it! Native PC applications and other formats on iOS and any other platform is behind the corner. No plugins. No thin clients. Pure HTML5.

How?  We stream it from our cloud!

Our technology allows to run ALL PLATFORMS applications on iOS, Android, Blackberry, Windows Phone, Windows, Mac, Linux you name it! All what is needed – just a modern browser with HTML5 support. Put SWF, Java, Unity, any other files to your future account in our service, set desired permissions, get URL and run it on your device. Vuala!

No code revision needed.

Pictures, sounds, animation, all the bells and whistles go directly to your browser, and our servers will do the hard work of computing, rendering and playing complicated code. And of course– full interactivity remains. You still able to press buttons and do all the stuff inside of your original C\Adobe Flash\Flex\Java\Unity etc application.

The cloud even provides individual screen resolution to every connecting browser.

As for now – we have a completely functional technology preview server. The team is busy fixing bugs and adding features. There is still much to do, like clients database, interfaces, optimizations etc.

I mean – OUR TECHNOLOGY IS ALREADY ALIVE!

So, the successful accomplishment of this project is a matter of visible future. Please help us make it come to release sooner! Funds are needed to pay for the programmers and designers work as well as for hosting costs. We plan it to be “Software as a Service” business model, but self-sufficient distributions of the complete server-side software are also in our mind.

Whom is it for?

In the world there are already ton’s of applications coded without crossplatform or web support. Rewriting the whole bunch of code is way too expensive. And it is not always possible to wrap AIR player around. So should you leave all this wealth behind?

Absolutely not! Now you can take it and bring to any Browser seamlessly.

If your company owns thousands of non web software (like interactive educational software based companies do) then you will be able to migrate all your huge application base to modern platforms without changing even a single line of the code. Our technology fits your needs perfectly.

If you are a skilled old school programmer then continue to use what you’ve got used to. Become a member and upload your creations on our cloud, insert provided link anywhere in the web and be sure that every gadget will play it. No plugins required. No app stores approvements.

If you love your special games and apps and want to have them anytime and anywhere then we are here for you. Have fun with your stuff being streamed from our cloud.

The Cloud allows to stream all kinds of software for all kinds of platforms. The competitors are services like Gaikai and Amazon App Stream, but they focus on streaming games for particular platforms or require additional clients and are pretty complicated and limited in use. We provide you with universal solution!

Not sure? You may spread the word hitting repost anyway, and any help would be much appreciated!

Where will the funds go?

Funds will be totally invested in NoPlugins streaming system. We will not spend your hard earned money for fancy cups and t-shirts you don't need, if you generously donate. Instead all the funds will be directed to improve software stability, reduce latency times, to make usability of the cloud the most efficient and user friendly. 


Technology preview only

Standart SWF file running and being streamed to HTML5 from our NoPlugins Cloud: http://185.8.56.56/

story:
THE ORIGINAL i-DRIVE - WHATS IT DO? i-DRIVE (ID) FEATURES

Transfer and store data from any mobile device to any device. Has an Apple 8-Pin Lightning connector, and USB connector. Free universal iPhone/iPad/iPod /iTouch Downloadable App. Stream Music directly from the i-Drive to your iPhone or iPad. Stream Movies directly from the i-Drive to your iPhone or iPad. Open files directly from the i-Drive. File Management (Copy/Cut/Paste/Delete/Rename/Create Folder). Backup Photos/Videos from a MAC or PC. Charge any Apple iPhone/iPad/iTouch device 100% directly from your computer without a charging cable.

WHAT IS THE i-DRIVE (iD)?

The i-Drive (iD) allows you to quickly and safely move all your movies, music, documents, and files between all your devices (computers, iPhones, iPads, & iTouches) with ease. With our new adapter, the Drive now works across mobile devices; android, iOS, or Windows. No need for cellular data, Internet, wireless networks, or Cloud access when using the iD.


CONVENIENCE AND FUNCTIONALITY RIGHT OUT OF YOUR POCKET

Many users use a USB flash drive to transfer files from computer to computer; it’s easy, fast, and convenient. Other phones can transfer data through memory cards, but the iPhone has never had this feature since its release. Until now. At last a drive that fits all models iPhone, iPad, iTouch, PC & MAC. What more do you need?





INTRODUCING...THE i-DRIVE

Apple iPhone users can now enjoy all the benefits of a USB hard drive with their Apple iPhone, iPad, iTouch, PC, & MAC. The iPD supports most Apple iOS file types and all common file types in use today, storing everything in its fast all-flash memory. The iPD comes with everything you need to get started: An integrated Apple Lightning connector and a regular USB connector.





WHAT EXACTLY CAN IT DO?

With the iD, users can move and add photos, videos, music and other files to and from any Apple device to their iD. The iD allows you to conserve space on your iphone while also saving you money! iPhones with more storage space cost hundreds of dollars, external hard drives don't fit the iPhone, but the iD can instantly double or triple the storage on your Apple device for as little as $65.



WORKS WITH MAC & PC: The iD works with any Mac or PC models. With the 64GB, 128GB, and 256GB models, you can back up your entire desktop computer hard drive for easy access. Free up space on your iPhone by backing up all of your photos, videos and files to the iD. No need to pay for recurring online Cloud storage subscriptions. 


STREAM MOVIES: For frequent travelers, the iPD streaming capabilities will make it an invaluable accessory. Movie files stored on our Drives can be streamed directly for viewing on your iPhone, iPad, or iTouch. Now you can watch movies INSTANTLY anywhere, anytime!


STREAM MUSIC: Stop with the hassle of fitting your entire music library on your phone. The i-Drive can directly stream music for INSTANT playback on your iPhone, iPad, & iTouch devices without the lengthy process of syncing to iTunes. 

CHARGE YOUR iPHONE, iPAD, OR iTOUCH

If all that functionality isn’t enough for you, the i-Drive also has the added convenience of being able to charge your iPhone, iPad, & iTouch battery 100% directly from any USB outlet. Stop carrying compatible wires and chargers around— you can charge your iPhone, iPad, & iTouch directly from any USB port using the iD.



FAST, POWERFUL, EASY-TO-USE APP

The first time you plug in your iD you will be prompted to download our free app. The app requires no set-up, and you will immediately see four options: Contact Backup: Backs up all of your contacts Local Storage: Accesses files on your iOS device External Storage: Accesses your i-Drive storage Dropbox: Accesses Dropbox




 ONE CLICK PHOTO/CONTACT BACKUP

Press the Backup button and all your personal contact information is transferred immediately to the i-Drive. Not just names and phones numbers but all your complete contact information and your pictures.

 
SAFE AND SECURE

In this day and age, data breaches seem normal. Every week we see news stories of hackers breaking into our credit cards, personal information, and Cloud storage. With the iD, you can eliminate that concern. The iD is safe and secure since zero information is sent through a third party service, transferred through the internet, or sent to the Cloud. This makes the iD perfect for conducting all matters private, personal or business related. With the iD by your side, all your personal and private data, will be safe and secure, whenever you need it.

THE TEAM

The team behind The New Ideas Company spans five countries, four languages, and has more than 30 years of experience. Headed by Claude Daroiu, product designer and president. The New Ideas Company focuses on producing smart electronics that simplify your life.

WHERE WE ARE AT

If you check our timeline below we started this project back in April. Currently the original 8GB, 16GB, and 32GB models are completed and ship end of March. The 64GB model ships middle to end o April. The 128GB & 256GB models ship in March. All the colored metal models ship in March & April.

story:
****IMPORTANT NOTICE****

Please do not make any donations to this campaign as this project is on hold for now due to some delay in our PATENT registration. We are trying our best to overcome this issue and relaunch this campaign at a later date. Thanks for taking interest in our product and supporting us. Any suggestions are most welcome. 

                                        ****IMPORTANT NOTICE****


A WIRELESS SOLUTION TO ALL YOUR CHARGING NEEDS


Imagine leaving your mobile phone in your pocket or anywhere in an average sized room and being able to charge it even while using your phone!

Yes it is Magic, a hundred years ago this technology was witnessed by Nikola Tesla and ever since then many scientists have further developed this technology. A decade ago in 2006 students from MIT developed a mechanism of transmitting power of up to 60 watts at a distance of 2 meters without any conductors through mid-air. 

While this beautiful technology is yet to unravel in the main stream and no such product has been commercialized to serve consumers. a breakthrough that portends the literal and figurative untethering of our electronic age. Until this development, after all the phrase "mobile electronics"has been a lie. How portable is your laptop if it has to feed every few hours, like an embryo through a cord? How mobile is your phone if it shuts down after too long away from a plug? the world is about to be cured of its attachment disorder.  


WHAT IS MAGNETO CHARGE?


Imagine a wireless charger which can make your life much easier compared to any other charger in the market. Magneto Charge by Karbon® incorporates a form of contact-less electrical transmission technology based on magnetic resonance. Electromagnetic energy  is only transferred to recipient devices that share the identical resonant frequency as the energy source, so energy transfer efficiency is maintained even when misalignment occurs unlike Qi technology. Furthermore, even if there are metal objects located between the transmitter and receiver, no heat induction occurs.  

 


TECHNICAL DETAILS


This one time investment would mean no more wires dangling around in the room, the whole family can use a single unit with the device capable of connecting with 4 receivers. The efficiency of power transfer is + 50% and each connected device receives a minimum of 1 amp of current and it can adjust with various devices if more amperage is required up to 5 amps . This version of magneto charge will only operate at 5 V output which is suitable for mobile phones, gaming controllers and tablets. The receiver modules will be embedded into sleek phone cases allowing the user to leave the phone in their protective case while charging and eliminating the need of ever plugging into a socket, the rise in temperature while charging will be around 15 Celsius or 59 Fahrenheit . The components used within the charger and receiver will meet EMC & ICNIRP guidelines.   

           

 UNTETHERING AT A GREATER COST?


The key features and potential benefits of magneto charge go beyond one's imagination, let's enlighten you:

  •  The most convenient charger ever made which cuts the cords and provides ultimate freedom to the user.
  • Being a universal device there is no worry about compatibility issues, be it your iPhone, Nexus, iPad or Galaxy 
  •  Besides convenience and style this charger will save you tons of money by eliminating the need of ever buying batteries for your gaming controllers, T.V. remote control and wall clock etc.
  • The wireless charger is specifically designed to save any hassle of internal alterations to your mobile device while preventing void warranties. 
  • One for All, this one charger will charge up to 4 devices simultaneously freeing up most of the sockets in a room. 




The costs associated with the components and production makes up a huge 66% of the total budget and it would be cost effective for the production if we buy all components in bulk as we have negotiated prices on certain volume with our sub contractors and suppliers in China. 

We are hoping for a great response from the indiegogo community but if there is a lack of funding we will have to reconsider if production can break even with the costs and although we would still fulfill all the perks/orders but it might require some extra time. In which case we will inform all the backers and supporters of this project if there is any amendment in the plan. 


PROJECT TIME LINE 

We have worked extremely hard to design our prototype, and visited China several times to find the components which we require, our suppliers hold several patents for this technology both in China and internationally. All aspects prior to manufacturing this device have been thoroughly looked into. If we raise more than our goal we would try to accelerate production so that we may be able to deliver all the perks slightly earlier.          



There are several options for us to continue developing "Magneto charge" only a few are listed above, we would like to manufacture and design as many receiver modules as we can. To make this charger compatible with all portable devices in any household is our ultimate goal. Besides mobile phones it also includes clocks, gaming controllers, remote controls, internet (DSL) modem, Tablets, & Laptops.    


FAQ'S

What is magneto charge?

A revolutionary device that lets you charge your portable devices wirelessly within a radius of 10 feet or 3 meters.  

Why did we make it?

The current chargers in the market can not provide the kind of convenience a consumer can get. Knowing that the technology already exists and no one has taken a step to enter the mainstream. We have decided to combine all the elements required to manufacture the most awaited device.  

Why did we pick this name?

"Magneto Charge" represents the technology within our device, as it is based on magnetic resonance and its main purpose is to charge all portable devices, so the name was chosen. 

How do you know we will deliver?

Karbon® is a registered brand in the United Kingdom and you can visit our amazon store at : www.amazon.co.uk/shops/A05940211MFUTFCZ4HCAS with our reputation at stake we cannot deviate from our plan. We have a great track record of delivering quality products swiftly and have in the past catered for many happy customers. 

When will you start shipping?

We will be able to ship the first 100 units by the end of September 2015 for early bird perks only. The remaining orders will be delivered By the end of November 2015.  

I live outside the United Kingdom, will you ship to my address?

Yes, we will be able to ship worldwide, as long appropriate shipping charges are added. 

I entered a wrong address! what do i do?

If you have entered a wrong address or wish to change your address we suggest you write us an email at magnetocharge@gmail.com

Why don't you have Paypal as a payment option?

Paypal is not selected as a payment option due to excessive charges. Also in the past we have had unwanted delay during payment transfer and monies held up in Paypal for several weeks.    

How long will this take to charge a phone?

It will take nearly twice the time to charge a phone compared to a wall charger supplied by manufacturers.

We will be updating the FAQ section as the campaign progresses, if you have a question in mind do leave us a comment or feel free to shoot us an email at

 magnetocharge@gmail.com

story:
SUNNY is a groundbreaking solar case for iPhone 6 that makes you completely independent from power outlets by harnessing the most powerful energy source. The power of the sun!

SUNNY looks discreet and simple when closed. However once you open it, the solar panels will immediately harness the power of the sun!


The most powerful source of energy is often neglected when it comes to charging phones. This is about to change!


Battery life is still one of the most important issues when it comes to our phones. SUNNY is a real alternative for everyone who loves to stay connected.

The built in battery more than doubles the capacity of your iPhone 6. It keeps you going. It’s a game changer!

We invented a groundbreaking solar case, that makes you completely independent from power outlets. Bye bye wall plugs, hello nature!



We used the newest and most powerful solar panels on the market assure the fastest charging speed possible! It's the same technology that keeps the Mars rover going - welcome to the future.

We already got the official Apple MFi license in advance, which makes SUNNY a Apple approved iPhone 6 case.

We have been working on SUNNY for over a year now. It was a close collaboration with universities and solar power research organizations.

We hired experienced professionals in hardware manufacturing to help us make SUNNY a reality. Our plan is to ship all rewards by this summer 2015. SUNNY will be one of your best buddies. Guaranteed!

Once we successfully complete this Indiegogo project, Sunny will have a MSRP of $119. So you are getting a great deal by supporting our campaign. Get it. Share it.


The Sunny Case shown on this page and in the video was built by us in corporation with our MFi certified contract manufacturer on our own production line. We’re currently making updated tooling molds for the final version. 

Forecasting Risk - We’ve done our very best to forecast demand and create a solid production plan. Should we miss projections, we’ll let you know why and make it right as quickly as possible.

Supply Chain Risk - We’ve built a very capable team whom we've worked with for several years on several other products. However, component delays such as unexpected shortages of the Apple MFi certified Lightning chips can occur. If this happens, we’ll will work to quickly solve the problem.

Quality Management - Additional iterations and improvements in the manufacturing process can always come up. This could delay the manufacturing process but improve the overall quality.

Indiegogo is not a store and we don't have the Sunny cases on hand yet. But we promise to do our best to avoid any delays and get Sunny to you as soon as we can.

Some people just can't contribute financially, but that doesn't mean you can't help. Please ask folks to get the word out. Let's make some noise about our campaign. Make sure to use the Indiegogo sharing tools and hit them up via Twitter, Facebook, Email and more!
story_txt:
SUNNY is a groundbreaking solar case for iPhone 6 that makes you completely independent from power outlets by harnessing the most powerful energy source. The power of the sun!


SUNNY looks discreet and simple when closed. However once you open it, the solar panels will immediately harness the power of the sun!

The most powerful source of energy is often neglected when it comes to charging phones. This is about to change!

Battery life is still one of the most important issues when it comes to our phones. SUNNY is a real alternative for everyone who loves to stay connected.


The built in battery more than doubles the capacity of your iPhone 6. It keeps you going. It’s a game changer!

We invented a groundbreaking solar case, that makes you completely independent from power outlets. Bye bye wall plugs, hello nature!









We used the newest and most powerful solar panels on the market assure the fastest charging speed possible! It's the same technology that keeps the Mars rover going - welcome to the future.







We already got the official Apple MFi license in advance, which makes SUNNY a Apple approved iPhone 6 case.







We have been working on SUNNY for over a year now. It was a close collaboration with universities and solar power research organizations.



We hired experienced professionals in hardware manufacturing to help us make SUNNY a reality. Our plan is to ship all rewards by this summer 2015. SUNNY will be one of your best buddies. Guaranteed!











Once we successfully complete this Indiegogo project, Sunny will have a MSRP of $119. So you are getting a great deal by supporting our campaign. Get it. Share it.









The Sunny Case shown on this page and in the video was built by us in corporation with our MFi certified contract manufacturer on our own production line. We’re currently making updated tooling molds for the final version. 
Forecasting Risk - We’ve done our very best to forecast demand and create a solid production plan. Should we miss projections, we’ll let you know why and make it right as quickly as possible.
Supply Chain Risk - We’ve built a very capable team whom we've worked with for several years on several other products. However, component delays such as unexpected shortages of the Apple MFi certified Lightning chips can occur. If this happens, we’ll will work to quickly solve the problem.
Quality Management - Additional iterations and improvements in the manufacturing process can always come up. This could delay the manufacturing process but improve the overall quality.
Indiegogo is not a store and we don't have the Sunny cases on hand yet. But we promise to do our best to avoid any delays and get Sunny to you as soon as we can.


 Some people just can't contribute financially, but that doesn't mean you can't help. Please ask folks to get the word out. Let's make some noise about our campaign. Make sure to use the Indiegogo sharing tools and hit them up via Twitter, Facebook, Email and more!

story:
Short Summary

  • The Blue Lion Elite Lacrosse Club is a growing organization that was founded in 2008 to provide local youth and high school lacrosse players an opportunity to compete year-round on a regional and national level.
  • This past summer three of our teams qualified for the Dicks Sporting Goods National Lacrosse Championship.  Only the best lacrosse teams in the country qualify for this tournament via top finishes in select summer tournaments.  If we raise enough funding, we have the opportunity to send the 1st ever high school level teams from Kansas City as well as the 2nd ever youth team.  Sending three teams to Florida over New Years is very expensive, and we need your help to get us there. 
  • Your donations will provide these players with a once in a lifetime experience, and may be what allows a Kansas City lacrosse player to be recruited to play college lacrosse. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are hoping to achieve $15,000.  This would cover all tournament fees, coaching fees, coaches’ travel, and coaches’ lodging.  By achieving this, players would only have to worry about their own personal travel costs. 
  • We greatly appreciate all our donors, so we have designed perks to give back and show our appreciation.  Donors of at least $20 will receive a bumper sticker, hat, or personal gift of $50.  See our Perks Page for more. 
  • If we do not reach our goal there is a strong chance we will not be able to send all three teams.  The donations will still go towards the trip and we will send as many teams as possible.  If we are unable to send any teams and have to cancel the trip, the donations will be returned to the individual at no cost. 

The Impact

  • Many lacrosse players in Kansas City never get to play competition from outside the midwest.  It is important for our player development that we are exposed to the highest level competition at every age.  
  • Many people outside of KC have no idea that lacrosse exists here.  It's important to market our growth to the the rest of the country, so that we may attract quality coaches to KC in the future.  an abundance of quality coaching is the biggest driver of sport growth. It is currently lacking in KC 
  • Some players will play in college, some players will not.  Regardless, this will be an experience every player remembers for the rest of their lives.  Blue Lion HS coach, Will Garrett, attended this tournament in 2009 as a player.  It is still one of his most memorable lacrosse experiences.  

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Help us get the word out!
    • Tell your family and friends
    • Donate airline miles (email bluelionlacrosse@gmail.com for details)
    • Share our campaign link via email, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc.
    • Use the indiegogo share tool
