story:
WALKEY ? - Watch our introduction video !

Be 1st to get your WALKEY - support a young Swiss label and innovative product going to market - select your Perk in the column on the right (desktop view). 



WALKEY®  -  Sophisticated -  Effortless - Eclectic

An interaction of contemporary cosmopolitan nobles and European craftsmanship,  made of genuine leather, italian silk, french lace, swiss embroidery, austrian loden.

World's 1st - PROTECT CARRY USE your 5 Daily Essentials all in One - Smartphone, Cards, Cash, Key  Lip Gloss - One Size fits Any Size Smartphone and gives access to all features without fully removing it - Made in Switzerland


WALKEY®  -  The Daily Survival Kit of Urban Life

handmade of finest genuine leather

WALKEY® - The Must Have from St. Moritz to Aspen

handmade of genuine leather in combination with Austrian Alpine Loden

WALKEY®  -  The Swiss Army Knife of Fashionistas

handmade of genuine leather combined with artistic refined fabric - french lace


WALKEY®  -  Artistic and Sustainable accessory 

The designs of WALKEY® are an interaction of contemporary cosmopolitan nobles and European craftsmanship, combining FUNCTIONALITY with HIGH QUALITY and ARTISTIC REFINED FABRICS and GENUINE LEATHER. In skillful precision work a consolidation of extremes, of modern spirit with fine tradition is taking place. Hereby each WALKEY® is awarded with uniqueness and that certain something.

WALKEY® - a genuine composition of FUNCTIONALITY and FASHION, making YOUR daily life easier. It allows you to STORE PROTECT CARRY USE your daily essentials ALL IN ONE, WHEREVER YOU GO. 

Each WALKEY® is handcrafted by artisans from SWITZERLAND, AUSTRIA, SPAIN, who are renown for their HIGH QUALITY of work.

To manufacture an accessory with as many details and features like this one in a cost efficient way, we need to place an order of several hundred units at once and pay our manufacturers and artisans upfront. We already tested and selected high quality manufacturing partners and artisans. This funding will allow them to go to work.


WALKEY®  -  Contribute  &  Select Your Perk

Please find all Perks listed in the column on the right (desktop view).

Selecting your Perk - How to choose your design?

We appreciate any contribution, therefore each perk ordered will be delivered, independent of fundraising achievement.

When we're close to production we will ask you by eMail to fill out a form where you will be able to specify your design choice and confirm your shipping address.







WALKEY® - One size fits Any common Smartphone

WORLD'S FIRST AND ONLY accessory, thanks to its patent pending Twist Zip Curl Technology, that FITS ANY common size of Smartphone, PROTECTS the Phone and Camera, GIVES ACCESS to any Phone Feature including camera without fully removing it and enables you to STORE CARRY USE your Daily Essentials ALL IN ONE. 


WALKEY® -  Social Responsible Investment

Each WALKEY® is handcrafted by artisans in SWITZERLAND, AUSTRIA, SPAIN. The craftsmanship of small leather goods has diminished in Europe in the last decades due to a global price war. We bring it back to life and provide employment to artisans in Europe, who are renown for their HIGH QUALITY OF WORK.

Why we need YOUR SUPPORT

We've spent many resources to get this far, but now we need your help. With your backing we will bring WALKEY® to all of you around the globe, simplifying everyone's life in a fashionable way.

To manufacture an accessory with as many details and features like this one in a cost efficient way, we need to place an order of several hundred units at once and pay our manufacturers and artisans upfront. WALKEY® will be crafted in Switzerland, Austria and Spain. We already tested and selected high quality manufacturing partners and artisans. This funding will allow them to go to work.

We will continue to refine and perfect WALKEY®, add more designs and make it even more useful and fashionable. That's an ongoing process that will continue through the life of the product.

Our stretch Goals:

  • 100k - adding 3 more designs Avantgarde
  • 150k - adding 3 more designs Couture
  • 300k - offering 5 designs Limited Edition at a time
  • 500k - starting new collection Sports (...already in pipeline)


WALKEY® - Timeline

WALKEY® has been tested in daily life for more than 12 months before going to market. Now we are about to BRING IT TO MARKET GLOBALLY and ANY OF YOUR SUPPORT is welcome to make sure WALKEY® also will SIMPLIFY YOUR LIFE and the one of others.

Apart from Personal DAILY USE and TRAVEL, WALKEY® also is a great GIFT to someone special, your FRIEND, your FAMILY, your TEAM, your top CLIENTS. Each WALKEY® comes in an exclusive gift box.


WALKEY® - Simplify Your Life in a Fashionable Way




Backing and Shipping

How do I choose my design and verify my shipping address?

When we're close to production we will ask you to fill out a form where you will be able to specify your design choice and confirm your shipping address.

If you are interested in our "your company logo @ WALKEY®" perk and want to make sure your logo fits, please send us a short eMail with your logo to info@walkey.me, we will be happy to assist.

What types of mobile devices are compatible with WALKEY® ?

WALKEY® is compatible with any brand and size of Smartphone currently sold by official retailers.

  • iPhone 5, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, 
  • Samsung Galaxy A5, S5, S5 mini, S6 Edge, Xcover 2, Alpha, Note 4, Grand Neo,
  • Sony Xperia Z3, Xperia Z3 Compact, 
  • HTC One, One mini 2,
  • LG G Flex2, G3, L70,
  • Huawei Ascend P7,
  • BlackBerry Classic, Leap, Z30, Passport,
  • and other Smartphones of similar size
If your Smartphone is not listed here and you want to be sure your Smartphone fits, please send us a short eMail to info@walkey.me and we will be happy to assist.

What if I want to keep my waterproof hardcover AND use WALKEY® in my daily life - does it fit?

Most Phones even fit with a waterproof hardcover into WALKEY®. If you are not sure and want to get confirmation regarding your phone and waterproof hardcover, please send us a short eMail to info@walkey.me. We will be happy to assist. 

How will WALKEY® be shipped?

Shipping will be handled via SWISS POST or DHL, which are able to accommodate all of our backers worldwide. All packages will be sent out of Switzerland. You will receive an email with a tracking number when your WALKEY® ships.
Once a shipping confirmation is sent, you should receive your package in 3-5 business days within Europe. International backers can expect to receive packages within 5-10 business days. Expedited shipping is not available through our Indiegogo campaign.

Risks and Challenges

We are excited to launch our first ever crowd-funding campaign to introduce  WALKEY®, the swiss army knife of modern life.

We appreciate any contribution, therefore each Perk ordered will be delivered, independent of fund raising achievement.

Performance

We are perfectionists! We have done our homework, so the risks are minimal. We have tested WALKEY® for more than 12 months in daily life before going to market. So we know it works. We have developed a highly innovative product and fully functioning prototypes. 

We tested WALKEY® at freezing outdoor temperatures up in the mountains and at sweating outdoor temperatures at the beach. We have been traveling with WALKEY® from one continent to the other. During the full length of our testing period Smartphone and credit cards were stored all in one. All items stored and carried within WALKEY® were working fine any time independent of outdoor temperature and climate.

Manufacturing

We have identified and locked in our manufacturers who will be able to ship within 60 days of successful project funding, so you can enjoy your personal WALKEY® just in time when the winter holiday season kicks in.

We only use the highest quality materials and manufacturing. Each WALKEY® is handcrafted by experienced artisans from Switzerland, Austria and Spain. So rest assured WALKEY® will exceed your expectations.

We are committed to keeping our campaign transparent and will openly communicate with our supporters on our project, as well as any obstacles that might arise. 

We are preparing for future challenges that could impact our planned manufacturing timeline, including minor adjustments that might be made during production to improve the final product. We will prepare for any delays this may cause in order to deliver the best quality product with a timely delivery for the consumers’ benefit.

Our priority is to deliver a product that will exceed any expectations to those who support us and believe in us. We’re so grateful for you and promise to provide you with the best version of this stylish and revolutionary accessory.

Warranty

We give a 3 months warranty on WALKEY® itself. We do not give any warranty on any item stored, carried or used with WALKEY®. When using WALKEY® in your daily life we advise to use common sense regarding care and handling just like with any wallet, phone cover, key holder or purse. 


THANK YOU

Thank you for your time and your contribution to help WALKEY® going life. Please share this page with all your friends. THANK YOU.

story:
WHAT IS OMNIPOLE AND WHY WE DESIGN IT

There are several unique pole-mounted GoPro accessories on the market today, but none quite like this. Admittedly they serve their purposes fairly well, but if you want the versatility and features of Omnipole, you may spend $300 or more to buy several items needed to get the same results. This is why we designed Omnipole, the most versatile pole-mount system to hit the market for GoPro cameras. This single item meets all the needs for today’s GoPro Photographers and Videographers. We put tremendous effort into every detail of Omnipole, and selected top-notch materials for exceptional toughness and durability. Omnipole is designed to be used as both an extension pole for sports and other activities, as well a tripod for steady shots. With optional accessories, you can mount two cameras on one Omnipole to record first person POV footage and selfie simultaneously. You can also mount your smartphone on it as the GoPro live preview window, GoPro remote and even an action camera! With Omnipole, the possibilities are endless.



TOUGH, DURABLE AND RELIABLE

Omnipole is made of top-notch industrial material that will survive extreme conditions (-40°C to 100°C) and weather. We have done countless tests on the durability of the materials we chose to guarantee that it is tough enough for the desert, the snow, or the ocean. We put tremendous effort into every detail of Omnipole: High torque screw, mechanical locking teeth gear in every joint for steady recording and safety lock to protect your hand in the case of loosen screw.

FULLY ADJUSTABLE AND EASY SWITCH BETWEEN EXTENSION POLE AND TRIPOD

Omnipole consists of one handle and two foldable extension arms. It is flexible, can be customized and adjusted according to your needs: Handle only/Handle+1 Arm/Handle+2 Arms. Omnipole provides possibilities for all types of activities. As an extension pole, it can be assembled to lengths ranging 12 to 33 inches. Omnipole can be conveniently transformed into a sturdy tripod with different height profiles for steady shots or time-lapse video.

DETACHABLE GOPRO REMOTE CASE AND SMARTPHONE ADAPTOR SYSTEM

With optional accessories available in Pro Edition and Smartphone Edition, the possibilities of Omnipole go even further. The detachable case for GoPro Smart Remote allows you to quickly access your GoPro remote. The smartphone mount and adapter allow you to: 1. mount your smartphone as a GoPro preview window/remote as well as using the GoPro App. 2. mount your smartphone to the top spot and use it as an action sport/selfie camera.

DUAL MOUNT CAP- MOUNT TWO CAMERAS ON ONE POLE AND CAPTURE POV FOOTAGE AND SELFIE SIMULTANEOUSLY

In the Pro Edition and Smartphone Edition, the Duo Mount Cap provides an additional mounting spot for a second camera. With Duo Mount Cap, you can easily record first person view POV footage and selfie simultaneously.

ITEMS INCLUDED IN DIFFERENT EDITION 

There are three different editions of Omnipole provided: 

Standard Edition: Omnipole/3x screw set/Wrist strap/Carabiner 

Pro Edition: Omnipole/3x screw set/Wrist strap/Carabiner/Remote Case/Duo Mount Cap 

Smartphone Pro Edition: Omnipole/3x screw set/Wrist strap/Carabiner/Remote Case/Duo Mount Cap/Smartphone mount and adapter

WHY CHOOSE OMNIPOLE?

We are confident to say Omnipole the most professional pole mount system on the market. It is always easier said than done, but WE DID IT!

INTRODUCING THE BEST OMNIPOLE COMPANION ACCESSORY: ARMOR FRAME (NOT INCLUDED IN ANY OMNIPOLE EDITION)

The Armor Frame for GoPro® HERO4 and HERO3+ cameras. Made with top-notch industrial material, Armor Frame is the toughest frame ever made yet slim and light weight with a sleek design. Complete lens protection (lens cap included). Shock reduction. Easy access to all the ports and buttons. The lens ring is compatible with most 37mm lens adapter for advanced recording with UV filter, polarized filter, natural density filter, etc. Armor frame is the ultimate GoPro accessory with perfect balance of protection and portability.


All of our Indiegogo backers and supporters on Facebook, Instagram and Youtube will be automatically eligible for the enrollment of our mega giveaway events in the following months and you could win an Omnipole and so many more!!!! Every weekday we will give away one Omnipole and two Armor Frames after the campaign finishes. Winners will be announced every other week on facebook page and contacted by us. For more detail, find us and follow us on Facebook, Instagram and Youtube!!


REWARDS
story_txt:
WHAT IS
OMNIPOLE AND WHY WE DESIGN ITThere are several unique pole-mounted GoPro accessories on the market
today, but none quite like this. Admittedly they serve their purposes fairly
well, but if you want the versatility and features of Omnipole, you may spend
$300 or more to buy several items needed to get the same results. This is why
we designed Omnipole, the
most versatile pole-mount system to
hit the market for GoPro cameras. This single item meets all the needs for
today’s GoPro Photographers and Videographers. We put tremendous effort into
every detail of Omnipole, and selected top-notch materials for exceptional
toughness and durability. Omnipole is designed to be used as both an extension
pole for sports and other activities, as well a tripod for steady shots. With
optional accessories, you can mount two cameras on one Omnipole to record first
person POV footage and selfie simultaneously. You can also mount your
smartphone on it as the GoPro live preview window, GoPro remote and even an
action camera! With Omnipole, the possibilities are endless.TOUGH,
DURABLE AND RELIABLEOmnipole is made of top-notch industrial material that will survive extreme conditions (-40°C to 100°C) and weather. We have done countless tests on the durability of the materials we chose to guarantee that it is tough enough for the desert, the snow, or the ocean. We put tremendous effort into every detail of Omnipole: High torque screw, mechanical locking teeth gear in every joint for steady recording and safety lock to protect your hand in the case of loosen screw.



FULLY ADJUSTABLE AND EASY SWITCH BETWEEN EXTENSION POLE AND TRIPODOmnipole consists of one handle and two foldable extension arms. It is flexible, can be customized and adjusted according to your needs: Handle only/Handle+1 Arm/Handle+2 Arms. Omnipole provides possibilities for all types of activities. As an extension pole, it can be assembled to lengths ranging 12 to 33 inches. Omnipole can be conveniently transformed into a sturdy tripod with different height profiles for steady shots or time-lapse video.

                                                    
DETACHABLE GOPRO REMOTE CASE AND SMARTPHONE ADAPTOR SYSTEMWith optional accessories available in Pro Edition and Smartphone Edition, the possibilities of Omnipole go even further. The detachable case for GoPro Smart Remote allows you to quickly access your GoPro remote. The smartphone mount and adapter allow you to: 1. mount your smartphone as a GoPro preview window/remote as well as using the GoPro App. 2. mount your smartphone to the top spot and use it as an action sport/selfie camera.



DUAL MOUNT CAP- MOUNT TWO CAMERAS ON ONE POLE AND CAPTURE POV FOOTAGE AND SELFIE SIMULTANEOUSLYIn the Pro Edition and Smartphone Edition, the Duo Mount Cap provides an additional mounting spot for a second camera. With Duo Mount Cap, you can easily record first person view POV footage and selfie simultaneously.
ITEMS INCLUDED IN DIFFERENT EDITION There are three different editions of Omnipole provided: Standard Edition: Omnipole/3x screw set/Wrist strap/Carabiner Pro Edition: Omnipole/3x screw set/Wrist strap/Carabiner/Remote Case/Duo Mount Cap Smartphone Pro Edition: Omnipole/3x screw set/Wrist strap/Carabiner/Remote Case/Duo Mount Cap/Smartphone mount and adapter
WHY CHOOSE OMNIPOLE?We are confident to say Omnipole the most professional pole mount system on the market. It is always easier said than done, but WE DID IT!
INTRODUCING THE BEST OMNIPOLE COMPANION ACCESSORY: ARMOR FRAME (NOT INCLUDED IN ANY OMNIPOLE EDITION)The Armor Frame for GoPro® HERO4 and HERO3+ cameras. Made with top-notch industrial material, Armor Frame is the toughest frame ever made yet slim and light weight with a sleek design. Complete lens protection (lens cap included). Shock reduction. Easy access to all the ports and buttons. The lens ring is compatible with most 37mm lens adapter for advanced recording with UV filter, polarized filter, natural density filter, etc. Armor frame is the ultimate GoPro accessory with perfect balance of protection and portability.


MORE WAYS TO SUPPORT USAll of our Indiegogo backers and supporters on Facebook, Instagram and Youtube will be automatically eligible for the enrollment of our mega giveaway events in the following months and you could win an Omnipole and so many more!!!! Every weekday we will give away one Omnipole and two Armor Frames after the campaign finishes. Winners will be announced every other week on facebook page and contacted by us. For more detail, find us and follow us on Facebook, Instagram and Youtube!!REWARDS

RISK AND CHALLENGES
We have been
working on this project now for a total of 8 months. Many design changes,
several prototypes, and countless hours of testing have been completed to reach
our finished product. We have overcome a variety of challenges to date, but
those obstacles only made for a superior item. Development of this new product
was a large undertaking financially, and took our design and engineering teams
to a whole new level. Now, we are ready to make this a reality and we need your
help to do so. With your support and your order, we’ll get manufacturing underway
and will bring this incredibly versatile multi-use GoPro product to the market.
ABOUT US

WoCase is a
US brand dedicated to making the highest quality accessories for GoPro Cameras
and FitBit Fitness Trackers. The company, founded in 2013, began its venture
with a sleek wrist mount allowing hands free filming with your GoPro. Next we moved
to dive filter sets and a floating handle. These two products created a huge
buzz around the quality of our products, and helped WoCase develop and become
one of the leading GoPro accessories brands today. WoCase has a diversified
team of innovative founders, an experienced engineering group, talented
industrial designers and a young energetic following. We are now focused on
making high-end accessories that will provide even more possibilities to the
constantly growing GoPro Community. These products will bring photography and videography
to a whole new level for its users. 
We would
like to thank you all for your support and look forward to growing with you in
the future.

story:
The Zeni Kinetic Type Zero!

With a spacious build area, the Type Zero is bench made by craftsmen, carefully designed and engineered with a commitment to Zero Compromise. The Type Zero compliments everything you need as a versatile model at an unbeatable price, providing the freedom to create and adapt as technology evolves.

The print area is 300mm x 450mm x 300mm (approx. 12” x 18” x 12”).

The Type Zero comes with dual high-temperature extruders and a larger heated bed allowing you to print 2 colors or materials. Print anything you want with a print temperature up to 240°C, nearly 400°C with the stainless insert.

Each person has their own style, needs and ideas. The Origin models have been meticulously designed to offer you both solid functionality and a workhorse platform for 3D printing that will look great in any setting and last for years.

Type Zero Features

  • 300mm x 450mm x 300mm (12in x 18in x 12in) print area
  • Dual .35mm extruders
  • Uses 1.75mm filament.
  • Prints with: ABS, PLA and any filament up to 240°C
  • Stainless insert offers printing temperatures up to 375°C
  • Tempered glass heated and removable bed
  • Down to 75 micron layer height.
  • Print speeds up to 150mm / sec.
  • 2 spool bays
  • Beautiful aluminum frame
  • Easy access to internal components
  • Fully upgradeable. Advanced options can be added at any time.
  • Fully assembled and tested.
  • USB connection for PC control
  • 1 Year warranty
The Ultimate model sports an LCD control panel with an SD Card slot, allowing the printer to operate standalone from a computer, and providing easy access to advanced printer control functions.

Software

We provide you with everything you need to get started. As always, you are free to use any software you like, from design to operation.

Windows, Mac and Linux


Backstory

Some people think we are being TOO transparent but we feel strongly that the spirit of crowdfunding is to get behind people who have already done the hardest part, the most work and help them make that last jump into realizing the potential of an amazing product. In that spirit we offer you our story. Judge as you see fit. We are running this campaign to try to add momentum to our startup and to gauge markets.

Zeni Kinetic manufactures and sells dynamic, versatile 3D Printers and high-quality plastic filament. Zeni also operates a retail storefront in the heart of Salt Lake City, providing customers a hands-on introduction to 3D Printing and a local destination for supplies, repairs, maintenance and consulting. In addition, we provide 3D Printing services, as well as 3D Scanning for all our customer's project needs.


Zeni Kinetic LLC was established in September 2013, initially producing and selling premium-quality filament online. Filament sales were steady and growing throughout most of 2014, despite overseas companies flooding the market causing filament prices to drop. During this phase Zeni was improving their printer designs and experimenting with effective large-format configurations. In October 2014, Zeni opened its retail location in a key commerce location in Salt Lake City, UT. Concurrent with opening its retail store, Zeni began production on its new Zeni Origin 3D Printer. The Origin 3D Printer rapidly gained traction with Zeni's preexisting customer base and spread through word of mouth as well.


Toward the end of April 2015, a critical flaw surfaced in the design and functionality of the extruder hot-ends that were being used in our printers. We were faced with an important decision; whether to continue producing printers with inherent flaws or to put production on hold to correct this before any further printers were produced. With a commitment to quality and reliability we weighed other hot ends available against making our own and made the decision to work with a local CNC shop to design and produce a custom hot-end. This hot-end has made our printer significantly more reliable, MUCH easier to true the nozzles to each other and much faster and easier to clear any hot-end clogs. However, with a modest, yet growing backlog of printer orders we were forced to halt sales to avoid becoming overwhelmed. The redesign of the hot-end took longer than anticipated and with production on hold, most of our production staff sought out new jobs. By the time the hot-end was completed in late May 2015, we were left with a fraction of our production staff and found ourselves in a near stall situation.


The hot end we came up with is compact, solid and almost fool-proof. The teflon liner can be swapped to stainless allowing temps up to almost 400°C and they are clamped in with a collar clamp instead of a groove mount. This allows very easy adjustments to the height. Clogs are easy to clear and the nozzle can be changed in under a minute.


When we stopped production we redirected our efforts towards reconfiguring our production process and developing a comprehensive business plan in an effort to acquire funding while also taking the opportunity to re-invent our company from the ground up. We are currently running on a very constricted budget and production is being ushered along by a small group of dedicated people who believe in our company and want to see it grow.


We view our growing pains as a strong learning experiences and we are making every effort possible to adapt and grow in order to deliver on the promises we've made to our customers. We are confident that our printer is now virtually flawless and we are ready to continue producing a top-quality 3D Printer. We wouldn't be here today if it weren't for our initial supporters and we've devoted our lives to ensuring our company is successful.

Your contributions will go directly towards allowing us to continue building these amazing machines and hopefully provide the momentum we need to build and grow as a company.



This is not a conceptual or prototype 3D printer seeking funding to start a business.
This is a Turn-Key situation. Everything we need to start production is already in place, including trained personnel. We need to beef up the business side of things by adding one or two key personnel on that side, but until we can afford them we have attracted the interest of some key mentors. We are being guided carefully, we are working extra hard and we are absolutely committed to seeing how far we can take this amazing company.

Zeni Kinetic is managed by a small group of very hard-working and dedicated individuals whom have made great sacrifices and are committed to ensuring the success of the business. This determination stems from an unwavering confidence in the quality of Zeni's unique 3D Printer and the determination and drive to make 3D Printing more accessible, affordable and enjoyable for the general public. At Zeni Kinetic, we believe heart and soul that 3D Printing will change the world and we strive to be at the forefront of this new technological revolution.

Your Contribution

Your contributions will be used for the following:

  • Secure an inventory of parts to build a large beginning inventory of printers, ready to be delivered right away;
  • Hire and train a full production staff, capable of producing at least 15 printers per day.
  • Bring in more professional business management team members, sales, and customer service personnel.
We are currently in the fundraising phase of our business plan and since investors want their money back, we think it's only right that the people who support us should get something extra back too. Therefore, we have put together a "Charter" club. Over the course of 5 years, you will get the value of your Indiegogo contribution back in free filament. Anybody with a 3D printer knows how fast the cost of filament adds up. We happen to be in a position to help you back.

The more funding we receive, the greater our flexibility and freedom to produce more printers at a faster rate. Our long-term goals include expanding our production facility and staff as well as acquiring a bigger, higher-quality filament extrusion line. Every dollar received will be used to achieve those goals.

 

Contribution Rewards

NON-PRINTER REWARD LEVELS

$5 - Zeni Kinetic Logo Sticker & Thank-You Note Signed By Management

$20 - 3D Printed Zeni Kinetic Logo Keychain + Previous Rewards

$50 - Zeni Kinetic Logo T-Shirt + All Previous Rewards

$100 - Custom 3D Printed Statue + All Previous Rewards (Limit 50)

The Sticker, 3D Printed Keychain and T-Shirt all feature Zeni Kinetic's distinctive logo as displayed in this campaign. For the $100-tier reward we will offer you a 10" tall 3D printed model of a famous and/or iconic statue of your choice, provided we are able to legally acquire and use the 3D model for the statue. Many historical statues and monuments are public domain and several groups have taken 3D scans of them and offer the model files free of charge. If you are local to Salt Lake City, UT, we can even take a 3D scan of you or a family member and print the model as a personalized figurine!


PRINTER REWARD LEVELS + CHARTER CLUB REWARDS

$200 (Bronze):
- $300 Credit Towards the Purchase of a 3D Printer (At Retail Price)
- 3 Filament Spools Per Year for 5 Years

$500 (Silver):
- $650 Credit Towards the Purchase of a 3D Printer (At Retail Price)
- 6 Filament Spools Per Year for 5 Years

$800 (Gold):
- $1000 Credit Towards the Purchase of a 3D Printer (At Retail Price)
- 9 Filament Spools Per Year for 5 Years

$1250 (Platinum Plus EARLY BIRD SPECIAL) (Limit 50):
- Type-Zero Plus 3D Printer (pre-production queue for faster delivery!)
- 12 Filament Spools Per Year for 5 Years

$1500 (Platinum Ultimate EARLY BIRD SPECIAL) (Limit 50):
- Type-Zero Ultimate 3D Printer (pre-production queue for faster delivery!)
- 12 Filament Spools Per Year for 5 Years

$1500 (Platinum Plus):
- Type-Zero Plus 3D Printer
- 12 Filament Spools Per Year for 5 Years

$1750 (Platinum Ultimate):
- Type-Zero Ultimate 3D Printer
- 12 Filament Spools Per Year for 5 Years


The Bronze, Silver, and Gold contribution levels are redeemable towards the purchase of a full 3D Printer at Retail Price ($1749.99 for Plus, $1999.99 for Ultimate, subject to availability).

The Early Bird Platinum contributions are the last opportunity to get in on our pre-production queue and save $250 off our special pre-production pricing ($1500 for Plus, $1750 for Ultimate). You will also be added to the end of our pre-production build queue, and will receive your printer faster.

The Retail Platinum contributions will put you first in line after we close our pre-production queue, and you'll save $250 off our Retail pricing ($1750 for Plus; $2000 for Ultimate).

You will also receive 3, 6, 9, or 12 filament spools per year for 5 years depending on your contribution (additional shipping costs may apply).

Timeline

The amount of funding we receive from this campaign will determine how many parts we can order and how much staff we can hire, which will factor into estimated delivery dates. We are ready to get production fired back up right away and with sufficient funding we can get up to speed very quickly. We anticipate that we will be able to get caught up with the pre-production queue within 3 months, however depending on the amount of funding we receive through this campaign, we could get caught up in as soon as one month.

We have already started back up. As of today, 9.28.2015 we are back in production. This is the first machine to roll off the new line.

We have secured some funding so far and we are getting the ball rolling again regardless of the outcome of this campaign. However your help will make a huge difference and will give us a great head start and more confidence. We want to move forward as prepared as possible for anything and everything; we are itching to get things going again.

We have approximately 60 printers in our pre-production queue. There are a few individuals who are helping us build printers on their own time but they are only capable of a couple printers per week. With your contributions we will be able to hire a full-time production staff and produce printers much, much faster than we are right now. As a rough projection, if we receive $100,000 in contributions, we will easily be able to produce 5 printers per day. If we get as much as $250,000, we can achieve 15 printers per day. Your contributions will determine how fast we are able to produce.

Risks & Challenges

Getting production started back up is only the first step; maintaining operations is the next. The road behind us has been very bumpy but we've learned a lot from the experience we've had and we've made many changes, adjustments and improvements. We've put countless hours into eliminating problems and developing a plan for the future and it looks very bright. That being said, the future is unpredictable and obstacles are bound to present themselves again. In the past, our lack of sufficient funding has been our greatest struggle and that is why we aim to move ahead fully prepared to handle those obstacles as they come.

Our future plans revolve around a very carefully constructed projection to grow and expand only as fast as is safe and reasonable, so as to avoid becoming overburdened or encountering time constraints. All our plans and goals will be worked towards in a paced, diligent manner and no big decisions will be made without full confidence, preparedness and a backup plan. Rigorous quality control checks and standards have been put in place in order to avoid further production delays and ensure an excellent product. Preparedness is key here and more contributions means more adaptability for what the future has in store.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, you can still help! We need to gain traction and build momentum and support behind us in order to ensure a sustainable future, so please share our campaign with your friends and family. Positive exposure is critical for us and every little bit counts!


All of us here at Zeni Kinetic thank you wholeheartedly for your help!

Rigorous quality control checks and standards have been put in place in order to avoid further production delays and ensure an excellent product. Preparedness is key here and more contributions means more adaptability for what the future has in store.


Other Ways You Can Help If you can't contribute, you can still help! We need to gain traction and build momentum and support behind us in order to ensure a sustainable future, so please share our campaign with your friends and family. Positive exposure is critical for us and every little bit counts!

All of us here at Zeni Kinetic thank you wholeheartedly for your help!

story:
Introducing the newest and coolest gadget for all laptop/pc users.

We are introducing the coolest gadget to add to your pc/laptop, the new USB powered LED fan clock.
Comes in handy for those long working hours, long train & plane journey, If you get a bit stuffy and hot just plug in the mini Fan and it will cool you down in no time. Our previous USB powered fan was big hit. This time we have managed to add an extra feature of a LED clock, which gives it that extra cool edge and you will never lose track of time.
Plug & play directly into your pic/laptop, no need for an external power source, finished in chrome. It's small and manoeuvrable. Take it anywhere with no hassle. The capabilities are endless with this handheld gadget.
The fan also comes with a flexible neck so you position the fan in any direction you want.

We are raising funds to further develop our previous product and install the led clock, install softer blades so you don't hurt yourself if you do hit the fan by accident and low power consumption.
We have a fully functional prototype but would like to develop further and introduce the low level consumption, so it will not effect you laptop battery power consumption.
Once funds are raised the product will be delivered with 20-35 days.

If you cannot find this project please share with family and friends and help us get this product in the marketplace.
